If you're feeling lucky, then you've come to the right place. Test your gambling prowess with 19 games of chance including: Craps, Blackjack, Rouulett, Slotts, Video Poker, Mini-Baccarat, Keno and Poker Challenge.

game.path: ./Caise Gedou 24 in 1 Diannao Huamian Xuan Game (Taiwan) (Unl).zip
game.name: Caise Gedou 24 in 1 Diannao Huamian Xuan Game

game.path: ./Caise Gedou 29 in 1 Diannao Huamian Xuan Game (Taiwan) (Unl).zip
game.name: Caise Gedou 29 in 1 Diannao Huamian Xuan Game
Cannon Fodder
game.desc: Guía a un equipo de hasta seis soldados a través de múltiples zonas de batalla en este juego de acción y estrategia de arriba abajo. Selecciona un soldado o un grupo y pulsa un botón para moverlos a un lugar determinado y otro para disparar a un enemigo. También puedes recoger granadas o cohetes que puedes utilizar para destruir grupos de enemigos, edificios o determinados vehículos. Cada misión tiene un objetivo específico, y en algunas intervienen vehículos como tanques. Tus tropas pueden cruzar el agua pero no pueden disparar en ella, por lo que encontrar y controlar puentes suele ser crucial. Puedes utilizar la disposición de los árboles para encontrar escondites desde los que disparar, pero ten cuidado con los soldados enemigos que hacen lo mismo.

game.name: Capcom vs SNK - Millennium Fight 2001
game.desc: Capcom vs SNK: Millennium Fight 2001 is an unlicensed port of Capcom vs. SNK: Millennium Fight 2000. Presumably based on the work done on the Game Boy Color port of Street Heroes, there are possibilities that Ei-How Yang was the main programmer of this game as well, despite unproven and incorrect assumptions of Makon Soft being involved. This is a port of Capcom vs SNK, with many of the characters from the original appearing in the game, although some that were not in the game are included, such as Yashiro and Blue Mary. The sprites are mostly take from the Game Boy version of Street Fighter II while other sprites are taken from Nettou Garou Densetsu Special, Nettou The King of Fighters '95 and 96 as well as Sachen's Street Fighter Zero 4. Of the twenty-eight characters playable, at least four of them are palette swaps. Similar to the aforementioned Street Fighter Zero 4, there are also two hidden characters for each side which cannot be accessed.

game.name: Buzz Lightyear of Star Command
game.desc: Buzz Lightyear of Star Command is a Windows PC game created by Travelers Tales with Disney Interactive and PIXAR in 2000. The game consists of multiple planets, each with a villain on it. In each level the player races the villain to his/her getaway destination. Then the player engages in a one-on-one battle the villain, which usually requires destroying an energy shield surrounding the villain.[1]

game.name: Card Sharks
game.desc: Demo de juego de Cartas. Se puede jugar a Crazy 8's, Hearts, Cribbage, Old Haid, Gin Rummy, Spades, Go Fish y War.

game.path: ./Cardcaptor Sakura - Itsumo Sakura-chan to Issho (Japan) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Cardcaptor Sakura - Itsumo Sakura-chan To Issho
game.desc: Card Captor Sakura: Itsumo Sakura-chan to Issho! is an Adventure game developed and published by MTO, which was released in Japan in 1999. The goal is to collect all of the missing Clow cards by finding Sakura in her house, talking to her, and coaxing her to go on adventures. But in order to do that, you need to be in the right place at the right time, as the game utilizes an internal real-time clock.

game.name: Cardcaptor Sakura - Tomoeda Shougakkou Daiundoukai
game.desc: A collection of mini-games featuring characters from the anime "Card Capture Sakura. You can play 12 kinds of mini-games related to the field day. Fortune-telling and other extras are also included.

game.name: Carl Lewis Athletics 2000
game.desc: Carl Lewis Athletics is a Sports game, developed by Planet Interactive and published by Ubisoft, which was released in 2000.

game.name: Carmageddon : Carpocalypse Now
game.desc: CARMAGEDDON brings all the carnage of the PC and Nintendo 64 action-racing games to the Game Boy Color. You play as one of the last survivors of a horrible disaster that has turned an entire city into zombies. Now you've got to take to the streets in a deadly race with other survivors. Use your weapons and driving skills to decimate your opponents and the zombified pedestrians that walk the streets. You'll find more than 30 different tracks of mayhem in four different areas, giving you plenty of replay value. Earn enough points and you'll upgrade your road machine to something with a bit more destructive power, and there are 18 different machines available for your use. Colorful graphics represent all the vehicular mayhem with speed and style, and a password function saves your progress through the game.

game.name: Casper
game.desc: Follow the adventures of the friendliest ghost around with CASPER for the Game Boy Color. Based on the hit 1995 movie, the game follows the plot of the film closely. Casper is on a mission, and he must explore Whipstaff Manor for clues and solve puzzles as he avoids the ghostly trio of Stinky, Stretch, and Fatso who are looking to put a stop to Casper's adventure. The game is played from an isometric perspective, which shows the rooms and hallways of the mansion in high color and detail. You'll have to search the rooms of this huge estate carefully for items such as keys and puzzle pieces that will help you unlock other sections. You can also learn new abilities and gain ghostly powers to further aid you in your adventure.

game.name: Caterpillar Construction Zone
game.desc: Elija entre once máquinas Caterpillar resistentes y robustas, incluidos tractores, retroexcavadoras y topadoras. Cava zanjas, mueve rocas y realiza rescates audaces. Además, resuelve misiones que incluyen arar y cosechar un campo y construir un puente de rocas.

game.name: Catwoman
game.desc: En Catwoman, la villana titular de Batman se convierte en su propio juego. Talia intenta contratar a Catwoman para robar una calavera de cristal, pero Catwoman decide quedársela, sin saber que Ra's al Ghul planea usarla para destruir Ciudad Gótica. Catwoman tiene docenas de movimientos para ayudarla a navegar y abrirse camino a través de nueve niveles de matones y plataformas. Puede atacar con sus garras, saltar de las paredes, voltear, agarrar repisas y balancearse con su látigo al estilo Bionic Commando. También tiene una opción de sigilo, que le permite desaparecer en el fondo de un nivel y escabullirse en silencio.

game.name: Centipede
game.desc: El clásico éxito arcade CENTIPEDE llega a Game Boy Color en esta versión ligeramente mejorada del viejo favorito. Este juego de uno o dos jugadores te hace disparar pesticida a un ciempiés que se aproxima y amenaza el jardín. A medida que la plaga se abre camino a través de los hongos dispersos por la pantalla, tendrás que usar la estrategia y la rapidez para combatirla. El juego clásico se replica perfectamente en este port arcade. Puedes jugar dos jugadores de forma competitiva alternando en un solo Game Boy, o tomar dos copias del juego y un Game Boy Link Cable para cooperar contra los malos. CENTIPEDE está mejorado para Game Boy Color, con todos los nuevos gráficos de colores brillantes que te llevarán de vuelta a las salas de juegos de los años 80. Centipede es compatible con todos los sistemas Game Boy.

game.name: Championship Motocross 2001 featuring Ricky Carmic
game.desc: CHAMPIONSHIP MOTOCROSS 2001 RICHY CARMICHAEL trae todas las emociones y la acción del motocross a su Game Boy Color. Este juego de carreras de un solo jugador utiliza una técnica gráfica especial para darle al juego una apariencia y sensación 3D suave. Las carreras tienen lugar desde la perspectiva de tercera persona. Usted puede elegir entre 30 corredores reales, cada uno con sus propias fortalezas y debilidades. Escoja su motocicleta entre 16 únicas y levante el polvo en más de 20 pistas que tienen lugar en variedad de escenarios. Las pistas cuentan con complejas vueltas y saltos gracias al motor gráfico especial. Además de correr, también puedes probar el modo libre, donde puedes mostrar tus habilidades haciendo trucos. Usa un password para guardar tus resultados y tu progreso a través de las diferentes carreras.

game.name: Chao Jin Hua - Shu Ma Bao Bei D-3
Chao Jinhua Shuma Baolong - Zuanshi Ban

game.path: ./Chaoji Jiqiren Dazhan X - Super Robot War X (Taiwan) (Unl) (Alt).zip
game.name: Chao Ji Ji Qi Ren Da Zhan X - Super Robot War X
Chase H.Q. : Secret Police
game.desc:
Chase H.Q. - Secret Police, is slightly different than the other Chase H.Q. games. You receive a call from Dispatch, telling you to arrest suspects that have just committed a felony. There are ten stages in the game, and each one of them has you placing three agents throughout the city. Each one of these agents have their own specialties. Once you have placed the agents, you must guide one of them toward the suspect vehicle. If the vehicle goes outside the city, the game is over.
Once the two of you make contact, the battle begins where the object is to ram the suspect's vehicle until it is disabled. You can also shoot the vehicle to further damage it, and use up to three turbos to catch up with the vehicle if you happen to fall behind.

game.name: Checkmate
game.desc: You can enjoy the ultimate strategy game "chess" against a computer with the best thinking routine. You can choose from two types of display: easy-to-understand Japanese and English to enjoy the authentic atmosphere. You can freely set the color of the pieces and enjoy it. There are 16 game levels, from beginners to professionals. Depending on the setting of the level divided into small pieces, the opponent's playing power changes. There are two modes, "Winning Battle" where you can play against 15 challengers in order, and "Free Battle" where you can choose your favorite opponent from 16 people. You can also save the game, so you can continue playing at any time.

game.name: Chee-chai Alien
game.desc: Collect "Chai Lian" from fluorescent lights, remote controls, and other sources of light to remove the "dark matter" from their bodies. Using infrared communication, players can exchange "Chai Lian" and compete against each other.

game.name: Chessmaster
game.desc: Prepare to challenge the longest running console chess series, THE CHESSMASTER. In this Game Boy version of the game, you can choose to play at any one of 16 different skill levels, ranging from beginner to expert. For those just learning to play chess, take advantage of the Teaching mode that will show you all of the best moves to make. This game has a variety of options for chess fans, as you can set up the board however you like to simulate classic chess situations and challenges. You can even make your opponent?s pieces invisible for an added challenge. If you make a wrong move, the game will allow you to take back moves and try again. If you?d rather just see the outcome, merely ask THE CHESSMASTER and he?ll finish the game to checkmate. Play alone or against a friend through the use of the Game Boy Link Cable. You can also use the password function to resume a game already in progress.

game.path: ./Chi to Ase to Namida no Koukou Yakyuu (Japan).zip
game.name: Chi To Ase To Namida No Koukou Yakyuu
game.desc: A simulation in which you become the manager of a high school baseball team and give instructions to your team members. You must give precise instructions in practices and games to make the baseball team stronger and win games.

game.path: ./Chibi Maruko-chan - Go Chounai Minna de Game Da yo! (Japan).zip
game.name: Chibi Maruko-chan - Go Chounai Minna de Game Da yo
game.desc: A board game based on the manga "Chibi Maruko-chan". Roll the dice and go around the town to find the hidden treasure of memories. Up to four players can play at the same time.

game.name: Chicken Run
game.desc:
Esta versión de Chicken Run difiere de la versión de otras consolas y se basa libremente en la película. La jugabilidad está más orientada hacia Lemmings, donde el jugador toma el control de los protagonistas principales, Rocky y Ginger, y sacan a sus amigas las gallinas de situaciones peligrosas recolectando bolsas de alimento esparcidas por el escenario y usando el maíz para trazar un camino alrededor de los obstáculos y trampas hasta la salida del escenario.
Cuenta con más de 24 niveles relacionados con la película y presenta obstáculos como cámaras de vigilancia, perros, focos y muchos más. Los jugadores también pueden usar artículos domésticos comunes repartidos por todo el nivel para ayudar al jugador a desactivar las trampas de cada nivel.

game.name: Wacky Races
game.desc: For those who can remember the cartoon series, this will be a blast from the past. Choose from all your favourite characters including Peter Perfect, Penelope Pitstop and, of course, Dick Dastardly and Muttley, and wind your way through cartoon like environments in the familiar vehicles of each character. Simply get to the end of the race first to open up new tracks, and use weapons to pick off the rest of the cast, and aid your progress.

game.path: ./Chongwu Xiao Jingling - Jiejin Ta Zhi Wang (Taiwan) (Unl).zip
game.name: Chong Wu Xiao Jing Ling - Jie Jin Ta Zhi Wang

game.path: ./Choro Q - Hyper Customable GB (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Choro Q - Hyper Customable Gb
game.desc: A racing game in which players compete with tuned-up Choro-Qs to create the fastest Choro-Q of their own by making full use of more than 200 kinds of modified parts and power-up items.

game.name: Classic Bubble Bobble
game.desc:
Blue Dino se ha puesto enfermo y ha enviado a Green Dino a por una cura. Esencialmente es un remake del clásico arcade, sin la posibilidad de 2 jugadores.
El objetivo del juego es utilizar las habilidades de burbujas de Dino para atrapar y hacer estallar a los malos mientras esqiuvas sus ataques para completar el nivel, recolectando elementos de bonificación en el camino. Hacer estallar a los enemigos los convierte en fruta que dan puntos de bonificación.

game.name: Colin McRae Rally
game.desc: REDISCOVER RACING. European rally racing. It'll turn you inside out and suck every ounce of adrenaline you have. It's totally unforgiving. But you'll love every second of it! It's nothin' but you... the road... and the clock.

game.path: ./Columns GB - Tezuka Osamu Characters (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Columns GB: Tezuka Osamu Characters
game.desc:
Columns era para Game Gear lo que Tetris era para Game Boy. Algunos años después de que Game Gear dejara de producirse, se trasladó a 'Boy'. Para darle vida al juego, se le han otorgado varios modos de juego y, sobre todo, una licencia para varios personajes de manga populares creados por Osamu Tezuka. Juega como personajes famosos como Astro Boy, Kimba o Black Jack.
Además del modo Columnas principal, esta edición cuenta con un modo de rompecabezas como el de los juegos de Nazo Puyo, donde debes eliminar un conjunto de piezas preinstaladas utilizando un conjunto de piezas sueltas predefinidas. También hay un modo de enlace para luchar con amigos.
Los personajes de Tezuka no juegan un papel importante en el juego, ya que se muestran en una ventana a la derecha del campo de juego, cambiando las mímicas según avanza el juego. Tienes seis personajes para elegir y tres espacios de guardado para colocarlos. Los espacios de guardado te permiten mantener tu puntuación para las próximas sesiones.

game.name: Command Master
game.desc: The game is played by summoning a character called "Neos" to battle. The Game Boy can be moved up, down, left, and right in response to the displayed commands to perform a variety of moves.

game.name: Commander Keen
game.desc: Esta nueva versión trae nuevos mundos, extraterrestres y muchos más caramelos que recolectar. El Comandante Keen viaja de nuevo a los confines del espacio exterior, esta vez para recuperar los Cristales sagrados que han sido robados por el malvado Droidicus. Tomas el papel de Billy Blaze, quien cuando no está trabajando en su taller secreto construyendo nuevos inventos, se pone el casco de fútbol americano de su hermano y se transforma en: ¡Comandante Keen, Defensor de La Tierra!

game.name: Conker's Pocket Tales
game.desc: Conker organiza una fiesta con su novia. The Evil Acorn rompe la fiesta. Bellota se lleva a la novia de Conker. Ahora Conker debe rescatar a su novia. El juego también funcionó para Game Boy y Super Game Boy. Conker viaja a través de muchos niveles, tratando de encontrar regalos que Evil Acorn ha robado. Conker está equipado con una honda para luchar contra enemigos, como plantas mutantes, serpientes y otros. Los jugadores encuentran algunos minijuegos en su aventura, incluidos juegos de tipo olímpico. Si un jugador comenzaba en Game Boy, tenía que jugar todo el juego antes de poder jugar en Game Boy Color. Esto funcionó al revés, también.

game.name: Cool Bricks
game.desc: Cool Bricks es un juego estilo Breakout, actualizado para el mercado moderno. Los jugadores usan el bate y la pelota para romper todos los ladrillos rompibles para completar cada nivel. Cool Bricks también cuenta con una amplia gama de potenciadores, incluidos Ghost, Ninja y Poison. Nuevos trucos tecnológicos permiten pantallas a todo color y más de 150 niveles. El juego también cuenta con un tablero duradero de puntuación alta.

game.name: Cool Hand
game.desc: Las Vegas is the gambling capital of the world. Every game in the world has some kind of action in Sin City. Now you can travel to Vegas and try to win some virtual dollars in LAS VEGAS COOL HAND. Play three classic card games: Blackjack, Solitaire, and Cribbage. All of the games have four different variations to play. In Blackjack, the goal is to get as close to 21 as possible without going over, while also beating the dealer's hand. Solitaire has the player trying to place stacks of cards in order and removing the cards one by one. The goal in Cribbage is to be the first person to score 121 points. Take a trip to sin city and try to break the bank in LAS VEGAS COOL HAND.

game.name: Motocross Maniacs 2
game.desc: Motocross Maniacs 2 es la continuación del título de Game Boy Motocross Maniacs. Al igual que en la iteración anterior del juego, el objetivo es andar en una moto de cross a través de recorridos de desplazamiento lateral llenos de bucles, saltos, rampas y colinas. Hay muchos elementos de bonificación para ayudar al jugador en el camino, como refuerzos de nitro y súper suspensión. El jugador tiene la opción de jugar contra un jugador de la computadora o un amigo (a través de Link Cable), así como Contrarreloj o Campeonato. También hay un editor de niveles y espacio para tres pistas personalizadas guardadas hechas por el jugador.

game.name: Croc
game.desc: Algo no va bien en el mundo de Croc. Sus amigos, los gobbos, han sido capturados por el malvado barón Dante. Tu misión en este juego de plataformas en 3D es buscar en los 42 niveles diferentes del juego y salvar a todos tus amigos antes de que sea demasiado tarde.

game.name: Croc 2
game.desc:
Croc inicia una búsqueda para encontrar a sus padres. Sin embargo, el barón Dante ha secuestrado a los reyes Gobbos. Entonces Croc cambia de planes para rescatar a todos los reyes Gobbos.
Viajas a través de 48 niveles en este juego 3D de entorno libre. Tienes que superar todos los niveles de una aldea (excepto el nivel secreto) para pasar a la siguiente. En cada aldea (excepto la cuarta aldea) hay 5 niveles regulares, 2 jefes y 1 nivel secreto. Los niveles regulares son niveles en los que simplemente los superas y obtienes ciertos elementos en ellos.
Los jefes son niveles en los que atraviesas una sección y luego luchas contra un monstruo al final. Los niveles secretos son niveles en los que recolectas piezas del rompecabezas. Una vez que recojas la pieza del rompecabezas en los 4 niveles secretos y derrotes al Barón Dante, Swap Meet Pete te llevará a los niveles perdidos.

game.name: Cross Country Racing
game.desc: International Rally is a rally game with 20 courses and 14 cars which differ in speed, acceleration and adhesion. During the tournament, the player has the possibility to upgrade the car, e.g. a better engine or a speed enhancement, and adjust the damper and tires according to the known weather conditions of the next race. The effectiveness of the car components wears down over the course of the tournament. Other available playing modes are single rallies, time races and duels with a human opponent.

game.name: Cross Hunter - Monster Hunter Version
game.desc: Cross Hunter is an RPG game developed and published by Game Village for the Game Boy Color platform. Cross Hunter has three different versions released: Monster Hunter, Treasure Hunter, and X Hunter. These games are similar to the Pokémon games in the fact that they are mainly the same game with some slight content differences.

game.name: Cross Hunter - Treasure Hunter Version
game.desc: Cross Hunter is an RPG game developed and published by Game Village for the Game Boy Color platform. Cross Hunter has three different versions released: Monster Hunter, Treasure Hunter, and X Hunter. These games are similar to the Pokémon games in the fact that they are mainly the same game with some slight content differences.

game.name: Cross Hunter - X Hunter Version
game.desc: Cross Hunter is an RPG game developed and published by Game Village for the Game Boy Color platform. Cross Hunter has three different versions released: Monster Hunter, Treasure Hunter, and X Hunter. These games are similar to the Pokémon games in the fact that they are mainly the same game with some slight content differences.

game.name: Cruis'n Exotica
game.desc: La secuela de Cruis'n World tanto en las salas de juegos como en Nintendo 64, Cruis'n Exotica te permite competir contra la computadora o hasta contra otros tres oponentes en una amplia variedad de autos y escenarios. La mecánica del juego sigue las reglas de "arcade", que incluyen "turbos" para acelerar (y aumentar) la velocidad máxima, y cualquier desviación fuera de la pista te empuja de vuelta a ella. Los autos van desde autos deportivos hasta autos más esotéricos como camionetas, minis y vehículos policiales. Las pistas modelan la vida real (Alaska, India, Corea, etc.) y eventualmente se ramifican en mundos de fantasía (Atlantis, Amazon, Mars).

game.name: Crystalis
game.desc: Crystalis es un juego de rol de acción con vista desde arriba. A partir de la cámara criogénica, el jugador asume el papel de un héroe que debe descubrir el misterio de la torre. El personaje puede equipar armas, armaduras, escudos y guantes o brazaletes en su cuerpo y un solo artículo de su inventario para usar en el campo de batalla. Para ayudarlo en su aventura los cuatros sabios le enseñarán su magia, al tiempo que obtendrá las cuatro espadas elementales que le ayudarán a progresar. Los jugadores obtienen experiencia y oro al derrotar monstruos. La experiencia se usa para ganar niveles y mejorar las estadísticas, sin embargo, se requiere un nivel mínimo antes de poder dañar a los jefes. El oro se usa para comprar artículos en las tiendas.

game.name: Cubix : Robots for Everyone, Race 'n Robots
game.desc: ¿Robots en la vida cotidiana? Créanlo, amigos. Esa es la realidad de la genial serie de dibujos animados, CUBIX: Robots para todos. La historia sigue las aventuras de Connor, un niño humano, y su robot, Cubix, a través de Bubble Town. En un intento de reparar los robots dañados y protegerse de los seres malvados, la pareja se encuentra con todo un elenco de locos personajes cada semana. El juego pone su énfasis en los aspectos de las carreras de la serie, enviándote a la serie de campeonatos de carreras de Bubble Town. Tu archienemigo, el Dr. K, tiene un corredor convertido llamado Kolossal en la competición, y tu objetivo es ganarte el derecho a derrotarlo. Elige competir como cualquiera de tus personajes favoritos de la serie, incluyendo Hop2ix, Brutix, Don-Don, Diagnostix y Cubix. Podrás personalizar a tus corredores a tu gusto, usando elementos como Grav-grip, Zero G y otros potenciadores de la serie para desafiar la gravedad y alcanzar velocidades máximas. Lleno de modos de juego con opciones geniales y gráficos coloridos, Race N Robots no se puede perder.

game.name: CyberTiger
game.desc: Rip up the rules book - anything goes! Create your own golfer to take on CyberTiger and the many other characters. Real-time analog swing and ball control - hit a fade or a draw, add topspin or backspin, all in mid-flight. Sandtraps and tall rough are just the beginning. Seven modes of play: Strokes, Skins, Match, Tournament, Practice, Driving Range and the all-new Battle and Club Challenge modes. More ways to get on the green - superdrives, hidden tricks, hidden courses, hidden golfers, and tons of secret skills!

game.name: Cyborg Kuro-chan - Devil Fukkatsu
game.desc: Action game in which players destroy all enemies and objects on the stage. Collect a wide variety of weapons and face off against tough bosses. You can also compete with other players for weapons.

game.name: Cyborg Kuro-chan 2 - White Woods No Gyakushuu
game.desc: The second stage of the game adaptation of "Cyborg Kuro-chan," which has become an anime as well as a comic book. The game features more intense enemy attacks and thrilling battles, and the number of objects that can be destroyed in the game has also been greatly increased. The game also allows players to use a variety of weapons by entering passwords that have been published in magazines such as "Comic Bon Bon.

game.path: ./Daa! Daa! Daa! - Totsuzen Card de Battle de Uranai de! (Japan).zip
game.name: Daa! Daa! Daa! - Totsuzen Card De Battle De Uranai De!
game.desc: Daa! Daa! Daa! Totsuzen Card de Battle de Uranai!? is a game developed and published by Video System for the Game Boy Color. Daa! Daa! Daa! Totsuzen Card de Battle de Uranai!? was never released outside of Japan.

game.name: Daffy Duck : Fowl Play
game.desc: En Daffy Duck: Fowl Play, Daffy está en busca de un tesoro escondido del que Bugs Bunny le habló. Desafortunadamente, el resto del elenco de Looney Tunes quiere detenerlo. Fowl Play es un juego de acción/plataformas de nueve niveles con algunas mecánicas inusuales. Daffy tiene un medidor de hambre que debe mantener lleno. Debes encontrar comida a lo largo de los niveles y siempre darte prisa para que Daffy no se muera de hambre.

game.path: ./Daffy Duck - Subette Koron de Oogane Mochi (Japan) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Daffy Duck : Fowl Play
game.desc: En Daffy Duck: Fowl Play, Daffy está en busca de un tesoro escondido del que Bugs Bunny le habló. Desafortunadamente, el resto del elenco de Looney Tunes quiere detenerlo. Fowl Play es un juego de acción/plataformas de nueve niveles con algunas mecánicas inusuales. Daffy tiene un medidor de hambre que debe mantener lleno. Debes encontrar comida a lo largo de los niveles y siempre darte prisa para que Daffy no se muera de hambre.

game.path: ./Daikaijuu Monogatari - Poyon no Dungeon Room (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Daikaijuu Monogatari - Poyon No Dungeon Room
game.desc: Poyon, the character from "The Tale of the Great Shellfish," travels through a dungeon with friends and summoned beasts in this RPG.

game.name: Daikaijuu Monogatari - Poyon No Dungeon Room 2
game.desc: Dig through dungeons, slay dragons and collect 7 stamps. Use your transformation abilities to change into a carpenter, detective, or other craftsman to solve mysteries and become a Kaibutsu Hermit.

game.path: ./Daikaijuu Monogatari - The Miracle of the Zone II (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Daikaijuu Monogatari - The Miracle of the Zone II
game.desc: A new version of the popular card battle game. The total number of cards is 340, including those from the previous game. Players are ranked in eight levels.

game.name: Daikatana
game.desc: Daikatana es un juego de rol orientado a la acción para la Gameboy Color. A diferencia de las versiones para otras consolas, esta versión fue diseñada a pedido del creador John Romero para ser un juego de aventuras similar a “The Legend of Zelda” con el fin de diferenciarla. En el 2455 d.C., Kage Mishima usó los poderes mágicos de Daikatana, la espada más poderosa jamás forjada, para alterar el tiempo y establecerse como dictador supremo. El jugador asume el papel de Hiro Miyamoto, un estudiante del arte de la guerra japonesa y una de las pocas personas en la Tierra que sabe lo que en verdad sucedió. Ahora es el deber de Hiro usar el poder de Daitakana para viajar en el tiempo y corregir la historia.

game.name: Daikatana
game.desc: Daikatana es un juego de rol orientado a la acción para la Gameboy Color. A diferencia de las versiones para otras consolas, esta versión fue diseñada a pedido del creador John Romero para ser un juego de aventuras similar a “The Legend of Zelda” con el fin de diferenciarla. En el 2455 d.C., Kage Mishima usó los poderes mágicos de Daikatana, la espada más poderosa jamás forjada, para alterar el tiempo y establecerse como dictador supremo. El jugador asume el papel de Hiro Miyamoto, un estudiante del arte de la guerra japonesa y una de las pocas personas en la Tierra que sabe lo que en verdad sucedió. Ahora es el deber de Hiro usar el poder de Daitakana para viajar en el tiempo y corregir la historia.

game.path: ./Daiku no Gen-san - Kachikachi no Tonkachi ga Kachi (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Daiku No Gen-san - Kachikachi No Tonkachi Ga Kachi
game.desc: Daiku no Gen-san: Kachikachi no Tonkachi ga Kachi is an action/platforming game developed by Biox and published by Gaps for the Game Boy Color platform. Daiku no Gen-san: Kachikachi no Tonkachi ga Kachi was never released outside of Japan.

game.name: Dance Dance Revolution Gb
game.desc: Dance Dance Revolution GB is an Action game, developed by Now Production and published by Konami, which was released in Japan in 2000.

game.name: Dance Dance Revolution Gb - Disney Mix
game.desc: Dance Dance Revolution GB Disney Mix is an Action game, developed by Now Production and published by Konami, which was released in Japan in 2001.

game.name: Dance Dance Revolution Gb2
game.desc: Dance Dance Revolution GB2 is an Action game, developed by Now Production and published by Konami, which was released in Japan in 2000.

game.name: Dance Dance Revolution Gb3
game.desc: Dance Dance Revolution GB3 is an Action game, developed by Now Production and published by Konami, which was released in Japan in 2001.

game.name: Dancing Furby
game.desc: ¡Como un furby debes bailar! Woo-teh-loh-wah-boo! Sacudelo a la izquierda, sacúdelo a la derecha. Un Furby es un monstruo parecido a un búho con esponjosas orejas de plátano rosa. Les encanta bailar, cantar y aprender lentamente el habla humana. En concreto un Furby es un robot de juguete autónomo fabricado por Tiger Electronics, licenciante de este juego. Estos juguetes estuvieron entre los primeros robots domésticos exitosos. Aquí estarán bailando para ti. Dancing Furby funciona como un juego de ritmo clásico, con una línea de botones que se desplazan por la pantalla y que tendrás que presionar cuando lleguen a la marca de tiempo actual, que supuestamente coincide con la música. Un Furby en la pantalla bailará de acuerdo con su desempeño, comentando su sincronización en Furbish, "noo-loo" es perfecto, "e-day" es aceptable y "boo" es chillado por falla. Al final de cada canción, tendrás tu puntuación calculada en "noo-loo", etc. y luego podrás continuar.

game.name: Data-navi Pro Yakyuu
game.desc: A baseball game featuring the ability to freely edit player data. The latest data for the current season is included. Give instructions to players and conquer open games and pennant races.

game.name: Data-navi Pro Yakyuu 2
game.desc: You become the manager of a professional baseball team and take charge by giving instructions to your players. The number of signs you can give, such as "bunt" and "throw the ball as hard as you can," will increase, and all players have real names.

game.name: Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX
game.desc:
Acclaim's foray into trick-based BMX games spawned a unique version for the Game Boy Color.
The basic design is the same as in the original console title and other post-Tony Hawk extreme sports games. In career mode, the player has to complete various goals in each level to advance and unlock further levels. These goals include reaching a certain score through tricks and combos, performing special tricks, or collecting items. The eight levels (shown in isometric perspective) are filled with half- and quarter pipes, ramps, rails and many obstacles to perform tricks on. Two dozen different tricks are available through various button combinations, some of which must be unlocked first by finding tokens in the levels.
In training mode, unlocked levels can be practiced without the time limit present in career mode.
The game also offers a multiplayer mode, where up to four players can take turns on a single GBC and the player with the highest score or the best trick combo wins.

game.name: David Beckham Soccer
game.desc:
Compete in knockout and European Champions League competitions, or as any of the 200 teams with fully licensed players in a league season. You can also control up to 32 teams in knockout mode, and train with Beckham himself to learn the basics of the game.
Played from an overhead perspective, all of the options you would expect from a football game are available, from player formations to substitutions and more.

game.name: Deadly Skies
game.desc: ¿Alguna vez has estado gritando a Mach 2 y ordenando lanzar 6.000 libras de bombas sobre un objetivo no más grande que un Yugo? ¿O ha tenido la sensación de que varios bogeys se le acercaban a su cola para que un localizador le volara del cielo? Has sido contratado por un grupo de mercenarios para repostar, atar y apagar al enemigo. Y para endulzar la situación en este trato "Cuanto más saques, más te llevas a casa", puedes mejorar tu viaje, eligiendo entre más de 30 aviones diferentes para hacer el trabajo. ¿Te apuntas? ¡Entonces prepárate para tomar un poco de aire en serio!

game.path: ./Dear Daniel no Sweet Adventure - Kitty-chan o Sagashite (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Dear Daniel no Sweet Adventure - Kitty-chan o Saga
game.desc: The objective is for Daniel to meet Kitty. While jumping over enemies, he decides on moves by inputting commands and obtains points. The items you get in the mini-game will change your abilities.

game.name: Deer Hunter
game.desc: The popular pursuit of hunting comes to the portable screen in DEER HUNTER for the Game Boy Color. You play as a hunter looking to catch a nice trophy in one of four different areas using three different weapons. Hunt deer with a shotgun, a rifle, or a bow, using slightly different tactics with each. If you want to be successful, you'll have to use real-world hunting strategies. Search for droppings or other signs of movement to find the best area to wait in. Once there, use one of an assortment of tools to help you catch your prey: mask your odor with a cover scent, use a tree stand to camouflage yourself, or lure the deer with a powerful musk, a deer call, or an antler rattle. It's up to you to decide how to catch the deer; some methods are more efficient than others, so you'll have to find the one that works best for you. Detailed graphics and digitized sound round out the experience for would-be hunters.

game.name: Déjà Vu I & II : The Casebooks of Ace Harding
game.desc: The Casebooks of Ace Harding incluye versiones para Game Boy de Deja Vu: A Nightmare Comes True (publicado anteriormente en Game Boy) y Deja Vu 2: Lost in Las Vegas. Deja Vu es un port de un juego de 1987 que se había hecho para varios sistemas. Se trata de una clásica historia de detectives, en la que te despiertas junto a un cadáver con amnesia total: no sabes quién eres, ni cómo has llegado allí, y tampoco sabes quién es el cadáver. Deja Vu 2 nunca había sido lanzado para Game Boy, y se puso en el mismo cartucho, vendiéndose por el precio de un juego.

game.path: ./Deja Vu I & II - The Casebooks of Ace Harding (Europe) (En,Fr).zip
game.name: Déjà Vu I & II : The Casebooks of Ace Harding
game.desc: The Casebooks of Ace Harding incluye versiones para Game Boy de Deja Vu: A Nightmare Comes True (publicado anteriormente en Game Boy) y Deja Vu 2: Lost in Las Vegas. Deja Vu es un port de un juego de 1987 que se había hecho para varios sistemas. Se trata de una clásica historia de detectives, en la que te despiertas junto a un cadáver con amnesia total: no sabes quién eres, ni cómo has llegado allí, y tampoco sabes quién es el cadáver. Deja Vu 2 nunca había sido lanzado para Game Boy, y se puso en el mismo cartucho, vendiéndose por el precio de un juego.

game.name: Dejiko No Mahjong Party
game.desc: Dejiko, Puchiko, and rivals Usada and Piyocho make appearances. The game offers "win-win battles" and "free battle mode. Points earned from the "winner-takes-all" and "free battle" modes can be accumulated and used to purchase goods and treasures at Gamers in the game.

game.name: Denki Blocks!
game.desc: Denki Blocks! se juega moviendo los bloques por un tablero. Cuando los bloques del mismo color se tocan, se pegan para formar un grupo. El jugador tiene que unir todos los bloques del mismo color de cualquier manera posible. A veces hay que hacer grupos de formas específicas.

game.name: Densha De Go!
game.desc: Basado en el juego de arcade de 1996, Densha de Go! fue uno de los primeros juegos comerciales de simulación de conducción de trenes y generó numerosos sucesores. El jugador puede elegir entre una variedad de vías y trenes y luego tendrá que conducir el tren a las estaciones designadas mientras se apega a un cronograma ajustado, deteniéndose exactamente en las posiciones marcadas, obedeciendo todas las señales y señales y garantizando la seguridad y comodidad de los pasajeros. Cada vez que el jugador comete un error, los puntos se deducen de un contador que al comienzo de cada ronda se inicializa a un valor que depende de la dificultad seleccionada. Si llega a cero, el juego termina. Se destacan las siguientes líneas: 1. Línea principal de Sagano (línea Sanin) de Kameoka a Kioto 2. Línea Keihin-Tohoku de Shinagawa a Yokohama 3. Línea principal Tokaido (JR Kyoto Line) de Kioto a Osaka 4. Línea Yamanote (círculo interior) de Shibuya a la estación de Tokio 5. Tokaido Main Line EX de Takatsuki a Osaka, parte de la rápida Tokaido Main Line de la versión original, pero esta vez con paradas en cada estación (solo Windows) 6. Sagano Line EX de Kameoka a Kioto, sin el atajo de Saga-Arashiyama a Tambaguchi de la versión original (solo Windows)

game.name: Densha De Go! 2
game.desc: La secuela de 1998 del popular juego japonés de conducción de trenes de Taito se ha portado una vez más a varios sistemas domésticos. Por primera vez en PlayStation, es posible conducir a través de la nieve y tomar asiento en la cabina de un tren bala Shinkansen. La jugabilidad es más arcade que simulación. La atención se centra en detenerse en las estaciones en el momento y la posición perfectos, cumplir con el horario, obedecer las señales y los límites de velocidad y garantizar la seguridad y la comodidad de los pasajeros. Los errores dan como resultado que se deduzcan puntos de un contador. Si llega a 0, el juego termina. Las siguientes rutas están disponibles: 1. Línea Hokuhoku de Naoetsu a Uragawara 2. Tohoku Shinkansen de Morioka a Shin-Hanamaki 3. Akita Shinkansen de Akita a Omagari 4. Línea Keihin-Tohoku de Shinagawa a Ueno 5. Osaka Loop Line de Osaka a Tennoji (no en el Arcade original) 6. Línea principal de Kagoshima de Hakata a Kokura (solo en las versiones de PlayStation y Windows)

game.name: Dexter's Laboratory : Robot Rampage
game.desc:
Tu laboratorio se ha llenado de robots malvados. Depende de ti, como Dexter, abrirte camino a través de los diferentes niveles, recogiendo las herramientas necesarias para librar a tu laboratorio de la amenaza cibernética.
Usa pistolas láser y otras armas futuristas para ayudar a la causa de Dexter, mientras buscas puertas marcadas que contengan una nueva arma o uno de los elementos necesarios para completar el nivel.

game.name: Dino Breeder 3 - Gaia Fukkatsu
game.desc: This is the third installment of the dinosaur-breeding simulation. In this title, new species are not only registered in an illustrated book, but can also be taken on adventures together with the animals.

game.name: Dino Breeder 4
game.desc: This is the latest in the series, in which wild dinosaurs are captured and raised. This time, the number of dinosaurs that can work together has increased to five. Using the genes, a new species of dinosaur can be born.

game.name: Dinosaur
game.desc: Disney's Dinosaur is an adventure game based on the movie of the same name. You play as any of six different characters, each of which has different abilities. Abilities include pushing rocks, swimming, sprinting, jumping, climbing, tail attack and crushing rocks. There are 27 levels to play in in various prehistoric settings (lava, jungle, cliffs, desert, cave). You have to avoid or destroy hostile dinosaurs and collect health flowers to stay a live. You have to collect baby dinosaurs to score points.

game.name: Dinosaur'us
game.desc: Dinosaur'us is a Role-Playing game, developed by RFX Interactive and published by Electronic Arts, which was released in Europe in 2001.

game.name: Diva Starz : Mall Mania
game.desc: Únete a las Divas Alexa, Nikki, Tia y Summer en esta colección portátil de 6 minijuegos, de camino al desfile de moda. Los minijuegos incluyen: "The Scooter Spot", que es una simple rampa que golpea/evita obstáculos para cruzar al centro comercial. "The Fashion Spot", un juego de clasificación de cintas transportadoras, donde arrojas artículos en cajas. "The Music Spot", un juego de ritmo de Dance Dance Revolution simplificado. "The Snack Spot", una Torre de Hanoi se encuentra con un helado. "The Pet Shop", donde atrapas a una mascota en un simple laberinto. Y finalmente, "The Style Spot", donde vistes a tu Diva y combinas conjuntos de ropa.

game.name: Diva Starz : Mall Mania
game.desc: Únete a las Divas Alexa, Nikki, Tia y Summer en esta colección portátil de 6 minijuegos, de camino al desfile de moda. Los minijuegos incluyen: "The Scooter Spot", que es una simple rampa que golpea/evita obstáculos para cruzar al centro comercial. "The Fashion Spot", un juego de clasificación de cintas transportadoras, donde arrojas artículos en cajas. "The Music Spot", un juego de ritmo de Dance Dance Revolution simplificado. "The Snack Spot", una Torre de Hanoi se encuentra con un helado. "The Pet Shop", donde atrapas a una mascota en un simple laberinto. Y finalmente, "The Style Spot", donde vistes a tu Diva y combinas conjuntos de ropa.

game.name: Dogz : Your Virtual Petz Palz
game.desc: Are you looking to adopt a pet but lack the time or space to take care of a real one? Then you may find DOGZ to be of interest. Part of the small but popular virtual pet genre, DOGZ lets you adopt a dog from one of three breeds: Chihuahua, Scottie, or mutt. You can play with the pet first to decide if it's right for you. Once you've adopted the little gal or fella, it's up to you to take care of it: feed it, groom it, and play with it regularly if you want it to grow up to be a well-adjusted adult. If you mistreat your dog, though, your little pet will take off! Eventually, new breeds of dogs and new special toys will become available for you, depending on how well you do. You can even trade toys and breeds of dogs with your friends via the infrared link.

game.name: Dokapon! - Millennium Quest
game.desc: Gain experience and become the world's best adventurer in a dungeon where you can't leave until you've achieved your goal. Fight against your enemies in a rock-paper-scissors style with weapons that have the attributes of Goo, Choki, and Pah.

game.name: Doki X Doki Sasete!!
game.desc: The main character is a girl who joins a male idol group, and her goal is to make their dome concert in a year a success. The relationship with the members will change depending on the choices you make.

game.name: Dokidoki Densetsu - Mahoujin Guruguru
game.desc: An RPG based on the anime "Mahoujin Guruguru," in which players use magic circles combining four different systems and attributes to defeat monsters. Players can play against each other using cards.

game.name: Donald Duck : Quack Attack
game.desc:
You play as Donald in this 3D platform action game. Donald's girlfriend, Daisy is a reporter for a television station in Duckberg. While doing a story on the secret temple of the terrible magician Merlock, Daisy is kidnapped. Now, it is up to Donald to get her back. Along the way he will have help from his nephews, Huey, Dewey, and Louie, and the inventor Gyro Gearloose. He will also have competition from Gladstone Gander, who is also trying to save Daisy.
Game play alternates between side-scrolling running and jumping and 3D running and jumping. The side-scrolling levels play a lot like the Super Mario Bros. games. The 3D levels are more akin to the Crash Bandicoot series of games. All in all, there are 20 levels spread out through various areas.

game.name: Donald Duck : Quack Attack
game.desc:
You play as Donald in this 3D platform action game. Donald's girlfriend, Daisy is a reporter for a television station in Duckberg. While doing a story on the secret temple of the terrible magician Merlock, Daisy is kidnapped. Now, it is up to Donald to get her back. Along the way he will have help from his nephews, Huey, Dewey, and Louie, and the inventor Gyro Gearloose. He will also have competition from Gladstone Gander, who is also trying to save Daisy.
Game play alternates between side-scrolling running and jumping and 3D running and jumping. The side-scrolling levels play a lot like the Super Mario Bros. games. The 3D levels are more akin to the Crash Bandicoot series of games. All in all, there are 20 levels spread out through various areas.

game.name: Donald Duck : Quack Attack
game.desc:
You play as Donald in this 3D platform action game. Donald's girlfriend, Daisy is a reporter for a television station in Duckberg. While doing a story on the secret temple of the terrible magician Merlock, Daisy is kidnapped. Now, it is up to Donald to get her back. Along the way he will have help from his nephews, Huey, Dewey, and Louie, and the inventor Gyro Gearloose. He will also have competition from Gladstone Gander, who is also trying to save Daisy.
Game play alternates between side-scrolling running and jumping and 3D running and jumping. The side-scrolling levels play a lot like the Super Mario Bros. games. The 3D levels are more akin to the Crash Bandicoot series of games. All in all, there are 20 levels spread out through various areas.

game.name: Donkey Kong Country
game.desc: El rey K. Rool ha robado el alijo de plátanos de Donkey Kong, y Donkey Kong necesita tu ayuda para recuperarlos. En busca de K. Rool, su horda del Kremling impide tu progreso. Los Kremlings, criaturas parecidas a cocodrilos, incluyen Kritters (sucumben a un simple salto en la cabeza), Krushas (son virtualmente indestructibles) y otros. También hay otros enemigos que bloquean tu camino, como castores, serpientes, buitres. Liderándolos son jefes cobardes, incluidos Very Gnawty, Necky, Bumble B y Dumb Drum, y todos bloquean el camino con su propia mezcla especial de villanía. Donkey Kong se une a Diddy Kong: estos dos primates difieren significativamente. Por ejemplo, Donkey Kong es generalmente más fuerte; puede destruir a la mayoría de los enemigos con un solo salto y puede levantar barriles directamente sobre su cabeza para lanzarlos más lejos. Por otro lado, Diddy es más rápido y no tan fuerte como Donkey; puede correr muy rápido y hacer volteretas. Diddy lleva barriles frente a él, creando un escudo contra ataques frontales. El juego se divide en diferentes mundos, que se dividen en diferentes niveles. Cada nivel contiene áreas de bonificación, donde se pueden recolectar plátanos, medallones y vidas. Al final de cada mundo hay un jefe, que suele ser una versión más grande de un enemigo menor.

game.path: ./Donkey Kong 5 - The Journey of Over Time and Space (Taiwan) (En) (Unl).zip
game.name: Donkey Kong 5 - The Journey of Over Time and Space
Donkey Kong Country

game.path: ./Donkey Kong GB - Dinky Kong & Dixie Kong (Japan).zip
game.name: Donkey Kong GB - Dinky Kong & Dixie Kong
game.desc:
Una versión mejorada especial de Donkey Kong Land III para GameBoy Color lanzada exclusivamente en Japón.
Los anuncios de un concurso para encontrar el legendario Mundo Perdido, que se decía que había dominado las leyendas durante siglos, atrajeron a "aspirantes" a exploradores de todo el mundo para aprovechar la tan esperada oportunidad de fama y fortuna. Donkey Kong, Diddy Kong y Baron K. Roolenstein se enteran del concurso, y los Kong se disponen a dejar a Dixie Kong con su prima, Kiddy Kong. Dixie quiere demostrar que es tan valiosa como los demás participantes, por lo que decide participar en el concurso y lleva a Kiddy con ella. Kiddy no es tan consciente de lo que está pasando y decide seguir a Dixie a la jungla.

game.name: Doraemon - Aruke Aruke Labyrinth
game.desc: Doraemon: Aruke Aruke Labyrinth is an Action game, published by Epoch, which was released in Japan in 1999.

game.path: ./Doraemon - Kimi to Pet no Monogatari (Japan) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Doraemon - Kimi To Pet No Monogatari
game.desc: In this RPG featuring Doraemon and other familiar characters, players can use a combined friendship attack by meeting certain conditions and accumulating three "friendship points" during battle.

game.name: Doraemon Kart 2
game.desc: Doraemon Kart 2 is a Racing game, developed and published by Epoch, which was released in Japan in 1999.

game.path: ./Doraemon Memories - Nobita no Omoide Daibouken (Japan) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Doraemon Memories - Nobita No Omoide Daibouken
game.desc: Doraemon Memories: Nobi Dai no Omoi Izaru Daibouken is an Action game, developed by SAS Sakata and published by Epoch, which was released in Japan in 2000.

game.name: Doraemon No Quiz Boy
game.desc: A game in which you play quizzes with the well-known "Doraemon" character from anime and comics. There are 4,500 questions in a wide variety of genres, including study questions for elementary school students and miscellaneous questions about Doraemon.

game.name: Doraemon No Quiz Boy 2
game.desc: A quiz game for getting blue with Doraemon, containing over 5,000 study quizzes, with three levels of difficulty to choose from: low, middle and high grades. There are also Doraemon-like game features such as using secret tools to make quizzes easier.

game.path: ./Doraemon no Study Boy - Gakushuu Kanji Game (Japan).zip
game.name: Doraemon No Study Boy - Gakushuu Kanji Game
game.desc: This software allows students to master the reading and writing of 1006 kanji, which are learned in six years of elementary school. The software offers a series of reading, writing, and reading-writing exercises. When you answer a question correctly, Doraemon will teach you with a banzai. There is also a mini-game mode and a searchable dictionary function.

game.path: ./Doraemon no Study Boy - Kanji Yomikaki Master (Japan).zip
game.name: Doraemon No Study Boy - Kanji Yomikaki Master
game.desc: Doraemon learning game for elementary school students.nnThis game specializes in learning the "study kanji" learned in elementary school.

game.name: Doraemon No Study Boy - Kuku Game
game.desc: Software that allows you to master the ninety-nine while playing with Doraemon. There are three courses: "Basic Problems," in which there are ten 99 problems per level; "Applied Problems," in which you can try to answer questions about the number of multiplication and the number of multiplications; and "Master Course," in which 99 calculation problems are presented at random.

game.name: Doug's Big Game
game.desc: Doug makes his way to the videogame world with DOUG'S BIG GAME on Game Boy Color. You play Doug Funnie and his alter ego Quailman as you try to find your missing sweetheart, Patti Mayonnaise. You can also take on the role of your loyal pooch Porkchop, who also has own superhero alter ego: Quaildog. Solve the mystery of Patti's disappearance by searching the town of Bluffington for clues and write in your journal so you can refer to them later. Discover who is behind Patti's disappearance and her whereabouts by exploring 20 different environments from the popular TV show you're bound to bump into more than a few of the show's popular characters along the way. And don't forget to keep an eye open for power-ups that will increase Quailman's strength and powers. DOUG'S BIG GAME features detailed color graphics that bring the feel of the popular show right to the palm of your hand.

game.name: Doug's Big Game
game.desc: Doug makes his way to the videogame world with DOUG'S BIG GAME on Game Boy Color. You play Doug Funnie and his alter ego Quailman as you try to find your missing sweetheart, Patti Mayonnaise. You can also take on the role of your loyal pooch Porkchop, who also has own superhero alter ego: Quaildog. Solve the mystery of Patti's disappearance by searching the town of Bluffington for clues and write in your journal so you can refer to them later. DOUG'S BIG GAME features detailed color graphics that bring the feel of the popular show right to the palm of your hand.

game.path: ./Dr. Rin ni Kiitemite! - Koi no Rin Fuusui (Japan).zip
game.name: Dr. Rin Ni Kiitemite! - Koi No Rin Fuusui
game.desc: Based on the anime of the same name. Ask the anime's main character, Mingling, for feng shui advice to solve various problems. You can also enjoy feng shui fortune-telling and tarot reading.

game.name: Dracula : Crazy Vampire
game.desc:
The brotherhood of vampires is in mortal danger!
The Grand Inquisitor's hordes are on the vampires' trail determined to reduce them to dust. To prevent the destruction of these creatures of darkness, their prince, Dracula, must free his fellow vampires, held captive in 11 different countries, and defeat the terrifying Universal Monsters: Wolfman, Swamp Thing and The Mummy.
How will the 'Crazy Vampire' fare aided only by bats and a touch of madness?!
- A spooky yet hilarious action/adventure game sure to challenge you until the end! - Vanquish your enemies by paralyzing them with your bats, and then stealing their energy, in true vampire fashion, by sucking their blood. - Explore different places including: dark cemeteries, eerie forests, mysterious swamps and Egyptian tombs - each more challenging than the last!

game.path: ./Dragon Ball Z - Densetsu no Chou Senshi-tachi (Japan).zip
game.name: Dragon Ball Z : Legendary Super Warriors
game.desc: Dragon Ball Z: Legendary Super Warriors es una mezcla de un juego de cartas y un juego de lucha por turnos para Game Boy Color. El juego se juega con cartas originales del juego para ataques, técnicas y elementos de apoyo, y inicialmente solo tiene dos modos de comercio e historia. La legendaria historia de Super Warriors ™ abarca desde la saga Saiyayin hasta el final de la Saga Buu. Una vez derrotado, se desbloquea un modo de batalla, lo que permite a los jugadores enfrentarse con enemigos aleatorios. Una vez que se supera el juego, cualquier personaje puede usarse en cualquier batalla, como Freezer vs. Cell.

game.name: Dragon Ball Z : Legendary Super Warriors
game.desc: Dragon Ball Z: Legendary Super Warriors es una mezcla de un juego de cartas y un juego de lucha por turnos para Game Boy Color. game.name: Dragon Dance
game.desc: Addictive breakout-style action meets fast and furious arcade fun. With 100 levels, challenging end bosses and multiple power-ups, Dragon Dance is the game you can't put down! Head-to-head combat with boss enemies every 10th level. Random events like earthquakes shake up the gameplay. Dragon control and length add to the complexity of each puzzle. Enjoy Vs. mode and play with friends via Game Link Cable.

game.name: Dragon Quest I & II
game.desc:
Compilación de las dos primeras partes de Dragon Quest, llamado Dragon Warrior fuera de Europa.
La primera entrega te lanza a la refriega con poco más que un casco con cuernos, la ropa que llevas puesta y la generosidad de los ciudadanos de Alefgard. Mientras te mueves de pueblo en pueblo, luchando contra monstruos y recolectando oro, los detalles de tu misión para derrotar al Señor de los Dragones comenzarán a revelarse.
La segunda entrega tiene lugar muchos años después de la derrota del Señor de los Dragones. Los monstruosos ejércitos de Hargon han roto una era de paz y tranquilidad, e invaden el Castillo Moonbrook para asesinar al rey. Como Príncipe de Lorasia, tendrás que viajar por el mundo en busca de aventureros con ideas afines y luego partir con tu grupo para evitar que Hargon resucite a tus enemigos.

game.name: Dragon Warrior III
game.desc: Your father, the brave Ortega, is dead. He set off to destroy the Demon Lord Baramos but fell in glorious battle. Unless stopped, Baramos will unleash a torrent of evil that will destroy the world. You must stop Baramos and discover the legend of Dragon Warrior! Your journey starts on Aliahan. Only you decide where it ends...

game.name: Dragon Warrior Monsters
game.desc: En Dragon Warrior Monsters entras en Terry's Wonderland, un lugar mágico de reyes, monstruos y hechizos mágicos. Convierte a los monstruos en tus aliados para abrirte camino a través de los peligros de tu búsqueda. Entra al País de las Maravillas para rescatar a tu hermana secuestrada. Cada monstruo tiene habilidades individuales para ser utilizadas en la batalla. Entrenas y los crías para construir tu colección de monstruos. Con miles de combinaciones posibles de monstruos, ¿Podras criar los monstruos más raros y poderosos? El juego tiene lugar en su propio pequeño mundo de juegos de rol de fantasía, y algo parecido al estilo de Pokémon

game.path: ./Dragon Quest Monsters - Terry no Wonderland (Japan) (Rev 1) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Dragon Warrior Monsters
game.desc: En Dragon Warrior Monsters entras en Terry's Wonderland, un lugar mágico de reyes, monstruos y hechizos mágicos. Convierte a los monstruos en tus aliados para abrirte camino a través de los peligros de tu búsqueda. Entra al País de las Maravillas para rescatar a tu hermana secuestrada. Cada monstruo tiene habilidades individuales para ser utilizadas en la batalla. Entrenas y los crías para construir tu colección de monstruos. Con miles de combinaciones posibles de monstruos, ¿Podras criar los monstruos más raros y poderosos? El juego tiene lugar en su propio pequeño mundo de juegos de rol de fantasía, y algo parecido al estilo de Pokémon

game.path: ./Dragon Quest Monsters 2 - Maruta no Fushigi na Kagi - Iru no Bouken (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Dragon Warrior Monsters 2 : Cobi's Journey
game.desc: Al igual que el original Dragon Warrior Monsters para Game Boy Color, Dragon Warrior Monsters 2: Cobi's Journey combina temas y personajes de la larga serie Dragon Warriors de Enix con aspectos del juego establecidos en los sorprendentemente populares juegos de Pokémon. El jugador toma el papel de Cobi y se embarca en una nueva aventura de recolección de monstruos, entrenamiento y combate. El juego complementario, Dragon Warrior Monsters 2: Tara's Adventure, sigue las aventuras de la hermana de Cobi.

game.path: ./Dragon Quest Monsters 2 - Maruta no Fushigi na Kagi - Ruka no Tabidachi (Japan) (Rev 1) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Dragon Warrior Monsters 2 : Cobi's Journey
game.desc: Al igual que el original Dragon Warrior Monsters para Game Boy Color, Dragon Warrior Monsters 2: Cobi's Journey combina temas y personajes de la larga serie Dragon Warriors de Enix con aspectos del juego establecidos en los sorprendentemente populares juegos de Pokémon. El jugador toma el papel de Cobi y se embarca en una nueva aventura de recolección de monstruos, entrenamiento y combate. El juego complementario, Dragon Warrior Monsters 2: Tara's Adventure, sigue las aventuras de la hermana de Cobi.

game.name: Dragon Tales : Dragon Adventures
game.desc: Nos vamos a Dragon Land con tus amigos favoritos de Dragon Tales. Desea en Dragon Scale y te llevarán rápidamente a Dragon Land. Luego elige tu aventura entre cinco historias diferentes llenas de diversión. ¡Mientras busca cupcakes, gemas y notas musicales de Dragon Berry, viajará a lugares mágicos como Puzzlewood en Crystal Caves! ¡Así que toma tu Dragon Scale y vámonos!

game.name: Dragon Tales : Dragon Wings
game.desc: The popular animated television series is now a magical hand-held game! You take on the role of a dragon that has yet to learn the secrets of flight in this exciting adventure. You'll attend Quetzal's School in the Sky, where you'll practice your wing flapping, hovering, treasure carrying, and breathing. Once your confidence is high and your skills honed, you'll enter the enchanted Dragon Land, where all sorts of mischief awaits you. Journey through 15 levels of difficult obstacles and dangerous terrain, meeting up with a few friendly faces straight out of the television show along your path. There are three difficulty levels to choose from, so gamers at all skill levels can get in on the action. The game is only intended for one player, but you can always complete a game and then challenge a friend to match your progress. Learning to fly has never been so fun or safe.

game.name: Dragon Quest I & II
game.desc:
Compilación de las dos primeras partes de Dragon Quest, llamado Dragon Warrior fuera de Europa.
La primera entrega te lanza a la refriega con poco más que un casco con cuernos, la ropa que llevas puesta y la generosidad de los ciudadanos de Alefgard. Mientras te mueves de pueblo en pueblo, luchando contra monstruos y recolectando oro, los detalles de tu misión para derrotar al Señor de los Dragones comenzarán a revelarse.
La segunda entrega tiene lugar muchos años después de la derrota del Señor de los Dragones. game.path: ./Dragon Warrior Monsters 2 - Cobi's Journey (USA) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Dragon Warrior Monsters 2 : Cobi's Journey
game.desc: Al igual que el original Dragon Warrior Monsters para Game Boy Color, Dragon Warrior Monsters 2: Cobi's Journey combina temas y personajes de la larga serie Dragon Warriors de Enix con aspectos del juego establecidos en los sorprendentemente populares juegos de Pokémon. El jugador toma el papel de Cobi y se embarca en una nueva aventura de recolección de monstruos, entrenamiento y combate. El juego complementario, Dragon Warrior Monsters 2: Tara's Adventure, sigue las aventuras de la hermana de Cobi.

game.path: ./Dragon Warrior Monsters 2 - Tara's Adventure (USA) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Dragon Warrior Monsters 2 : Tara's Adventure
game.desc: Like the original Dragon Warrior Monsters for the Game Boy Color, Dragon Warrior Monsters 2: Tara's Adventure combines themes and characters from Enix' long-running Dragon Warrior series with aspects of gameplay established in the amazingly popular Pokémon handheld games. Players take on the role of Tara as she embarks on a new adventure of monster collecting, training, and combat. A concurrently released companion game, Dragon Warrior Monsters 2: Cobi's Journey, follows the similar adventures of Tara's brother.

game.name: Dragon's Lair
game.desc:
Los jugadores controlan a Dirk el Intrépido, un caballero en su misión de rescatar a la princesa Daphne del malvado dragón Singe. Deben encontrar el camino a través del castillo de un mago loco, luchando y esquivando trampas todo el camino.
Esta conversión del clásico arcade de 1983 está casi completa, menos una o dos escenas de animación, así como algunos archivos de sonido, reemplazados por sus versiones MIDI. Pero la jugabilidad sigue siendo la misma, presiona los botones correctos para continuar a lo largo de la historia, hasta que Dirk derrote a todo el mal que se interponga en su misión de salvar a la Princesa Daphne.

game.name: Driver
game.desc: En Driver, eres el conductor en una serie de persecuciones de coches al estilo de Hollywood. Un gran piloto es tan bueno como lo sea su coche, por lo que dispones de una selección de muscle cars de gran rendimiento, con un manejo y físicas muy realistas , y un gran detalle en la recreación de daños en el vehículo. El juego cuenta con un modo de repetición/director que ofrece todas las herramientas necesarias para grabar tu propia persecución, y múltiples vistas que te permiten mirar a tu alrededor mientras conduces. Aprieta el acelerador y sé el mejor conductor.

game.name: Driver
game.desc: En Driver, eres el conductor en una serie de persecuciones de coches al estilo de Hollywood. Un gran piloto es tan bueno como lo sea su coche, por lo que dispones de una selección de muscle cars de gran rendimiento, con un manejo y físicas muy realistas , y un gran detalle en la recreación de daños en el vehículo. El juego cuenta con un modo de repetición/director que ofrece todas las herramientas necesarias para grabar tu propia persecución, y múltiples vistas que te permiten mirar a tu alrededor mientras conduces. Aprieta el acelerador y sé el mejor conductor.

game.name: Dropzone
game.desc:
Dropzone was the first game to propel Archer Maclean to stardom. The game, originally written for the 8-bit Ataris, is basically a Defender clone, but popular because it so closely recreates the gameplay of the original Defender, with its speedy scrolling and frantic gameplay.
The player is a spaceman with a jet-pack, flying across a barren landscape whose skies are inhabited by a number of different aliens; from the simple Planter to the slowly advancing Blunder Storm or the quick, aggressive Nemesite.
Planters and Nemesites will try to pickup the small men walking on the surface, who must then be rescued. You must shoot down the alien, while avoiding to hit the man. Sometimes, the aliens will carry an android, which is similar to the human but deadly. Care must be taken so as to not pick up the androids. All men must be transported to a surface base, where they are put in safety. This is the Dropzone.

game.name: Dt - Lords Of Genomes
game.desc: Become a "DT Master" who can materialize collected data, defeat enemies, and solve numerous mysteries. The battle against enemies unfolds through card battles.

game.name: Duke Nukem
game.desc:
Duke Nukem se ha hecho famoso y ha atraído la atención de los Zorgonitas. Los zorgonitas quieren secuestrar a Duke para que lidere sus ejércitos y conquistar el universo.
La jugabilidad es la clásica de un plataformas y disparos en el que puedes caminar, disparar, saltar, subir escaleras, colgarte de las repisas, gatear, pero también montar vehículos como un tanque y una nave espacial. Tienes que evitar enemigos y entornos peligrosos a través de niveles que te llevarán a bordo de una nave espacial Zorgonita, la luna, Los Ángeles y otros lugares.
El juego cuenta con 12 armas utilizables, incluido un lanzallamas, una bazuca y una ametralladora. Otros potenciadores incluyen armaduras corporales, paquetes de salud y vidas extra.

game.path: ./Dukes of Hazzard, The - Racing for Home (Europe) (En,Fr,De).zip
game.name: The Dukes of Hazzard : Racing for Home
game.desc: The Dukes of Hazzard is an action and racing game on Gameboy. You find yourself at the helm of the famous General Lee and embark on a chase with Rosco P. Coltrane who is determined to get his hands on the Dukes. 27 missions and 9 different terrains including Hazzard County are waiting for you.

game.name: Dungeon Savior
game.desc: The objective is to send troops to each other's dungeons and defeat the enemy boss first. Place various traps to dodge attacks and invade the enemy's dungeon with your powerful troops.

game.name: Dx Jinsei Game
game.desc: Game Boy version of the popular board game. The "Life Game Island" that appears when the main game is completed develops the more the main game is played, and various mini-games can be enjoyed.

game.name: Dx Monopoly Gb
game.desc: Software that allows 1~4 players to enjoy Monopoly, a typical orthodox board game. Although it takes time to complete the game, the game can be saved at any time, and the play history is displayed when the game is resumed.

game.name: DynaMike
game.desc: DynaMike is a puzzle game where you have to defuse bombs by changing blocks' colors so that the left image matches the right one, which must be done against a timer and in a given number of moves. To help, you can undo your previous move a certain number of times in each puzzle.

game.name: E.T. : The Extra-Terrestrial, Digital Companion
game.desc: If you have any doubt as to E.T.'s ability to help you get organized, witness the stunning efficiency with which he expressed his desperate need to make a phone call. There's no need for a separate digital organizer anymore, as you can now keep track of your life on a Game Boy Color. Everyone's favorite little alien being provides a calendar, an address book, a working clock, and even a "to-do" list that will keep young science fiction fans motivated and productive. There are even five mini-games included, several of which involves helping the titular mascot evade the authorities and collect the necessary items to construct an inter-global telephone system. One of the games challenges you to raise a "Flopgopple" pet, and all of the options are compatible with the Nintendo Game Boy Printer. Kids can even protect all of their personal data with the use of an original password. Now, that's organization.

game.path: ./E.T. - The Extra-Terrestrial - Escape from Planet Earth (USA).zip
game.name: E.T. The Extra Terrestrial : Escape from Planet Earth
game.desc: Tu misión igual que en la película es construir un intercomunicador para que ET pueda llamar y regresar a casa. En esta versión tienes que investigar 60 entornos para encontrar todos los componentes necesarios para construir el transmisor. Todo el tiempo tienes que evadir a los agentes del gobierno y evitar las trampas. Puedes jugar alternativamente como Elliot o como ET, cuyos poderes extraordinarios, incluida la levitación, pueden ayudarte a salir de las muchas situaciones difíciles a las que te enfrentarás.

game.path: ./E.T. - The Extra-Terrestrial and the Cosmic Garden (USA).zip
game.name: E.T. : The Extra-Terrestrial and the Cosmic Garden
game.desc:
Blast off with E.T. on a journey back to his home planet. Your mission is to help E.T. complete the Cosmic Garden! Be prepared to work on E.T.'s space ship laboratory with wacky, strange and crazy plant species you create by growing and cross-pollinating alien seedlings. Get help from E.T.'s silly friends the Space Bee and Space Slug. It's not easy... you'll be faced with adverse growing conditions that test your ability to adapt and overcome surprise situations. Make enough different plants to earn E.T.'s ultimate treasure - The Prize Garden!
*12 exciting levels and 7 environments take you to 6 planets *Over 60 plants to create *Crazy alien plants that sing, dance, jump, emit light, electricity and more *Use resources wisely as they run out! *Complete the game to win the never-ending Prize Garden

game.path: ./Earthworm Jim - Menace 2 the Galaxy (USA, Europe) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Earthworm Jim : Menace 2 the Galaxy
game.desc:
Earthworm Jim se enfrenta a 12 niveles de malos mientras explora su dormitorio. Está lejos de las aventuras contra Psy-Crow, pero hay muchos seres malvados debajo de la cama que son igual de peligrosos.
Es una aventura completamente nueva, que utiliza elementos similares a los 2 juegos de plataforma Earthworm Jim anteriores en SNES. Muchos de sus locos ataques están aquí con algunos extras adicionales, además del regreso del profesor Mono por cabeza.

game.name: ECW Hardcore Revolution
game.desc: Esta versión de Hardcore Revolution es diferente de sus contrapartes de consola. Esta versión tiene diez luchadores para elegir: Mike Awesome, Balls Mahoney, Justin Credible, Tommy Dreamer, Jerry Lynn, Raven, Sabu, Lance Storm, Tajiri, Rob Van Dam, cada uno con su propio movimiento final característico junto con el conjunto estándar como puñetazos, patadas, suplex y movimientos de tensor. Hay cinco modos diferentes para elegir: 1. Desafío: donde un jugador elige un luchador y se enfrenta a una ola interminable de oponentes. 2. Carrera: donde el jugador luchará contra una serie de oponentes en una búsqueda para convertirse en Campeón de ECW. 3. Modo Vs: donde el jugador lucha contra otros oponentes en un solo partido. 4. Alambre de púas: un combate regular, solo con alambre de púas en lugar de cuerdas de lucha regulares 5. Entrenamiento: donde los jugadores pueden aprender los movimientos de sus luchadores.

game.name: Elevator Action EX
game.desc: Elevator Action EX has the same gameplay style as the original, only with a few differences. As Mike, Guy, or Sarah, you must obtain all secret documents, keys, and discs that are behind closed doors marked with a white exclamation mark. There are also doors with question marks which have different weapons behind them, as well as an extra health bar. Once you obtained all the items within the building, you will have to go through the building in the opposite direction twice before facing all your opponents in one room. Once you have done this, you move on to the next one, that has tougher enemies than the last one. You will always start at each building with the same weapon.

game.name: Elie No Atelier Gb
game.desc: The latest in the popular RPG series, in which users gather materials and mix them to create a variety of items. The objective is to train fairies to become full-fledged alchemists while completing requests.

game.name: Emperor's New Groove, The
game.desc: What would you do if someone turned you into a llama? Based on the animated film from Disney, THE EMPEROR'S NEW GROOVE casts you in the role of a young Incan ruler named Kuzco. When the evil Yzma turns Kuzco into a llama, our hero must make his way through eight action-packed levels in order to return to his archenemy for the ultimate showdown. That will require jumping gaps, negotiating moving platforms, breaking down barriers, unlocking closed doors, and more. Of course, all of Yzma's dastardly minions will be after you, but you'll have a variety of attacks to thwart their efforts including spitting! Along your path, you'll collect red and gold coins, water jugs, and plenty of Aztec coins. There'll be lots of obstacles along the way (watch out for scorpions!), but with your wits, skills, and reflexes, you might just have a chance at defeating your enemies and returning to the life that's rightfully yours. Good luck, llama!

game.name: ESPN International Track & Field
game.desc: ESPN INTERNATIONAL TRACK & FIELD brings all the excitement of a real athletic contest to Game Boy Color. Try to win the gold medal in 12 different events including fencing, skeet shooting, the 100-meter dash, the long jump, the javelin toss, 100-meter freestyle swimming, 110-meter hurdles, the high jump, weightlifting, the pole vault, the gymnastics vault, and table tennis. Each event requires a mix of speed, stamina, and timing to succeed itâ€™s all about the button mashing! Can you win all the events and become the ultimate champion? Full-colored, detailed graphics bring the knuckle-busting action to life. Use the Game Boy Link Cable to hook up with a friend and challenge him or her to a two-player contest to see who can win the most medals. This game includes battery backup to save all your high scores and world records.

game.name: ESPN National Hockey Night
game.desc: Exciting NHL action comes to the Game Boy Color with ESPN NATIONAL HOCKEY NIGHT. Since the game is fully licensed by the NHL, all of the teams (including the expansion Columbus Blue Jackets and Minnesota Wild) and players are here. When you want a quick puck fix, play a single game in the Exhibition mode. True hockey fanatics will want to take all of the challenges of a full Season, but if you're not interested in hockey until it's Cup time, you can skip the season and go straight to the Playoffs. If you think you are as good as anyone in the NHL, you can even put yourself into the game with the Create-a-Player mode. Now you can literally get into the game with ESPN NATIONAL HOCKEY NIGHT.

game.name: Lufia : The Legend Returns
game.desc: Lufia: The Legend Returns es un juego de rol. Tienes que luchar contra las fuerzas del mal en una mazmorra de 200 pisos. Puedes luchar contra los monstruos en batallas por turnos y un equipo de nueve compañeros.

game.name: European Super League
game.desc:
Sporting 16 fully licensed team and stadium endorsements, European Super League brings together the talent from many teams in Europe to create a 'European Super League Championship'.
PRODUCT FEATURES:
1. Entries from clubs such as AC Milan, Bayern Munich, Marseille, Liverpool, Chelsea and Paris Saint Germain
2. Stadiums are modelled to real-life specifications
3. Control interface when played in novice mode is limited to simple button combinations, allowing for a newcomer to play the game more easily; for the advanced gamer, the alternate mode, although more complex and demanding, will give them improved control over the game
4. Authentic crowd chants

game.name: Evel Knievel
game.desc: Follow in the tire tracks of America's most beloved stuntman, Evel Knievel! Experience Evel's live-on-the-edge lifestyle as you pull off death-defying feats ordinary men only dream of! With all the stunts, all the excitement, and none of the broken bones, you control the actions of the most daring man in history!

game.name: Extreme Ghostbusters
game.desc: In an attempt to takeover the world, the newly liberated and powerful ectoplasmic forces, led by the half-human, half-demo Count Mercharior, have kidnapped two key members of the Extreme Ghostbusters team. Without wasting a second, Eduardo and Kylie jump into the famous Ecto-1 ambulance and race off to the rescue... Play as Eduardo and Kylie as you uncover the clues to the kidnapping, confront the evil Count Mercharior and return your teammates, Roland and Garrett, to safety!

game.path: ./Extreme Sports with the Berenstain Bears (USA, Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It).zip
game.name: Extreme Sports with the Berenstain Bears
game.desc: Get extreme with Mama, Papa, Brother, and Sister Bear in their first Game Boy Color game, EXTREME SPORTS WITH THE BERENSTAIN BEARS! In this single-player game you'll control the members of the family as they participate in an assortment of extreme sports events. Use Brother or Sister Bear in kayaking, dirt boarding, biking, and luge, or take the whole family in the river rafting and toboggan sequences. All of the events take place from an overhead perspective, which provides the best view of the playing field. In each event you can perform a wild range of tricks and stunts to gain speed and shave seconds off the clock. Can you beat the high scores and become the best bear you can be? Well-animated characters set on colorful, detailed backgrounds ensure a bright presentation.

game.name: F-1 World Grand Prix
game.desc:
F-1 World Grand Prix es un juego de carreras de Fórmula 1 para Game Boy Color, basado en el título de Nintendo 64. La iteración de Game Boy Color presenta una licencia oficial de la temporada de 1998 y, por tanto, los 11 equipos, pilotos y pistas auténticos de ese año.
