A diferencia de la versión de Nintendo 64, el juego es completamente en 2D y se ve desde una perspectiva de 3ª persona.
El juego trata de ofrecer la experiencia de carrera más realista en una portátil de su tiempo. Puedes ajustar manualmente muchos aspectos del coche antes de cada carrera, como la transmisión, los tipos de engranajes y neumáticos y la alineación de los alerones.
El juego cuenta con cinco modos de juego (Gran Premio, Exhibición, Desafío, Contrarreloj y Dos Jugadores), dos ajustes de dificultad y permite tres partidas guardadas por separado. Puedes activar y desactivar los daños y los diferentes tipos de clima.

game.name: F-18 Thunder Strike
game.desc: Supersonic jet dogfighting comes to the small screen in F-18 THUNDERSTRIKE for the Game Boy Color. In this one-player flight sim, you take the role of a daring pilot who's flying an elite fighter jet. Slide into an inside-the-cockpit view, battle against multiple enemies, and practice your aerial combat and evasion maneuvers to prove your air superiority. You can play in either Arcade or Simulation mode, each affording you a unique experience. Arcade mode offers looser controls that make things easier for rookie pilots, while experts will want to jump right into Simulation mode, which will challenge the ability of even the most experienced flyboy. Head into multiple missions of dogfighting action and perform aerial tricks that will break the sound barrier, but don't think that it's all fun and games. When the mission's complete, you'll have to carefully land your jet on an aircraft carrier.

game.name: The F.A. Premier League Stars 2001
game.desc: La versión de Game Boy Color de Stars 2001 se basa muy libremente en el juego de PC/Playstation con el mismo nombre. Gran parte de lo que hizo que el especial original se haya ido. Por ejemplo, se eliminó todo el concepto de Star Points, que era una parte tan importante del juego de consola. Left es un juego de fútbol con un estilo bastante ordinario. Debido a la licencia de la Premier League, los veinte equipos son reales y tienen jugadores del mundo real (16 en cada equipo). El modo de juego se asemeja al estilo de muchos juegos clásicos del género y se ve desde una perspectiva de arriba hacia abajo. Los modos de juego disponibles son partido amistoso, temporada completa o una liga personalizada a elección de los jugadores.

game.name: F1 Championship Season 2000
game.desc: F1 CHAMPIONSHIP Season 2000, featuring all the drama, action, and emotion of the 2000 season, takes the player right to the heart of the thrilling world of Formula One racing. Re-live the gladiatorial battles between Michael Schumacher and David Coulthard or tear up the record books and take an outsider to World Championship glory. In-depth behind the scenes technical support from the Orange Arrows and Benetton Formula One teams allows the game player to enter the world of Formula One racing in unprecedented detail and authenticity.

game.name: F1 Racing Championship
game.desc:
F1 Racing Championship is a a Formula One racing game. Like its counterpart on the PC and consoles the game has an official license for the 1999 season and features all drivers, cars and tracks from that season.
The game allows for a first person cockpit view of the races. The season can be played in arcade and simulation mode. In the latter mode the player is responsible for adjusting his car before each race.

game.path: ./F1 World Grand Prix II for Game Boy Color (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es).zip
game.name: F1 World Grand Prix II for Game Boy Color
game.desc:
The Fastest Drivers Gathered Here! '99 version of the "F1 World Grand Prix" starts now !
- Play as one of the 11 officially licensed FOA teams and choose from 16 circuits. - Five modes of play, including Grand Prix and Challenge modes, where you compete in the actual '99 racing season ! - F1 World Grand Prix II takes full advantage of the colors available with detailed attention to everything from the color of your car to the scenery of the circuit.

game.path: ./Fairy Kitty no Kaiun Jiten - Yousei no Kuni no Uranai Shugyou (Japan) (Rev 1) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Fairy Kitty no Kaiun Jiten - Yousei no Kuni no Ura
game.desc: The popular Sanrio character "Kitty-chan" performs fortune-telling using Chinese "I-Ching" (fortune-telling). Kitty's level increases as she plays mini-games and tells fortunes, and the number of things she can tell you increases.

game.path: ./Feng Kuang A Gei III - Chaoji Zhadan Ren (Taiwan) (Unl).zip
game.name: Bomberman 3
Ferret Monogatari
game.desc: Software for raising popular pets, ferrets. While feeding, cleaning, and taking care of your ferret, you can also play dress-up and mini-games. As your ferret's abilities improve, you can aim to win prizes in the "Ferret Show.

game.name: FIFA 2000
game.desc: Brace yourself for a soccer game that brings all of the wild fun of soccer home on your Game Boy Color! FIFA 2000 is a fully-licensed soccer game that has more than 60 teams from around the world with updated rosters appropriate to the 2000 season. You can choose to play one of five different gameplay modes. Exhibition mode is a quick game where you set the teams and the rules then hit the field. In Tournament mode, you'll square off against an assortment of other teams to see who can take home the final victory. Playoff mode has you playing the final teeth-to-the-grindstone matches where every victory counts. In League mode, you'll play through a full season that culminates in the playoffs to see who is the greatest. Finally, Indoor mode takes the game inside and changes up the rules a little bit, resulting in a fast-paced version of the original. Options available for every mode include weather settings, foul settings, wind, and more. You can also use the password to save all of your stats in League and Tournament modes.

game.name: The Fish Files
game.desc: En The Fish Files, juegas como Dante, un estudiante universitario en busca de su pez secuestrado, Ramada. Este es un juego tradicional de aventuras point-and-click basado en inventario al estilo de los clásicos de LucasArts. La búsqueda de Dante lo llevará por la universidad y la ciudad, así como a varios períodos de tiempo diferentes, en los que juegas como dos de los otros estudiantes universitarios cuyos peces también han desaparecido.

game.name: Fix & Foxi : Episode 1 Lupo
game.desc: In Fix & Foxi - Episode 1 Lupo you must help the plucky and cool Lupo on his incredible adventure to make it through the enchanted lands and out the other side alive and in one piece! You only have a certain amount of lives to make it through each level so tread wisely and jump on all the enemies to eliminate them and collect the precious coins they leave behind!

game.name: The Flintstones : Burgertime in Bedrock
game.desc: The restaurant business meets prehistoric times in this combination of classic video gaming and old-fashioned cartoon mayhem. Mr. Slate has purchased himself a Brontoburger chain, and Fred has been saddled with the unenviable task of playing chef. It seems that the restaurant has come with a pre-existing problem, though: pests! Run from counter to counter, trying to build sandwiches for the hungry customers, avoiding attacks from the flying beasties all the while. Interestingly, the kitchen is also outfitted with a bunch of platforms and ladders which means you'll have your share of climbing to tackle as well. Lose all of your lives and you're out of a job (resulting in more time at home with the ingratiating Bam-Bam). The graphics and humor are perfect representations of the original cartoon, and the game plays much like the coin-operated BURGERTIME. Play alone or use a link cable to hook up with a friend to see who has the fastest food preparation skills in Bedrock.

game.name: Flipper & Lopaka
game.desc:
Flipper & Lopaka is a licensed side-scroller based on the Australian cartoon of the same name. The premise of the show is that Flipper the dolphin has taught Lopaka (a native Pacific islander boy) the secrets of the ocean, allowing him to survive underwater for long periods and communicate with sea life. Together the two must usually stop the evil plans of Dexter, a mean octopus.
The game has you trade off between the two characters: Lopaka must find a magic crystal in his sprawling platforming levels, then Flipper must take the crystal and place it on an altar in his Ecco the Dolphin-style levels. Flipper also handles the boss fights, and the bonus levels that are accessed by collecting 100 pearls.

game.name: Force 21
game.desc: Es el año 2015 y China está invadiendo Rusia en busca de más recursos. En su camino está la "Fuerza 21" estadounidense. Toma cualquier bando en este RTS 3D. No hay unidad de edificio. Lo que tienes es con lo que tienes que trabajar. Dirige más de 40 unidades diferentes de combate de alta tecnología en 30 campañas para un jugador y 10 mapas multijugador. Hasta 4 jugadores pueden unirse a la acción multijugador. Edita tus propios mapas y misiones con el editor incluido.

game.name: Formula One 2000
game.desc:
The action in Formula One 2000 takes place at the seventeen circuits that constitute this season's championship including, for the first time in many years, the legendary Indianapolis track in America.
Will the 'Flying Finn' Mika Hakkinen become only the second driver in history to win a third consecutive Formula One world drivers' championship or will 'Mr Cool' Michael Schumacher stop him in his tracks? Or can rookie Jenson Button defy all expectations and take the championship in his first season? Only You, the Player, can decide!

game.name: Fort Boyard
game.desc:
Based on the international game TV show of the same name which first became popular in France in the early 1990s.
Teams of 4 players compete in physical and mental challenges to earn keys that unlock a trove of prizes. Players meet famous Fort Boyard characters and animals in various situations.

game.name: Freestyle Scooter
game.desc: If they're so cool in real life, can you even imagine what they can do in a video game? The popular razor scooters now have their own GBC title, and it's one intense ride. Choose your rig from a variety of available scooters, and then head out to rescue your friends from the clutches an evil robot named Norton. Your style and skills are the only things that can save the day, so get moving! There are 10 cool characters to play as each with unique abilities and shortcomings and 45 cool maneuvers to pull off. Packed with awesome graphics and realistic action, RAZOR FREESTYLE SCOOTER challenges you to grind ledges, jump barrels, and perform tricks like no-footers, tailwhips, and supermen. Each level is loaded with difficult obstacles and hidden bonuses, and the controls are refreshingly simple to learn. If you're looking for a great take on this popular new sport, you've found it. Play alone or take on a friend.

game.name: Frogger
game.desc:
Tu misión en esta conversión de arcade es guiar a una rana a través de una carretera y un río traicioneros, y ponerla a salvo en la parte superior de la pantalla. Ambas secciones están plagadas de una variedad de peligros, cada uno de los cuales matará a la rana y le costará una vida.
La carretera está llena de coches y camiones, a velocidades variables. El agua del río en sí es fatal, al igual que las serpientes que se ciernen sobre niveles posteriores. Frogger debe subirse a los troncos, las tortugas (que salen a la superficie poco tiempo) y los caimanes (¡pero mantenerse alejados de su boca!), y luego saltar a una de las casillas libres, idealmente una que contenga una mosca para obtener puntos adicionales. Una vez que se han llenado todas las casillas, pasa al siguiente nivel, más dificil que el anterior.

game.name: Frogger 2
game.desc: La segunda parte del famoso juego de acción y plataformas se pone más dificil que nunca para Frogger y su nueva amiga, Lillie Frog. Ayúdalos a salvar a los bebés rana de Swampy el cocodrilo.

game.path: ./From TV Animation One Piece - Maboroshi no Grand Line Boukenki! (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: From TV Animation One Piece - Maboroshi no Grand L
game.desc: The motif is based on the anime "ONE PIECE". Choose five of your friends to fight against the enemy. If you take damage in events and battles and adrenaline builds up, you can perform special moves.

game.path: ./From TV Animation One Piece - Yume no Luffy Kaizokudan Tanjou! (Japan) (Rev 1) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: From TV Animation One Piece - Yume no Luffy Kaizok
game.desc: An adventure based on a popular anime. Move around the map by ship, and create your own map by completing events and battles. The story will change depending on the route you take.

game.name: Sgt. Rock : On the Frontline
game.desc: The American way is no laughing matter, and Sgt. Rock is here to prove it to naysayers the world over. Help the leathery veteran make it all the way to enemy camp, then obliterate it in order to save the day and preserve U.S. ideals. Based on the arcade game FRONT LINE, this Game Boy Color update on the title features Sgt. Rock, a D.C. Comics hero. You must guide the war hero over rivers and through the woods, taking out enemy troops and tanks. The obstacles are bountiful, as you'll come up against heavy opposition at every turn. If you stumble upon an opposing tank, feel free to hop in just remember that even tanks can be destroyed if riddled with enough grenades. Featuring a solid, straightforward premise, and intense, combat-based action, SGT. ROCK: On the Front Line is sure to appeal to gamers, appreciators of war, comic book fans, and wait, that covers everybody.

game.name: Front Row
game.desc: You can easily enjoy detailed and realistic machine settings (engine, tires, body) like a real F1. Machine (team) can be selected from 8 types. Equipped with a full-scale world tour mode, aiming to become a world champion by racing on all 16 courses around the world, including Japan, England, and Australia. In addition, a single race mode where you can choose your favorite course and enjoy the race, and a time attack mode aiming for the fastest lap are also installed. Of course, the communication function allows two people to fight hotly.

game.name: Full Time Soccer & Hang Time Basketball
game.desc:
Full Time is a football game which whilst not a simulation gives fun game of football that allows you to use all the skills in real football in the game. Full Time has 16 club teams and 16 national teams, 8 pitch types, 8 tactical formations, as well as 3 types of game mode. --------nnHang Time is modelled on the sport of basketball. It is essentially a fun game which although heavily based on the sport is not a simulation. Hang Time has many teams and possibilities that can be used to vary the game. The game features 8 international teams, 3 tactical formations, 3 types of game mode as well as variable skill and speed levels.
Hang time is simple to play but takes time to master.

game.name: Full Time Soccer
game.desc: Full Time is a football game which whilst not a simulation gives fun game of football that allows you to use all the skills in real football in the game. Full Time has 16 club teams and 16 national teams, 8 pitch types, 8 tactical formations, as well as 3 types of game mode.

game.path: ./Fushigi no Dungeon - Fuurai no Shiren GB 2 - Sabaku no Majou (Japan) (AFMJ).zip
game.name: Shiren the Wanderer GB2: Magic Castle of the Deser
game.desc: Fushigi no Dungeon: Furai no Shiren GB2: Sabaku no Majou is a Role-Playing game, developed and published by ChunSoft, which was released in Japan in 2001.

game.name: Gaiamaster Duel - Card Attackers
game.desc: Gaia Master Duel Card Attacks is a Miscellaneous game, published by Capcom, which was released in Japan in 2001.

game.name: Gakkyuu Ou Yamazaki
game.desc: Gakkyu Ou Yamazaki is a Role-Playing game, published by Koei, which was released in Japan in 1999.

game.name: Galaga : Destination Earth
game.desc:
Esta versión portátil tiene el mismo espíritu que sus primos de consola, excluyendo los gráficos y la perspectiva 3-D. Esta versión tiene cuatro fondos diferentes que se desplazan verticalmente junto con una gran cantidad de coloridas naves enemigas.
Los jugadores pueden actualizar su nave con armas más poderosas, incluso capturando las naves enemigas para que ataquen a las que todavía quedan en pantalla. Sin embargo, esta versión no tiene misiones de desafío que tienen sus otras versiones.

game.name: Gambler Densetsu Tetsuya - Shinjuku Tenun Hen
game.desc: This is the story of a legendary game master who was called "Jongsei" in the mahjong world. A four-player mahjong game of the mahjong manga "Tetsuya-The Legend of the Gambler" serialized in Weekly Shonen Magazine. You can enjoy the characters and episodes of the TV anime version, as well as various Ikasama-themed games anytime, anywhere. "Scenario game mode" where you play against experts according to the story, "Free game mode" where you can freely set characters and rules, and "Communication game mode" where you can play a combination game with 2 players vs. 2 computers., Equipped with game modes such as "Dunch's Mahjong Course Mode" that is easy and fun to remember.

game.name: Game & Watch Gallery 2
game.desc: Game & Watch Gallery 2 presenta 5 juegos originales de Game & Watch de la década de 1980 más 5 versiones remezcladas a todo color con un elenco de personajes de Mario World (incluidos Mario, Peach, Yoshi, Luigi y más). El juego incluido es: Paracaídas: Atrapa a los personajes que caen para ganar puntos. Casco: corre por la arena mientras intentas evitar la caída de objetos. Chef: Atrapa los pedazos de comida que caen y cocínalos para alimentar a los clientes. Bichos: muévete por la arena y golpea a los personajes para que salgan de los agujeros en el suelo. Donkey Kong: el juego original de Donkey Kong, en el que, como Mario, debes detener a Donkey Kong y salvar a la princesa recogiendo llaves y esquivando los obstáculos que arroja Donkey Kong.

game.name: Game & Watch Gallery 3
game.desc:
Rememora la década de los 80 con Game & Watch Gallery 3, una recopilación de juegos clásicos de los que podrás disfrutar tanto en su versión original como en una versión actualizada. Revive la experiencia de las pantallas LCD y descubre las versiones modernas con gráficos, sonidos y mecánica de juego mejorados.
Egg: recoge los huevos antes de que caigan al suelo.
Turtle Bridge: lleva los paquetes saltando de tortuga en tortuga.
Greenhouse: protege las plantas de molestas plagas.
Donkey Kong Jr.: hazte con la llave y libera a DK.
Mario Bros.: ayuda a Mario y a Luigi a mantener la fábrica en marcha.
¡Además, a los jugadores más habilidosos les esperan sorpresas e incluso juegos ocultos!

game.path: ./Game Boy Gallery 2 (Japan) (Possible Proto) (SGB Enhanced, GB Compatible) (NP).zip
game.name: Game & Watch Gallery
game.desc:
The Game & Watch Gallery es la primera compilación portátil de Nintendo que reúne algunos de los juegos portátiles originales de los años 80, con el popular "Mr. Game & Watch", y también con Mario y sus amigos como protagonistas.
La compilación consta de cuatro títulos, cada uno con una versión "Clásica" y "Moderna":
Manhole: Mario, Toad y Donkey Kong Jr. caminan sobre unas plataformas. El jugador controla a Yoshi, quien debe sujetarlas y moverlas para evitar que los personajes se caigan.
Oil Panic: Mario tiene que llenar un bidón con gasolina que cae del techo, y luego lanzarlo por la ventana a Yoshi.
Octopus: Mario debe coger el tesoro evitando los tentáculos del pulpo.
Fire: el castillo de Peach está en llamas, y Toad, Yoshi y Donkey Kong se asoman por las ventanas tratando de escaparr. El jugador controla a Mario, que debe salvarlos con su escalera.

game.name: Game & Watch Gallery 3
game.desc:
Rememora la década de los 80 con Game & Watch Gallery 3, una recopilación de juegos clásicos de los que podrás disfrutar tanto en su versión original como en una versión actualizada. Revive la experiencia de las pantallas LCD y descubre las versiones modernas con gráficos, sonidos y mecánica de juego mejorados.
Egg: recoge los huevos antes de que caigan al suelo.
Turtle Bridge: lleva los paquetes saltando de tortuga en tortuga.
Greenhouse: protege las plantas de molestas plagas.
Donkey Kong Jr.: hazte con la llave y libera a DK.
Mario Bros.: ayuda a Mario y a Luigi a mantener la fábrica en marcha.
¡Además, a los jugadores más habilidosos les esperan sorpresas e incluso juegos ocultos!

game.name: Game & Watch Gallery 3
game.desc:
Rememora la década de los 80 con Game & Watch Gallery 3, una recopilación de juegos clásicos de los que podrás disfrutar tanto en su versión original como en una versión actualizada. Revive la experiencia de las pantallas LCD y descubre las versiones modernas con gráficos, sonidos y mecánica de juego mejorados.
Egg: recoge los huevos antes de que caigan al suelo.
Turtle Bridge: lleva los paquetes saltando de tortuga en tortuga.
Greenhouse: protege las plantas de molestas plagas.
Donkey Kong Jr.: hazte con la llave y libera a DK.
Mario Bros.: ayuda a Mario y a Luigi a mantener la fábrica en marcha.
¡Además, a los jugadores más habilidosos les esperan sorpresas e incluso juegos ocultos!

game.name: Game Boy Wars 2
game.desc:
Game Boy Wars 2 is a Turn Based Strategy game for the Game Boy Color. It is a Japan-only part of the Nintendo Wars series.
Game Boy Wars 2, the second of the Game Boy Wars sequels by Hudson Soft, was released on November 20, 1998. The CPU's decision-making algorithm has once again been improved and the game now displays which spaces the player can move into or attack when they're moving a unit, allowing for clearer decision making process for the player. There are 54 new maps in Game Boy Wars 2.

game.name: Game Boy Wars 3
game.desc: The gameplay of Game Boy Wars 3 is a departure from the previous Game Boy Wars titles, being modeled after the Nectaris series of war simulators that were also produced by Hudson. For example, indirect attack units can now move and attack at the same time in one turn. In contrast to the previous Game Boy Wars titles, having the required fund is not enough to produce certain units. The player must provide construction materials to the factories and cities as well. To do that, the player must deploy construction units to these sites and built the materials. These construction units can be used to cut down trees and create roads.

game.name: Game Conveni 21
game.desc: Game Conveni 21 is a Strategy game, published by Starfish, which was released in Japan in 2000.

game.name: Games Frenzy
game.desc: Games Frenzy trae muchos juegos infantiles al Game Boy Color. Los 16 juegos diferentes se dividen en cuatro categorías: juegos de papel, juegos de Peg, juegos de Puzzle y juegos de mesa. Los juegos de papel incluyen Hangman, Dot Boxes, Triangle Boxes, Compartir, Serpientes de Color y Tic-Tac-Toe. Peg Game es una serie de tablas en las que el objetivo es eliminar todas las clavijas saltando sobre ellas. Scramble y Move It son juegos de Puzzle, y el único juego de mesa es Checkers.

game.path: ./Ganbare Goemon - Mononoke Douchuu Tobidase Nabebugyou! (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Ganbare Goemon - Mononoke Douchuu Tobisuise Nabebu
game.desc: In this RPG, the well-known "Goemon" is the main character as he travels throughout Japan battling unique "Mononoke" to obtain the six keys that will unlock the seal on Mt.

game.name: Ganbare Goemon: Hoshizorashi Dynamites Arawaru!!
game.desc:
Hoshizorashi Dynamites Arawaru!! marks another platformer entry in the Ganbare Goemon series. Forgoing RPG touches, the game returns to the action / platformer roots of the 16-bit titles by casting you as Goemon and his pal Ebisumaru as they traverse several levels based on a bizarre version of feudal Japan in hopes of defeating the forces of an evil alien invader.
The Game alternates between stages featuring either Goemon or Ebisumaru. Each character takes a different route towards the bad guy and as a result the stages scroll differently for each character. You can collect upgraded items and weapons but there's no character upgrading besides that. The game also features mid-level bonus rounds featuring the rest of Goemon's buddies in several arcade mini-games as traditional for the series.

game.name: Ganbare Goemon - Tengutou No Gyakushuu
game.desc: In this RPG, you control a boy who wanders into Oedo and cooperates with Goemon and his friends to solve crimes, using special moves and combined attacks with friends to overcome enemies in battle scenes.

game.name: ESPN International Track & Field
game.desc: ESPN INTERNATIONAL TRACK & FIELD brings all the excitement of a real athletic contest to Game Boy Color. Try to win the gold medal in 12 different events including fencing, skeet shooting, the 100-meter dash, the long jump, the javelin toss, 100-meter freestyle swimming, 110-meter hurdles, the high jump, weightlifting, the pole vault, the gymnastics vault, and table tennis. Each event requires a mix of speed, stamina, and timing to succeed itâ€™s all about the button mashing! Can you win all the events and become the ultimate champion? Full-colored, detailed graphics bring the knuckle-busting action to life. Use the Game Boy Link Cable to hook up with a friend and challenge him or her to a two-player contest to see who can win the most medals. This game includes battery backup to save all your high scores and world records.

game.name: GB Harobots
game.desc: GB Harobots is a Role-Playing game, published by Sunrise Interactive, which was released in Japan in 2000.

game.name: Karan Koron Gakuen - Hanafuda Mahjong
game.desc: Play Hanafuda and Mahjong with 16 beautiful girls from Hualan Toraryu Academy. Hanafuda players can enjoy tournament mode against the girls in "Koi Koi" and dan certification mode. Mahjong is a four-player game, with a round-robin mode and level-based CPU matches. In both modes, players can communicate with each other.

game.path: ./GB Memory Multi Menu (Japan) (SGB Enhanced, GB Compatible) (NP).zip
game.name: Gb Memory Multi Menu

game.path: ./Gekisou Dangun Racer - Onsoku Buster Dangun Dan (Japan).zip
game.name: Gekisou Dangun Racer - Onsoku Buster Dangun Dan
game.desc: The game is based on the popular "Dangan Racer" hobby. Purchase machines and parts, customize them, and try to win the championship. There are also original parts for the Game Boy version.

game.name: Lil' Monster
game.desc: The world is filled with energy crystals, which can be turned into monsters, using a special tin can. For centuries humans have trained the monsters to battle each other. However, a trainer named Cool Joe keeps breaking the rules of battle, and it's up to you to find out what he is up to. Collect crystals and turn them into monsters. Make your monster battle other monsters to gain experience and improve its abilities. You can also capture more crystals by winning battles. In addition to creating monsters, the crystals can be used by the monster to learn attacks and healing abilities. With over 60 monsters to collect, there is plenty to keep you busy. Try to find the truth regarding Cool Joe in LIL' MONSTER.

game.name: Gensou Maden Saiyuuki - Sabaku No Shikami
game.desc: Gensoumaden Saiyuuki: Sabaku no Shikami is a Role-Playing game, published by J-Wing, which was released in Japan in 2001.

game.path: ./Get Chuu Club - Minna no Konchuu Daizukan (Japan) (Rumble Version) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Get Chuu Club - Minna No Konchuu Daizukan
game.desc: Get Mushi Club: Minna no Konchuu Daizukan is an Adventure game, published by Jaleco Entertainment, which was released in Japan in 1999.

game.name: Gex : Enter the Gecko
game.desc: Una conversión del título de plataforma 3D, presenta todos los mismos niveles reducidos en la pantalla de Game Boy Color. Gex es absorbido por su televisor y debe explorar todos los niveles de estilo de televisión, encontrar los controles remotos y salvar el mundo de la televisión de Rez, quien planea apoderarse de las redes de televisión del mundo y regresar a casa. Cada nivel se basa en un género televisivo popular, como el terror, la ciencia ficción y la comedia, y se mencionan programas y películas conocidos a lo largo del camino.

game.name: Gex 3 : Deep Cover Gecko
game.desc:
Gex 3: Deep Cover Gecko es un juego de plataformas 2D. La trama es similar a la versión 3D original. Juegas como Gex, quien se adentra en los mundos de la televisión para derrotar a Rez y sus criaturas atacando con su cola. Algunos de los niveles pueden necesitar ser desbloqueados recolectando mandos a distancia. Obtienes mandos al completar las misiones en los mundos de la televisión. También hay otros objetos para coleccionar, incluidas mariposas y monedas de bonificación.
El juego cuenta con 11 tipos de enemigos diferentes, 15 niveles y 4500 zonas animadas.

game.name: Gex 3 : Deep Cover Gecko
game.desc:
Gex 3: Deep Cover Gecko es un juego de plataformas 2D. La trama es similar a la versión 3D original. Juegas como Gex, quien se adentra en los mundos de la televisión para derrotar a Rez y sus criaturas atacando con su cola. Algunos de los niveles pueden necesitar ser desbloqueados recolectando mandos a distancia. Obtienes mandos al completar las misiones en los mundos de la televisión. También hay otros objetos para coleccionar, incluidas mariposas y monedas de bonificación.
El juego cuenta con 11 tipos de enemigos diferentes, 15 niveles y 4500 zonas animadas.

game.name: Ghosts'n Goblins
game.desc:
Ghosts'n Goblins es un juego de plataformas de acción de desplazamiento lateral que se distribuye en seis niveles, cada uno de los cuales debe completarse en tres minutos (o se pierde una vida), abarcando bosques, pueblos, montañas y cavernas con una dificultad creciente.
Arthur, el valiente caballero, debe rescatar a su amada princesa del Rey Demonio Astaroth y sus fuerzas; entre ellos se encuentran muertos vivientes (fantasmas, zombis), murciélagos, ogros y duendes. Otros desafíos incluyen plataformas móviles, escaleras y peligros de agua o fuego.
Como en la mayoría de los juegos de este género, el jugador puede recoger potenciadores como dagas y bombas durante el transcurso del juego, lo que le da a nuestro personaje una mayor potencia de fuego.

game.name: Gift
game.desc:
Unlike its big 3D brother on the PC and Playstation 2, Gift for the Game Boy Color is a top down 2D action game.
As Gift, a small cute red devil-like creature with an attitude, players must save Lolita Globo and defeat the Shadow of Black Deep Dark Night. To do so Gift must find seven treasures and seven gnomes in seven different worlds. Worlds are divided in rooms, in rooms puzzles have to be solved, and enemies fought. Finally each world is guarded by a level boss.

game.name: Hexcite : The Shapes of Victory
game.desc: Hexcite es un juego de rompecabezas que se juega en un campo de juego con forma de panal. En el centro hay un hexágono; seis hexágonos más componen todo el campo de juego. Debido al juego por turnos, dos personas pueden jugar usando un solo sistema. También se admite el modo de enlace de dos jugadores. Los jugadores comienzan colocando una forma geométrica (triángulo, hexágono, paralelogramo, etc.) en el hexágono central. La CPU o el oponente humano luego coloca otra forma adyacente (y tocando completamente en un lado) a una pieza jugada previamente. Los jugadores obtienen puntos de bonificación por completar cualquier hexágono completo. Gran parte de la estrategia en este juego consiste en engañar a tu oponente para que te deje recibir una bonificación. También se puntúan bonificaciones por colocar una pieza de modo que dos bandos aporten una puntuación. El juego termina cuando se han jugado todas las piezas, o si no se pueden jugar las piezas restantes. En ese caso, se restan puntos por las piezas restantes, en función de la complejidad de la forma (se restan el doble de puntos para un hexágono en comparación con un triángulo). En Japón, este juego ha visto varias versiones de Windows, e incluso se ha lanzado como un juego de mesa.

game.name: Gobs of Games
game.desc: GOBS OF GAMES brings many childhood games to the Game Boy Color. The 16 different games are broken into four categories: Paper games, Peg games, Puzzle games, and Board games. The Paper games include Hangman, Dot Boxes, Triangle Boxes, Share, Color Snakes, and Tic-Tac-Toe. Peg Game is a series of boards in which the goal is to remove all of the pegs by jumping over them. Scramble and Move It are Puzzle games, and the only Board game is Checkers. All of the games can be played solo, but some can also played against another person via a link cable. Try to relive your younger days with GOBS OF GAMES.

game.name: Godzilla : The Series
game.desc:
826 / 5000 Resultados de traducción Godzilla: La serie se basa en el programa de televisión de Fox, que a su vez se basó en la película de 1998 protagonizada por Matthew Broderick. En este juego, el jugador toma el control del tipo grande él mismo mientras los monstruos gigantes del espacio han invadido la Tierra y están decididos a destruirla. Desafortunadamente tanto para los extraterrestres como para Godzilla, el ejército está decidido a destruir a ambos, por lo que Godzilla ahora tiene que luchar contra los militares para rechazar la amenaza alienígena.
Hay siete niveles en total. El jugador viajará a través de cada nivel destruyendo a los militares para llegar al final del nivel y luchar contra el monstruo jefe. El único control que el jugador tiene sobre Godzilla son sus ataques, ya que Godzilla caminará solo de izquierda a derecha en la pantalla en un camino lineal. Hay cuatro ataques para elegir: Stomp, Bite, Tail-Whip y el famoso Radiation Breath.

game.name: Godzilla : The Series, Monster Wars
game.desc: Aliens are creating mutants on Earth, and it is up to Godzilla to save the planet from the giant monsters in GODZILLA THE SERIES: MONSTER WARS. You take control of the giant lizard in 10 levels of action that take place in deserts, cities, and underwater. Free-scrolling technology gives you total control of Godzilla, and new cross-hairs improve the accuracy of Godzilla?s attacks that include fireball, tail whip, bite, claw, stomp, and flame breath. As an added bonus, all of the attacks can be linked together for unlimited combinations. And you are going to need those combinations to destroy the 16 types of enemies that Godzilla will face. Try to save the planet from giant monsters and aliens in GODZILLA THE SERIES: Monster Wars.

game.path: ./Gold and Glory - The Road to El Dorado (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl).zip
game.name: Gold and Glory : The Road to El Dorado
game.desc: La versión de GameBoy Color de Gold and Glory: The Road to El Dorado es un juego de plataformas de desplazamiento lateral que sigue los eventos principales de la película animada. A través de muchos niveles, controlas a uno de los dos personajes principales: Tulio o Miguel. Pueden caminar, correr, saltar, trepar, recolectar objetos y usar machetes. En la mayoría de los niveles, debe avanzar de una parte del nivel a otra recolectando una cierta cantidad de elementos, a veces significativos, como partes de un mapa que muestra el camino a El Dorado. Distintos oponentes intentarán impedir tu progreso, pero pueden ser evitados o eliminados. Están presentes diferentes secuencias de arcade, como huir de un toro o montar a caballo, así como varias batallas con jefes. Dichos encuentros incluyen peleas con un puma, el propio Cortez, y también jugar baloncesto indio contra el campeón indio.

game.name: Golden Goal
game.desc: Sumérgete en el increíble mundo del fútbol internacional mientras seleccionas tu brillante equipo y los llevas a nuevos desafíos a medida que te enfrentas a los mejores equipos del mundo, jugando los partidos que componen el torneo de la Copa del Mundo y venciéndolos a todos para convertirse en el mejor! En el brillante Golden Goal necesitarás dominar las artes de las gambetas, pasar y patear creativamente hacia la victoria mientras ganas el codiciado trofeo de la Copa Mundial.

game.name: Golf Daisuki!
game.desc: Golf Daisuki! is a Sports game, developed and published by Kid, which was released in Japan in 1999.

game.name: Hole In One Golf
game.desc: It's a quiet day on the links. You tee up your ball, and drive it 200 yards down the center of the fairway, leaving a 150-yard approach shot. After taking the approach shot, the ball stops rolling 3-feet from the pin. On the green, you sink the relatively easy putt, and you start your round with a birdie. While most golfers never have days like this, they can with HOLE IN ONE GOLF. Get out on three different courses and try to get the lowest score possible. However, the courses are located in rural areas, so you never know when birds, squirrels, or bears will come onto the course and mess with your shots. Try to play the round of your life with HOLE IN ONE GOLF.

game.name: Golf King
game.desc:
Golf Ou - The King of Golf is a golf game by Digital Kids for the 8-bit Game Boy line, released in mid-1999 in Japan only. From a technical point of view, it is modestly notable for its use of autosave and voice acting.
Two different attempts at localization by Crave Entertainment, dated 2000, were found in the September 2020 leak: - Golf King, which appears to be a more direct localization for the European market. - Supershot Golf Robot, intended for release in America, which replaces your friendly mentor with a mad robot.

game.name: Gonta No Okiraku Daibouken
game.desc: Gonta no Okiraku Daibouken is an Adventure game, published by Lay-Up, which was released in Japan in 2000.

game.name: Goraku Ou Tango!
game.desc:
¡Go Raku Ou Tango! es un simple juego de palabras que imita los acertijos que se encuentran en las páginas de la popular editorial japonesa impresa de acertijos de palabras Sekai Bunka. Estos acertijos consisten en tomar palabras escritas en inglés y los dos silabarios de Japan Hiragana, o Katakana, y mover fichas debajo de las palabras para recrearlas en un estilo de escritura diferente. Hay varias variantes en este juego.
Hay un modo de historia que presenta a una familia de arqueólogos que están desenterrando la ortografía japonesa en todo el mundo. Suecia, por ejemplo, es conocida no solo por ser el hogar de la Atlántida perdida, sino también por ser un tesoro de escritura japonesa enterrada. Falta un miembro de la familia, ¿tal vez habrá pistas en estas ruinas de estas antiguas ruinas japonesas globales? Al completar los acertijos, verás una escena y un nuevo acertijo más difícil.

game.name: Grand Theft Auto
game.desc: En Grand Theft Auto, el jugador asume el papel de un delincuente de poca monta que intenta triunfar entre la mafia. Robar autos, hacer trabajos para los mafiosos y comportarse de forma antisocial en general son el camino hacia el éxito. La acción se mueve a través de seis niveles repartidos en tres ciudades diferentes, cada una basada en una ciudad real de los EE. UU.: Liberty City (basada en la ciudad de Nueva York), San Andreas (basada en San Francisco) y Vice City (basada en Miami). Para terminar un nivel, se debe alcanzar una determinada puntuación. Robar autos y chocar contra el tráfico, atropellar a peatones y matar policías, todo aumenta el puntaje, pero el Los puntos importantes se logran a través de los trabajos.

game.name: Grand Theft Auto 2
game.desc: Lie, cheat, and steal your way through 3 huge cities in the follow-up to Grand Theft Auto. Earn the respect of 7 different gangs as you demolish the town in your attempt to make lots of cash.

game.name: Grandia: Parallel Trippers
game.desc:
This is a Game Boy spin-off from the original Grandia game on Saturn and Playstation.
It tells the tale of three school children named Yuuhi, Mizuki and Shirou who get sucked into the world of Grandia. In the course of the game you meet the cast of the original Grandia game like Justin, Feena, Sue etc.
Though the characters from Grandia appear in it, it is not a continuation of the Grandia storyline.

game.name: Granduel - Shinki Dungeon No Hihou
game.desc: Gran Duel: Shinki Dungeon no Hihou is a Role-Playing game, developed by Studio VeX and published by Bottom Up, which was released in Japan in 1999.

game.name: Great Battle Pocket, The
game.desc: The Great Battle Pocket is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Alpha Unit and published by Banpresto, which was released in Japan in 1999.

game.name: Gremlins Unleashed
game.desc: In this game, the film's hero, Gizmo, attempts to find the gremlins and capture them all. In the meantime, the sinister Stripe and his army of 30 different gremlins decide to invade the town of Kingston Falls and try to transform Gizmo into a gremlin. The game can be played as either character. Gremlins: Unleashed! features 10 levels based in locations featured in the film, including Billy's house, the school laboratory, the department store, and the movie theater.

game.name: The Grinch
game.desc: Como Grinch, te asegurarás de que Whoville NO celebre la Navidad este año... Tus misiones, si decides aceptarlas, incluyen romper regalos, construir algunos de tus desagradables artilugios (lanzador de huevos podridos, tirador de limo) , jugar con el correo... Y más. Explora cuatro grandes entornos en busca de tus planos para tus "armas". Incluso llama a tu amigo Max para que te ayude a veces.

game.name: The Grinch
game.desc: Como Grinch, te asegurarás de que Whoville NO celebre la Navidad este año... Tus misiones, si decides aceptarlas, incluyen romper regalos, construir algunos de tus desagradables artilugios (lanzador de huevos podridos, tirador de limo) , jugar con el correo... Y más. Explora cuatro grandes entornos en busca de tus planos para tus "armas". Incluso llama a tu amigo Max para que te ayude a veces.

game.name: Guruguru Garakutas
game.desc: An RPG that goes back and forth between the real world and another world, where junk picked up in the real world can be turned into friends and items in the other world. Use them to defeat the evil empire.

game.name: Guruguru Town Hanamaru-kun
game.desc: The students spend a day with "Hanamaru," the main character from the TV anime, playing mini games such as quiz, hide-and-seek, and shiritori.

game.path: ./Gyouten Ningen Batseelor - Doctor Guy no Yabou (Japan).zip
game.name: Gyouten Ningen Batseelor - Doctor Guy No Yabou
game.desc: Control up to four friends and collect Peace Stones to save a dying world. In battle, characters can be powered up by transforming themselves.

game.path: ./Hali Xiaozi Dier Bu - Mishi de Mi (Taiwan) (Unl).zip
game.name: Ha Li Xiao Zi Di Er Bu - Mi Shi De Mi
Halloween Racer
game.desc: Halloween Racer es un juego de carreras con temática de Halloween. En su mayoría, se trata de un juego de karting, en el que eliges uno de los diferentes personajes y corres por cada pista del juego para ganar el trofeo de Halloween. Para hacerlo, el jugador debe vencer a los monstruos que compiten en cada una de las cinco pistas. En el camino hay golosinas que recolectar y trampas que evitar para hacerlo más desafiante. Antes de entrar en el campeonato, cada pista se puede jugar en modo de práctica.

game.name: Hamster Club
game.desc: Hamster Club is a hamster breeding training simulation game where you aim to become a master breeder. Select one of three animals, "Shigecchi", "Boo-chan" and "Endo-kun", and breed them according to the funds you have available. If you participate in various competitions (cups), you will compete for the ability and kindness of the hamster. Up to 4 hamsters can be kept in a cage at the same time.

game.name: Hamster Club - Awasete Chuu
game.desc: Cute characters from the popular comic "Hamster Club" appear in this falling puzzle. The game is a puzzle in which blocks with numbers on them are arranged to form a chain of blocks that can be erased. When certain blocks are erased, the cute hamsters will cheer the player up.

game.name: Hamster Club - Oshiema Chuu
game.desc: There are 300 quizzes on hamster habits for each level, and mini-games are awarded for each level up. There is also a mode to diagnose your hamster.

game.name: Hamster Club 2
game.desc: Breed and breed hamsters, and enter your own raised hamsters in competitions. When they gain recognition in competitions, their status as breeders increases.

game.path: ./Hamster Monogatari GB + Magi Ham no Mahou Shoujo (Japan).zip
game.name: Hamster Monogatari Gb + Magi Ham Mahou No Shoujo
game.desc: The two games are "Hamster Tales," a simulation of raising hamsters of various characters while training them, and "Majihaam's Witch Girl," an adventure in which the player magically transforms into a hamster and sets out on an adventure to save the hamster world.

game.name: Hamster Paradise
game.desc: "Hamster Paradise" where you can make a cute hamster a pet. Hamsters' behavior, personality, and behavior change depending on how they are raised and taken care of. When raised with love, hamsters perform tricks (such as ball riding) and perform various gestures. You can use the communication cable to meet your friend's hamster or race in a racing game. You can take a picture of a hamster's funny gesture and print it with a printer.

game.name: Hamster Paradise 2
game.desc:
First of all, I got a hamster from Dr. Hamuzou of the ham center. Give the hamster you got a cute name. Basically care!
If you grow up lovingly, your hamster will grow bigger and bigger. Grow carefully by feeding and taking a walk. If you take a walk with your hamster, there will be many events.
You can get money by clearing the mini game. Use this money to buy food, toys, and birdhouses for your hamster.
Hamsters can get married when they grow up. If you grow your hamster well, new species may be born. The game is more cute because it reacts more than a real hamster!

game.name: Hamster Paradise 3
game.desc: In this work, you can grow your favorite kind of hamster from Golden Hamster, Jungarian, and Roborovski. In addition to the mini rabbit that was popular in the previous work, a squirrel also appeared. There are also plenty of fun mini games to play with hamsters. In addition to familiar games such as ham wheels and ham catches, new games have been added, and there are more than dozens of them. The cage is also transformed into a two-story building. You can enjoy playing around by going up and down. Not only parks and shops, but also amusement parks and schools, where you can go out with hamsters has increased. You can now collect stickers that you can get at various places in the game, and exchange emails with your friends via infrared communication.

game.name: Hamster Paradise 4
game.desc: The hamster paradise series is now even more cute! The types of hamsters that can be raised have increased to eight types: Golden, Jungarian, Roborovski, Blue Sapphire, White, Black, Panda, and Pudding! In addition, it has become possible to keep two hamsters at the same time. When you feed them, you can see cute gestures that the two animals share and eat. You can marry your own hamsters or play with your friend's hamsters using the communication function. The contents of the mini-game have been renewed, new walking places have been added, 16 new types of hamsters can be discovered, and you can meet the discovered hamsters at "Maison de Hamster".

game.name: Hamtaro : Ham-Hams Unite!
game.desc:
It's Hamtaro time! Boss has a big secret in store for the Ham-Hams, but he's gotta find them first! The guy's got too much on his hands already, so he sends the loveable Carrot-headed Hamtaro out on the search for the Ham-Hams. The thing is... Hamtaro's gotta learn some hip Ham-chat if he wants everyone to listen to him. So as he ventures on in the game, he becomes the street-wise hipster, learning Ham-chat and getting into tons of adventures... and trouble!
Make friends for life! Go out and have an adventure! Remember... get everyone back to the clubhouse to see what Boss's big secret is...
This game is based on the anime Tottoko Hamtaro, created by Ritsuko Kawai.

game.name: The Mummy
game.desc: Rick O'Connell descubre accidentalmente Hamanaptra, la ciudad egipcia de los muertos. Cuando regresa con la egiptóloga Evelyn Carnahan y su hermano Jonathan, despiertan a Imhotep, un sacerdote que fue maldecido y momificado vivo. Ahora, Rick y sus compañeros deben evitar que Imhotep destruya el mundo. En cada uno de los niveles, tú (como Rick) debes reunir las seis piezas de la llave estrella. Sin embargo, hay una gran cantidad de enemigos que se interpondrán en el camino. Afortunadamente, puedes usar una gran cantidad de armas que incluyen un machete, pistolas dobles, una escopeta, una ametralladora Lewis, dinamita y amuletos mágicos para deshacerte de cualquier enemigo. Además de los niveles de exploración y acción, algunas áreas incorporan nuevos estilos de juego como flotar río abajo mientras se evitan obstáculos.

game.name: Hana Yori Dango - Another Love Story
game.desc: Based on the comic of the same name. It is based on the contents up to volume 12 of the comic and includes original events. The main character, Tsukushi Makino, becomes the main character and develops a close relationship with the students at his school.

game.path: ./Hanasaka Tenshi Tenten-kun no Beat Breaker (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Hanasaka Tenshi Tentenkun No Beat Breaker
game.desc: Hanasaka Tenshi Tentenkun no Beat Breaker es un híbrido del juego Simon y un juego de rompecabezas de combinaciones. Se requieren cuatro botones para jugar: izquierda y derecha en el Control Pad, y los botones A y B. La pantalla del juego se divide por la mitad. La mitad superior contiene ocho columnas, seguidas de una línea rayada y luego un área blanca vacía. A la izquierda de la pantalla del juego está la barra de tiempo. A medida que completa rondas, la barra aumenta. Cuando la barra llega a la parte superior del reloj, el nivel está completo. Si su área blanca se llena más allá de las líneas rayadas, el juego ha terminado. Cada ronda tiene ocho notas tocadas en un ritmo específico. Después de tocarlas, vuelven a tocar, y esta vez, después de tocar cada nota, los círculos caen por las columnas.

game.name: Hands of Time
game.desc:
As the young Sebastian, gamers take the role of the son of a brilliant scientist who has discovered a means to travel through time. Time travel has already taken place in this reality, however, and Sebatian's first mission is to use his father's discovery to return to the past and destroy an earlier time machine, which upset the balance of power in a past war and led to dangerous realities in their present. Just as Sebastian enters the machine to travel back to the past, he watches helplessly as his father is kidnapped and taken prisoner.
You play as Sebastian, the soldier sent back in time to rectify the present. Hands of Time features an overhead view and six levels, each of which is comprised of a small overworld with various objectives. Much of the game requires completing item-swapping sequences in order to progress, while avoiding enemy soldiers along the way. You have a small pistol with infinite ammo. You can collect better weapons, though their ammo is limited. There are no difficulty levels and no multiplayer; you can jump to any of the six levels by use of a password system.

game.name: Hang Time Basketball
game.desc:
Hang Time is modelled on the sport of basketball. It is essentially a fun game which although heavily based on the sport is not a simulation. Hang Time has many teams and possibilities that can be used to vary the game. The game features 8 international teams, 3 tactical formations, 3 types of game mode as well as variable skill and speed levels.
Hang time is simple to play but takes time to master.

game.name: Harley-Davidson Motor Cycles : Race Across America
game.desc: Live the life of an easy rider in HARLEY DAVIDSON: Race Across America. There are four bikes to choose from, and they all of them have the classic Harley Davidson shape and sound. Each bike is rated in acceleration, top speed, and handling so you can pick one that fits your riding style. You can go for a high-speed, low-acceleration model, or if you prefer to burn rubber off of the line, you will want to choose a bike with monster acceleration. When you are ready to ride you will have the opportunity to race on four different tracks including the Arizona Desert, Deep South, Florida Everglades, and California Coast. On all of the tracks you will have to race from sunrise to sunset in order to emerge victorious. Get on your hog and cruise the good olâ€™ U.S. of A in HARLEY DAVIDSON: Race Across America.

game.name: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
game.desc:
The second Harry Potter role-playing game follows directly on from the first, with mostly the same game mechanics, controls and even some of the graphics.
To unravel the mystery of the Chamber of Secrets, young wizard Harry Potter must fight turn-based battles and solve quests. In this game, he is not alone, as a party system was added: his friends Ron and Hermione (and some other characters) will join Harry in the battles. While Harry (as in the previous game) can use card combinations of Famous Witches and Wizards cards to produce special attacks and effects, his friends have other means: Ron can unleash his rat Scabbers in special rat attacks and Hermione, being the know-it-all that she is, influences combat through "lecture attacks", using helpful hints like "Be Careful!" (which increases defense, for example).
Gone is the potion-mixing from the first game, but aside from the party system, several other features were added: the Informous spell divulges information about strengths and weaknesses of enemies, which is stored and can be accessed later. To aid in finding one's way around Hogwarts, floor maps were added.
Like the first game, this one also includes several mini-games, including Quidditch, that once found in the game can be accessed from the main menu.

game.path: ./Harry Potter 2 - The Black Art Wrestle Edition (USA) (Unl).zip
game.name: Harry Potter 2 - The Black Art Wrestle Edition

game.path: ./Harry Potter 3 - Shen Qi Zhi Guang Lun (Taiwan) (Unl).zip
game.name: Harry Potter 3 - Shen Qi Zhi Guang Lun

game.path: ./Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets (USA, Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl,Pt,Sv,Da).zip
game.name: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
game.desc:
The second Harry Potter role-playing game follows directly on from the first, with mostly the same game mechanics, controls and even some of the graphics.
To unravel the mystery of the Chamber of Secrets, young wizard Harry Potter must fight turn-based battles and solve quests. In this game, he is not alone, as a party system was added: his friends Ron and Hermione (and some other characters) will join Harry in the battles. While Harry (as in the previous game) can use card combinations of Famous Witches and Wizards cards to produce special attacks and effects, his friends have other means: Ron can unleash his rat Scabbers in special rat attacks and Hermione, being the know-it-all that she is, influences combat through "lecture attacks", using helpful hints like "Be Careful!" (which increases defense, for example).
Gone is the potion-mixing from the first game, but aside from the party system, several other features were added: the Informous spell divulges information about strengths and weaknesses of enemies, which is stored and can be accessed later. To aid in finding one's way around Hogwarts, floor maps were added.
Like the first game, this one also includes several mini-games, including Quidditch, that once found in the game can be accessed from the main menu.

game.path: ./Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone (USA, Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl,Pt,Sv,No,Da,Fi).zip
game.name: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
game.desc:
En éste juego de rol clásico te metes en el papel de Harry, avanzando a través de la trama del libro cumpliendo misiones, luchando contra monstruos y ganando experiencia y niveles.
El combate se basa en turnos, y Harry puede usar sus hechizos contra varias criaturas y otros enemigos. Además, se pueden utilizar combinaciones de cartas de Brujas famosas y Cartas de coleccionista de magos para producir poderosos efectos mágicos. Estas cartas se pueden encontrar en todo Hogwarts, que se puede explorar libremente. Las pociones que recargan la resistencia y los puntos mágicos pueden ser encontradas, compradas o mezcladas por el mismo Harry, pero solo con los ingredientes adecuados.
El juego presenta varios minijuegos que, una vez que se desbloquean durante el juego, también se puede acceder a ellos desde el menú principal.

game.name: Harry Potter 2 - The Black Art Wrestle Edition
Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
game.desc:
En éste juego de rol clásico te metes en el papel de Harry, avanzando a través de la trama del libro cumpliendo misiones, luchando contra monstruos y ganando experiencia y niveles.
El combate se basa en turnos, y Harry puede usar sus hechizos contra varias criaturas y otros enemigos. Además, se pueden utilizar combinaciones de cartas de Brujas famosas y Cartas de coleccionista de magos para producir poderosos efectos mágicos. Estas cartas se pueden encontrar en todo Hogwarts, que se puede explorar libremente. Las pociones que recargan la resistencia y los puntos mágicos pueden ser encontradas, compradas o mezcladas por el mismo Harry, pero solo con los ingredientes adecuados.
El juego presenta varios minijuegos que, una vez que se desbloquean durante el juego, también se puede acceder a ellos desde el menú principal.

game.name: Harvest Moon 2 GBC
game.desc:
Reconstruye la granja de tu abuelo y comienza a criar vacas, gallinas y ovejas. ¡Mantenlos felices y te harán rico! Descubre el fantástico mundo de Harvest Moon con amigos geniales listos para ayudarte a tener éxito en tu misión.
- ¡La esperada secuela de Harvest Moon para GBC aún más divertida! - Elección de jugar a un niño o una niña granjero - Horas y horas de juego - Los juegos arcade ocultos incluyen Mole Bash y Cherry Cup Horse Race - Las opciones especiales de cable Game Link permiten intercambiar entre Harvest Moon 2 y Legend of the River King 2

game.name: Harvest Moon 3 GBC
game.desc: Después de muchos elogios por sus logros agrícolas anteriores (como parte de los títulos anteriores de Harvest Moon en GBC), una joven le pide que la ayude a poner en marcha su granja. La granja, situada en una isla, necesita mucho trabajo, por lo que necesita todas sus habilidades para que las cosas funcionen correctamente. Sus muchas tareas van desde atender a los animales de la granja, controlar el presupuesto mientras compra bienes (comida, agua, artículos mecánicos, etc.) en las tiendas locales, etc. Y aunque el objetivo principal es construir y mantener la granja, hay muchas oportunidades para cuidarse (ir al cine, comprar mascotas, encontrar novia/novio).

game.name: Harvest Moon GBC
game.desc: Harvest Moon es un simulador de agricultura/RPG en el que debes construir y mantener una granja durante el transcurso de un año, mientras cuidas tu presupuesto y a ti mismo. Tienes la capacidad de comprar, vender y cuidar animales de granja, cultivos y cualquier otro suministro que puedas tener. Puedes comerciar con muchas de las personas de la ciudad y con otros granjeros. Si vincula el Game Boy de un amigo, también puede intercambiar artículos entre jugadores. Las tiendas locales ofrecen muchos artículos para ayudarlo en su búsqueda, a un costo, por supuesto. Y si tienes tiempo, puedes ir por la ciudad en busca de un poco de diversión fuera del trabajo. Desde una perspectiva aérea, puedes explorar tu área de cultivo, la ciudad local y los túneles de Harvest Sprite, llenos de extrañas y maravillosas criaturas que pueden ayudarte o destruir tu búsqueda. Hay cuatro estaciones (verano, otoño, invierno, primavera) y cada una trae consigo nuevos desafíos, como mantener calientes a los animales de los brazos durante las estaciones más frías y suministrar agua a los cultivos durante los períodos más cálidos. La versión GBC incluye todos los personajes nuevos y sprites de fondo a todo color, pero también es compatible con versiones anteriores de la versión original de Game Boy.

game.name: Harvest Moon GBC
game.desc: Harvest Moon es un simulador de agricultura/RPG en el que debes construir y mantener una granja durante el transcurso de un año, mientras cuidas tu presupuesto y a ti mismo. Tienes la capacidad de comprar, vender y cuidar animales de granja, cultivos y cualquier otro suministro que puedas tener. Puedes comerciar con muchas de las personas de la ciudad y con otros granjeros. Si vincula el Game Boy de un amigo, también puede intercambiar artículos entre jugadores. Las tiendas locales ofrecen muchos artículos para ayudarlo en su búsqueda, a un costo, por supuesto. Y si tienes tiempo, puedes ir por la ciudad en busca de un poco de diversión fuera del trabajo. Desde una perspectiva aérea, puedes explorar tu área de cultivo, la ciudad local y los túneles de Harvest Sprite, llenos de extrañas y maravillosas criaturas que pueden ayudarte o destruir tu búsqueda. Hay cuatro estaciones (verano, otoño, invierno, primavera) y cada una trae consigo nuevos desafíos, como mantener calientes a los animales de los brazos durante las estaciones más frías y suministrar agua a los cultivos durante los períodos más cálidos. La versión GBC incluye todos los personajes nuevos y sprites de fondo a todo color, pero también es compatible con versiones anteriores de la versión original de Game Boy.

game.path: ./Hello Kitty no Beads Factory (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Hello Kitty No Beads Factory
game.desc: Cute Kitty tries her hand at bead accessories by arranging and erasing five of the desired beads from five different types of beads, either vertically or horizontally. The stage is cleared by accumulating points on the bead gauge.

game.name: Hello Kitty No Happy House
game.desc: A game centered on communication in which you can enjoy conversations with Kitty. You can enjoy playing mini-games in the action part and collecting items to redecorate your room.

game.path: ./Hello Kitty no Magical Museum (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Hello Kitty No Magical Museum
game.desc: It's been 25 years since Hello Kitty was born. We have decided to open a museum where many former designs are collected. However, the museum is bewitched and you can't see the pictures. Challenge the puzzles and solve the magic applied to each one!! There are 45 types of puzzles in all. Challenge!!

game.path: ./Hello Kitty no Sweet Adventure - Daniel-kun ni Aitai (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Hello Kitty no Sweet Adventure - Daniel-kun ni Ait
game.desc: Action game featuring popular Sanrio characters. It is another version of "Dear Daniel's Sweet Adventure. Control Kitty in London and reunite her with Daniel in New York. Kitty can be powered up by changing her costume.

game.path: ./Hello Kitty to Dear Daniel no Dream Adventure (Japan).zip
game.name: Hello Kitty To Dear Daniel No Dream Adventure
game.desc:
Sanrio characters "Hello Kitty" and "Dear Daniel" have adventures in a mysterious world that mixes the past, present and future.
This is a classic Hello Kitty platform game that originally released in Japan only. You'll play through Hello Kitty's dream. Playing as Hello Kitty you'll make your way through a Kaizo style world with many levels. At each level, you'll collect timers, hearts, and more. Keys are needed to unlock certain doors. Overall this is a fun little Hello Kitty adventure game. Explore and collect necessary items in order to pass levels.

game.name: Hello Kitty's Cube Frenzy
game.desc: Hello Kitty comes to the Game Boy Color with HELLO KITTY'S CUBE FRENZY. The objective of each stage is simple: Kitty must collect all of the items scattered throughout each level. However, you can only tell Kitty to move left or right, and if you are not careful, Kitty will fall off the edge and say hello to the grim reaper. Luckily, blocks fall from the sky, which can be rotated and used to create staircases and bridges to the objects. However, placing three blocks with identical colors next to each other will make them disappear; this can both help and hurt. In addition to the block problems, Badz Maru, Hanamaru, and Pandaba will wander around and cause problems for Hello Kitty. Can you handle the pressure and collect all of the items in HELLO KITTY'S CUBE FRENZY?

game.name: Hercules : The Legendary Journeys
game.desc:
Are you a true God?
You are Hercules, son of Zeus, and you must prove you are a true God to mortal eyes. Get ready for an extraordinary journey! This thrilling game, based on world-known TV series by Universal, mixes fast-paced action and adventure.
-Wide range of characters and adventures riddled with several missions and pitfalls. -Link mode: play with your friends and exchange characters if you have Titus game Xena on Game Boy Color; Play as Xena in Hercules game and as Hercules in Xena game. You will access to hidden worlds.

game.name: Hero Hero Kun
game.desc: Game adaptation of "Herohero-kun" serialized in Comic Bonbon. It contains many gags and laughs as in the original story. The main character, Herohero-kun, attacks with snot and makes people look away.

game.name: Heroes of Might and Magic
game.desc:
Heroes of Might and Magic es un juego de estrategia por turnos en el que juegas como uno de cuatro héroes disponibles: el brujo, la hechicera, el bárbaro o el caballero. Debes construir tu castillo agregando diferentes ubicaciones para ganar diferentes unidades con las que fortalecer tu ejército. Las unidades incluyen dragones, cíclopes, fénix, paladines y muchos más. Tu objetivo es, por supuesto, destruir a tus oponentes, pero esto no es todo el juego ni mucho menos.
Otro aspecto del juego es explorar el mundo que se te da y descubrir tesoros, hechizos, minas para recolectar recursos, campamentos nómadas, lámparas mágicas, artefactos épicos y más.

game.name: Heroes of Might and Magic II
game.desc: Juego de estrategia de fantasía que te enfrenta a los caudillos diabólicos en una lucha por el territorio y los recursos. Los peligrosos enemigos y criaturas místicas que recorren la tierra esperan a cualquier héroe que se proponga derrotarlos. Lo que está en juego es el premio final: el control de la tierra y el trono real. Apoye al vil usurpador y conduzca a los ejércitos del mal, o sea leal al príncipe justo y libere al pueblo de la tiranía.

game.name: Hexcite : The Shapes of Victory
game.desc: Hexcite es un juego de rompecabezas que se juega en un campo de juego con forma de panal. En el centro hay un hexágono; seis hexágonos más componen todo el campo de juego. Debido al juego por turnos, dos personas pueden jugar usando un solo sistema. También se admite el modo de enlace de dos jugadores. Los jugadores comienzan colocando una forma geométrica (triángulo, hexágono, paralelogramo, etc.) en el hexágono central. La CPU o el oponente humano luego coloca otra forma adyacente (y tocando completamente en un lado) a una pieza jugada previamente. Los jugadores obtienen puntos de bonificación por completar cualquier hexágono completo. Gran parte de la estrategia en este juego consiste en engañar a tu oponente para que te deje recibir una bonificación. También se puntúan bonificaciones por colocar una pieza de modo que dos bandos aporten una puntuación. El juego termina cuando se han jugado todas las piezas, o si no se pueden jugar las piezas restantes. En ese caso, se restan puntos por las piezas restantes, en función de la complejidad de la forma (se restan el doble de puntos para un hexágono en comparación con un triángulo). En Japón, este juego ha visto varias versiones de Windows, e incluso se ha lanzado como un juego de mesa.

game.path: ./Hexcite - The Shapes of Victory (USA, Europe) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Hexcite : The Shapes of Victory
game.desc: Hexcite es un juego de rompecabezas que se juega en un campo de juego con forma de panal. En el centro hay un hexágono; seis hexágonos más componen todo el campo de juego. Debido al juego por turnos, dos personas pueden jugar usando un solo sistema. También se admite el modo de enlace de dos jugadores. Los jugadores comienzan colocando una forma geométrica (triángulo, hexágono, paralelogramo, etc.) en el hexágono central. La CPU o el oponente humano luego coloca otra forma adyacente (y tocando completamente en un lado) a una pieza jugada previamente. Los jugadores obtienen puntos de bonificación por completar cualquier hexágono completo. Gran parte de la estrategia en este juego consiste en engañar a tu oponente para que te deje recibir una bonificación. También se puntúan bonificaciones por colocar una pieza de modo que dos bandos aporten una puntuación. El juego termina cuando se han jugado todas las piezas, o si no se pueden jugar las piezas restantes. En ese caso, se restan puntos por las piezas restantes, en función de la complejidad de la forma (se restan el doble de puntos para un hexágono en comparación con un triángulo). En Japón, este juego ha visto varias versiones de Windows, e incluso se ha lanzado como un juego de mesa.

game.name: Hiryuu No Ken - Retsuden Gb
game.desc: Sequel to the NES version of "Fist of the Flying Dragon III". Ryufei plays an active role in order to prevent the resurrection of a great demon god sealed away in the past. Three modes can be enjoyed, including "Action Mode," in which you fight various fighters while placing the storyline, and "One vs. One Mode," in which you choose your favorite fighter from among seven to fight. The series also features the series' signature Shin-Gan Mark system, which uses marks to indicate an opponent's weak points and your defensive locations.

game.name: Hissatsu Pachinko Boy - Cr Monster House
game.desc: The "Hissatsu Pachinko" series, popular on PlayStation and other platforms, is now available in GB. The popular CR Monster House is included. A nail adjustment mode and a mode to view reach patterns are provided, allowing players to thoroughly study CR Monster House.

game.path: ./Hole in One Golf (USA) (Rumble Version) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Hole In One Golf
game.desc: It's a quiet day on the links. You tee up your ball, and drive it 200 yards down the center of the fairway, leaving a 150-yard approach shot. After taking the approach shot, the ball stops rolling 3-feet from the pin. On the green, you sink the relatively easy putt, and you start your round with a birdie. While most golfers never have days like this, they can with HOLE IN ONE GOLF. Get out on three different courses and try to get the lowest score possible. However, the courses are located in rural areas, so you never know when birds, squirrels, or bears will come onto the course and mess with your shots. Try to play the round of your life with HOLE IN ONE GOLF.

game.name: Hollywood Pinball
game.desc:
Enter the biggest and most colorful pinball extravaganza on the game boy...ever!
'Hollywood Pinball' brings you SEVEN THEMED TABLES that will simply blow you away. Each table has been painstakingly designed to bring you all the thrills and excitement of the real thing. Combine all this with the fastest, most realistic ball movement to grace this silver screen - you'll feel up there with the stars.
Lights, Camera, Action!! - this could be the performance of your life, get out there and pinball!

game.name: Holy Magic Century
game.desc: variante de Mr. Do!. Brian, el protagonista de Quest 64, tiene que vencer a los niveles recogiendo todos los cristales. El arma principal de Brian es su bastón mágico que dispara una poderosa explosión, pero necesita recargarse durante un tiempo antes de que pueda ser utilizado de nuevo. Un arma alternativa son los cofres que están alrededor de los niveles, que puedes dejar caer sobre tus enemigos. También hay power-ups para recoger, por ejemplo, mayor velocidad y más potencia de fuego.

game.name: Honkaku Hanafuda Gb
game.desc: The software allows players to enjoy "Koi Koi," a game in which players compete to see how fast they can make a role using Hanafuda (Japanese playing cards), "Oicho," in which players compete to score points with 2 to 3 cards, and "Hana Matching," in which players draw all cards on the field and compete to score points with the last role they have made.

game.name: Honkaku Shougi - Shougi Ou
game.desc: Software that allows you to enjoy authentic Shogi in a leisurely manner. You can choose from three levels of difficulty and challenge 50 problems.

game.name: Honkaku Taisen Shougi Ayumu
game.desc: Shogi game with full-fledged thinking algorithm. In addition to the regular game, there is a "Classroom" mode with 100 Tsume-shogi problems. You can improve your skill level.

game.path: ./Honkaku Yonin Uchi Mahjong - Mahjong Ou (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Honkaku Yonin Uchi Mahjong - Mahjong Ou
game.desc: An authentic mahjong game with the computer's thinking level set high. The game can be played in two modes: a story mode in which the player goes through training to challenge for the championship, and a free game mode.

game.path: ./Hot Wheels - Stunt Track Driver (USA, Europe) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Hot Wheels : Stunt Track Driver
game.desc: Un corredor de acrobacias de desplazamiento lateral en el que el jugador es recompensado con bonificaciones de velocidad por cada acrobacia. Las pistas se basan en las pistas de juguete con las que todos los niños están familiarizados. El juego es algo similar a Excitebike en que el jugador debe hacer saltos y aterrizarlos correctamente para completar cada pista. El jugador tiene la capacidad de rodar y girar mientras está en el aire y es recompensado con una bonificación de velocidad por cada truco exitoso. Cuanto más grande sea el truco, más rápido vas. El juego cuenta con 6 autos Hot Wheels con licencia y 6 pistas. También hay un modo de enlace de dos jugadores.

game.name: Hoyle Card Games
game.desc: La popular colección de juegos de cartas para Game Boy Color. Incluye 14 variaciones de juegos de cartas: Picas, Guerra, Corazones, Cribbage, Old Maid, Gin Rummy, Go Fish y 6 variedades de Solitario. Admite un juego de pase y multijugador Game Link Cable.

game.name: Hoyle Casino
game.desc: This game is the portable version of Hoyle Casino. Besides the obvious graphical differences, it contains a smaller amount of slot and video poker machines to play. Like its namesake on the PC and consoles, the game features a variety of casino themed games. You start off with a sum of money and try to make your fortune in a casino playing various games.

game.name: Hugo
game.desc:
La esposa de Hugo, Hugolina, es secuestrada por el Rey Cornudo, gobernante del castillo de Arbarus, después de aceptar su invitación; y Hugo tiene que liberarla y derrotar al Rey.
En realidad es una conversión de Mickey Mouse por Kemco.

game.name: Hugo : Black Diamond Fever
game.desc: The evil Scylla is back and this time has found a way to make herself the most powerful witch of all time and take over the world. For this, she requires very rare black diamonds, which are to be found on the jungle island where the Kikurians live. She takes them all prisoner and forces them to work day and night in search of black diamonds. The elder King Kikurian asks Hugo the troll to liberate the slaves and stop Scylla's plot before it is too late. When Fernando arrives a letter from King Kikurian, Hugo reads it, but finds poor King Kikurian imprisoned in a cell and unable to help his people, and has absolutely no time to waste. Can Hugo free all the slaves and stop Scylla's plot?

game.name: Hugo : The Evil Mirror
game.desc: The wicked witch Scylla wants to get rid of Hugo the troll once and for all. She has used her powers to trap Hugo in a magic mirror that she then cracked it into three pieces and magically scattered the fragments across the world. Scylla also once again kidnapped Hugo's wife, Hugolina. Hugo and Hugolina's three children, Rit, Rat, and Ruth, are the only ones who can free their parents. To break the witch's curse, each child must find a piece of the broken mirror. If the kids put the mirror together, Hugo is able to defeat Mirror Scylla and break the spell. After the fight Hugo gets out of the mirror, traps Scylla in it and smashes it into little pieces, and saves Hugolina.

game.name: Hunter X Hunter - Hunter No Keifu
game.desc: A simulation game that recreates the world of the popular Weekly Shonen Jump comic "HUNTER x HUNTER". Players challenge the Hunter Examination along with familiar characters such as Gon and Hisoka. The game is not just a battle SLG, but also requires various actions depending on the exam, such as cooking (item synthesis).

game.name: Hunter X Hunter - Kindan No Hihou
game.desc: Hunter X Hunter: Kindan no Hihou is an Action game, developed by ITL and published by Konami, which was released in Japan in 2001.

game.name: Hype : The Time Quest
game.desc: Hype: The Time Quest para Game Boy Color te permite jugar como Hype, el caballero de Playmobil, que ha sido enviado atrás en el tiempo por la maldición de Barnak. En 19 niveles de plataforma 2D, debes usar tu espada y tus habilidades de salto para encontrar el camino de regreso a casa. En cada nivel, Hype tiene que encontrar objetos para avanzar al siguiente nivel. Además de su espada, Hype también tiene el control de un arco, para lo cual tiene que comprar flechas, y puede lanzar hechizos que le enseña un mago.

game.name: Konami Winter Games
game.desc: MILLENNIUM WINTER SPORTS allows you to experience the thrill of victory and the agony of defeat in eight winter sports. Try to get through the course as fast a possible in the bobsled; out-skate your opponent to the finish line in speed skating; see who can jump the farthest in two separate ski-jumping events; see if you can pull off twists and flips while flying through the air in the aerials competition; strap on the skis and navigate the downhill course; or strap on a snowboard to navigate the giant slalom course. For the ultimate in snowboarding action, try to impress the judges with your performance on the halfpipe. Practice any of the events in the Challenge mode or try to become the best winter athlete in the world with the Championship mode. All of the action of winter sports can be yours with MILLENNIUM WINTER SPORTS.

game.path: ./Hyper Olympic Series - Track & Field GB (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Hyper Olympic Series - Track & Field GB
game.desc: A sports game in which players run by repeatedly pressing buttons. The aim is to compete in 10 different track and field events over two days, including the javelin and 100-meter run, and win the championship.

game.name: Ide Yousuke No Mahjong Kyoushitsu Gb
game.desc: Mahjong game supervised by Yosuke Ide, well-known for his Todai-style mahjong. While regular tournament games are available, the main attraction is the "Mahjong Classroom". The game offers easy-to-understand lectures on basic rules, rudimentary tile reading, score calculation, etc., with quizzes. This is the perfect introductory software for beginners.

game.path: ./Indiana Jones and the Infernal Machine (USA, Europe) (En,Fr,De).zip
game.name: Indiana Jones and the Infernal Machine
game.desc:
Mientras que las otras versiones del primer juego de Indiana Jones en casi una década son aventuras de acción en 3D inspiradas en Tomb Raider, esta edición es diferente, ya que se ve desde arriba en pseudo-3D con movimiento multidireccional.
