La trama implica a unos comunistas que intentan reconstruir una antigua máquina del tiempo, cuyas piezas están repartidas en 19 niveles.
En cada uno de ellos hay que resolver puzzles basados en gran parte en interruptores, y diferentes rutas para completarlos. Indy está armado con una pistola, una ametralladora, granadas y su omnipresente látigo. Cada nivel tiene una contraseña y termina con un clip que hace avanzar la historia. Además de los soviéticos, los enemigos son escorpiones, serpientes y medusas.

game.name: Inspector Gadget : Operation Madkactus
game.desc: El malvado Dr. Claw está a punto de liberar el mortal virus MadKactus en el mundo, y el inspector Gadget debe detenerlo. Dado que Gadget siempre necesita un poco de ayuda, su sobrina Sophie y su perro Sultán están listos para hacer su contribución. Tú, como el enigmático Inspector, tendrás que abrirte camino a través de 20 niveles que abarcan cinco mundos diferentes. Afortunadamente, muchos de sus famosos gadgets están disponibles para ayudar, incluidos el helicóptero, los brazos de resorte, los patines propulsados por cohetes y el sombrero de martillo. Si hay algo que no puedes hacer como Gadget, puedes cambiar de personaje y usar Sophie o Sultán para superar un obstáculo o resolver un rompecabezas. ¡Reúne tus gadgets y prepárate para salvar al mundo del Dr. Claw!

game.name: International Karate 2000
game.desc: International Karate 2000 es un remake del clásico beat 'em up International Karate en el que juegas como un nuevo participante en el campeonato internacional de karate y viajas por el mundo con la esperanza de derrotar a cada campeón local en combates. El juego se desarrolla desde una vista lateral sin desplazamiento, y tus ataques se determinan mediante combinaciones de los botones de ataque y las flechas de dirección. La versión de GBC también añade una barra de salud que influye en tu rendimiento y un sistema basado en rondas. Además, se han rediseñado todos los gráficos y se ha ampliado la selección de personajes, que ahora incluye 12 personajes jugables, cada uno de ellos de un país diferente.

game.name: Cross Country Racing
game.desc: International Rally is a rally game with 20 courses and 14 cars which differ in speed, acceleration and adhesion. During the tournament, the player has the possibility to upgrade the car, e.g. a better engine or a speed enhancement, and adjust the damper and tires according to the known weather conditions of the next race. The effectiveness of the car components wears down over the course of the tournament. Other available playing modes are single rallies, time races and duels with a human opponent.

game.name: International Superstar Soccer 2000
game.desc:
International Superstar Soccer 2000 is an updated version of International Superstar Soccer 99 also for the Game Boy Color. This time you can choose between 36 national teams from all over the world. Game options have been improved to cover not only an International Cup, but also a mini league, mini tournament and penalty kicks.
Game time can be set to either 3, 5 or 7 minutes and there are 5 difficulty levels for the computer. You can also choose what type of extra time you want, extended or golden goal. Other options that can be turned on or off are fouls, yellow cards and offside.
Graphics for this 2000 version have been thoroughly improved.

game.name: International Superstar Soccer 99
game.desc: International Superstar Soccer 99 es un juego de fútbol en donde puedes jugar un partido de 1 jugador, un partido de 2 jugadores o jugar una copa internacional. El juego no cuenta con una licencia oficial, por lo que todos los nombres de los jugadores solo se parecen mucho a los nombres reales de los jugadores. Hay 32 equipos nacionales para jugar. Cuando estás en la defensa, puedes deslizarte y cambiar de jugador. Mientras estás en ataque puedes hacer un pase o un tiro. Mientras la pelota está en el aire, es posible hacer un cabezazo o una patada de bicicleta. El juego se muestra desde el lado del campo, excepto durante los penaltis, cuando la cámara apunta directamente a la portería.

game.name: International Track & Field
game.desc: With International Track & Field it takes a little bit more to be a champion. Ten grueling decathalon events put your stamina and your will power to the test as you battle it out with athletes from around the world. Heart-pumping gameplay and vibrant graphics truly capture the pageantry of International competition. Be careful not to get too caught up in the global spotlight - or you may find yourself missing from the victory podium!

game.name: International Track & Field : Summer Games
game.desc: International Track & Field: Summer Games is a Gameboy sports game offering ten disciplines: the 100-meter sprint, the long jump, the javelin throw, the 100-meter freestyle, the 110-meter hurdles, the height, pole vault, pommel horse, clay pigeon shooting and table tennis.

game.name: Cross Country Racing
game.desc: International Rally is a rally game with 20 courses and 14 cars which differ in speed, acceleration and adhesion. During the tournament, the player has the possibility to upgrade the car, e.g. a better engine or a speed enhancement, and adjust the damper and tires according to the known weather conditions of the next race. The effectiveness of the car components wears down over the course of the tournament. Other available playing modes are single rallies, time races and duels with a human opponent.

game.name: Itsudemo Pachinko Gb - Cr Monster House
game.desc: The "Hissatsu Pachinko" series, popular on PlayStation and other platforms, is now also available in GB. The popular CR Monster House is included. A nail adjustment mode and a mode to view reach patterns are provided, allowing players to thoroughly study CR Monster House.

game.name: J.league Excite Stage Gb
game.desc: Game Boy version of the popular "Excite Stage" soccer game series. The game also has a mode in which players compete for the number of spectators in a communication match using a communication cable.

game.name: J.league Excite Stage Tactics
game.desc: Become a manager of the real J-League and train and trade players to win the championship. If you perform well, you can lead the Japanese national team to challenge the world.

game.path: ./Jack no Daibouken - Daimaou no Gyakushuu (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Quest : Brian's Journey
game.desc: Brian lives in a peaceful and quiet town where nothing ever happens, which is the way everyone likes it. Suddenly, hordes of evildoers overrun the town and start wreaking havoc in this once-sleepy community. The town is counting on Brian to go on a quest to restore peace and harmony. You take control of the unlikely hero and set out on the adventure of a lifetime. While traveling, you will discover something more nefarious is happening, and you'll have your hands full of monsters and enemies. Throughout your journey you will have to battle these monsters and enemies in turn-based combat with a twist. The twist is that you can move between turns to dodge attacks, and you can also combine spells and attacks to create special moves. Help Brian save his town, and maybe even the world, in QUEST RPG: Brian's Journey.

game.name: Jagainu-kun
game.desc: A rhythm action game featuring the popular character "Jaga-inu-kun". Manipulate Jaga-inu-kun rhythmically to dance to the model's movements.

game.name: Jankyuusei - Cosplay Paradise
game.desc: The characters are "classmates" and "underclassmen" in a love simulation. As the advisor of a high school mahjong club, he moves around the school, talking and playing mahjong with the students and gathering members for the club. In addition, the players can dress their club members in clothes and other items they have collected during the game by winning games.

game.name: Janosch - Das Grosse Panama-spiel
game.desc: In this game, the player has to overcome obstacles, solve puzzles, and outsmart evil pirates who have their own plans with those two. Based on the world created by the German children's book author Janosch, this game aims at young children.

game.name: Jeff Gordon XS Racing
game.desc: You can experience the future of racing today with JEFF GORDON XS RACING. Choose from five different cars and race on seven different tracks. You can use the Time Trial mode to get the fastest lap time possible on an empty track. In the Championship mode, you will have to race through two seasons. The first season has you racing against five other cars, and you must finish in first place overall to gain access to the second season. In the second season you will face seven other competitors, including Jeff Gordon. Win the second season, and you can challenge Gordon to a one-on-one race on any track you choose. Should your friends want in on the action, they can join you via a link cable. Get behind the wheel of a futuristic racecar and take first place in JEFF GORDON XS RACING.

game.name: Jeremy McGrath Supercross 2000
game.desc: Esta versión para llevar de Jeremy McGrath Supercross 2000 es un juego de carreras de arriba hacia abajo, que presenta dos modos de juego (campeonato y arcade), 6 motociclistas y una variedad de pistas en diferentes escenarios. El modo Temporada presenta 3 campeonatos, cada uno con tres etapas compuestas por cuatro carreras. El objetivo es ganar las 9 medallas de oro obteniendo más puntos que la competencia. El modo Arcade es el mismo, excepto que todos los campeonatos y etapas, así como Jeremy McGrath, se desbloquean desde el principio. La diferencia entre campeonatos es el tamaño del motor: con motos más grandes (por lo tanto, más rápidas), el jugador tiene menos tiempo para reaccionar, y enfrentarse cara a cara en el borde de la pista puede ser una cuestión de un simple bache de 80 cc a un salto espectacular. en las gradas en 250cc, también porque se vuelve mucho más difícil hacer curvas cerradas en un espacio limitado. Si bien se puede jugar como un juego de carreras sencillo, al realizar trucos, el jugador puede obtener algunos potenciadores: una bomba derribará al próximo oponente, la flecha aumenta temporalmente las estadísticas de la bicicleta y el escudo le permite al jugador irrumpir en un oponente, derribándolo. fuera de su bicicleta. Hay un gran inconveniente: el cráneo y los huesos derriban al jugador de su bicicleta, lo que puede resultar decisivo en una carrera reñida.

game.path: ./Jet de Go! - Let's Go by Airliner (Japan).zip
game.name: Jet De Go!
game.desc: The objective of this driving simulator is not only to fly an airplane but also to transport passengers safely and reliably to their destinations, and thanks to the full cooperation of JAL, all aircraft, schedules, routes, and airports can be played using actual aircraft. In addition to the main "Cruise Mode," the game also includes a "Flight Mode," in which your piloting skills are evaluated, and an "Extra Mode," in which you can enjoy mini-games.

game.name: The Muppets
game.desc: Dr. Bunsen Honeydew has developed a new time machine, so he invites all of the Muppets over to see the new invention. However, something goes awry and the Muppets are sent back in time. Fortunately, Kermit and Animal were running late and were not involved in the mishap. Now these two must travel back in time and rescue their friends. You will take control of Kermit and Animal as they travel through six different time periods that contain a total of 24 levels. Help Kermit defeat enemies with paper airplanes, and use his super jump to collect items. Animal will pound enemies into submission with drumsticks and will shake items loose with his stomp. Will the two heroes be able to save the gang? Find out by playing JIM HENSON'S MUPPETS.

game.name: Jimmy White's Cueball
game.desc:
Jimmy White, nicknamed "Whirlwind" is one of the world's greatest pool players. Dubbed the "People's Champion" of Snooker, he is renowned for his style, fair play, and ability to make shots that are truly magical.
- Single or Two Player Mode - Play Straight Pool, 8 Ball, 9 Ball or Snooker - Shot Options for Slice, English, and Power - Four different characters to choose from

game.path: ./Jinsei Game - Tomodachi Takusan Tsukurou yo! (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Jinsei Game - Tomodachi Takusan Tsukurou Yo!
game.desc: The latest installment of the well-known board game "The Game of Life". Create your character in a montage and start the game from a baby. Aim to become a millionaire while improving your abilities.

game.name: Jisedai Begoma Battle Beyblade
game.desc: The game is an RPG based on the game of "BAGOMA", in which each BAGOMA has its own attribute, such as stone, electricity, etc., and can be used for special moves specific to its attribute.

game.name: Jissen Ni Yakudatsu Tsumego
game.desc: Tsumego software with a total of 100 carefully selected problems, provided by the Nihon Ki-in Foundation. As the name "useful for real games" implies, the computer does its best to answer back even when the user plays a move other than the correct one. This allows the user to learn correct and incorrect moves in a real game format.

game.path: ./Joryuu Janshi ni Chousen GB - Watashi-tachi ni Chousen Shitene! (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Joryuu Janshi ni Chousen GB - Watashi-tachi ni Cho
game.desc: You can play against 6 female mahjong players. Each mahjong player has a separate room and plays mahjong. If you clear the conditions set for each room, you can advance to the next room.

game.name: JumpStart Dino Adventure : Field Trip
game.desc: JumpStart Dino Adventure: Field Trip es un juego lanzado por Knowledge Adventure para Game Boy Color en 2001. Se centra en los conceptos de preescolar y jardín de infantes. En este juego, Frankie es enviado de regreso a la época de los dinosaurios usando la Máquina del Tiempo. Conoce a una madre pterosaurio, cuyos huevos han desaparecido.

game.name: Jungle Book : Mowgli's Wild Adventure, The
game.desc: Mowgli's Wild Adventure is a typical 2D platform game for the Game Boy Color. You play as the young Mowgli who can walk, jump, run, climb and crawl. Levels come in various jungle related themes including a ruined temple. Mowgli learns a new special move in each level. He can throw fruit at hostile animals to defend himself. Furthermore Mowgli has to interact with his environment by pulling switches to open doors or douse fire with water. You can collect diamonds for extra lives and apples for health. In each boss level you have to collect seven icons in a race to win the stage.

game.name: Jurassic Boy 2
game.desc: Jurrasic Boy 2: In the dinosaur family, Chen is the smartest. Now his parents and brothers are all falling into Crachi's clutches. So the urgency for Chen is to save his family from the clutches of the villain. This game is a platform game, There are 4 worlds divided into 7 levels.

game.name: Jurassic Boy II + Thunder Blast Man
Juukou Senki Bullet Battlers
game.desc: In this RPG, you control a robot called "Battler" and fight against enemies, copying enemy data in battle, combining and evolving Battlers, and searching for the legendary Battler.

game.name: K.o. - The Pro Boxing
game.desc: A simulation to train professional boxers and become world champions. Depending on the training, various types of fighters can be created, such as power fighters and out boxers. The fights are action games in which the player directly controls the fighter, and the player's skill is put to the test.

game.name: Kaitei Densetsu!! Treasure World
game.desc: Use submarines and balloons to pull up treasure that has sunk into the sea, and aim for "World Treasure," the place where an ancient civilization lies. In the area you are investigating, you may even fight rivals. ＊Kakurenbo Battle Monster Tactics Defeat the monsters in the dungeon and win the competition. The "montaku," which are the proof of defeating monsters, are used to obtain various skills for use in battle.

game.name: Kakurenbo Battle Monster Tactics
game.desc: Defeat the monsters in the dungeon and win the competition. The "montaku," which are the proof of defeating monsters, are used to obtain various skills for use in battle.

game.path: ./Kakutou Ryouri Densetsu Bistro Recipe - Gekitou Foodon Battle Hen (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Kakutou Ryouri Densetsu Bistro Recipe - Gekitou Fo
game.desc: The game is an RPG in which players battle rivals using "foodons," monsters that are created by combining and cooking ingredients.

game.path: ./Kakutou Ryouri Densetsu Bistro Recipe - Kettou Bistgarm Hen (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Kakutou Ryouri Densetsu Bistro Recipe - Kettou Bis
game.desc: This is the second installment of an RPG in which players cook ingredients to create monsters called "foodon" and battle them in a series of battles. A total of 180 foodons, including new species, will appear in the game.

game.name: Kanji Boy
game.desc: A collection of kanji questions supervised by the Japan Kanji Aptitude Testing Foundation, containing questions from the past Kanji tests for levels 2 to 7. By answering the questions in a quiz format, you can evaluate your ability.

game.name: Kanji Boy 2
game.desc: Contains the latest questions from the Kanji Proficiency Test, which measures proficiency in kanji. The quiz format makes it easy to study kanji in a playful way. In addition, the difficulty levels for this title have been expanded from 2 to 10, and the overall volume has been considerably increased.

game.name: Kanji Boy 3
game.desc: Contains 7,000 questions from the Japan Kanji Proficiency Test approved by the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology (MEXT) up to June 2002. 12 ranks of questions are available for players to choose from to study at their own level.

game.name: Kanji De Puzzle
game.desc: Three puzzles can be enjoyed, including one in which the player must erase the piles of kanji pieces on the screen while forming idioms with them. There is also a Kanji quiz that can be completed by answering 100 questions correctly.

game.name: Kanzume Monsters Parfait
game.desc: New version of "Kanzumo Monster," a monster-breeding simulation game. Events are linked to the game and real time with a built-in clock function.

game.path: ./Karamuchou wa Oosawagi! - Okawari! (Japan) (SGB Enhanced, GB Compatible) (NP).zip
game.name: Karamuchou Wa Oosawagi! - Okawari!
game.desc: A special Nintendo-Power version of "Karamuchou wa Oosawagi! Porinkiis to Okashina Nakamatachi" released in December 1998. The game system is the same, but all stages have been replaced with new ones.

game.path: ./Karamuchou wa Oosawagi! - Polinkies to Okashina Nakama-tachi (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Karamuchou wa Oosawagi! - Polinkies to Okashina Na
game.desc: An action puzzle game featuring the mascot character of sweets. To obtain the legendary five sweets, players must collect the keys in each stage while avoiding enemies.

game.name: Karate Joe
game.desc: There's a new boss in town, and his gangs are taking over the city. He's got thugs on every corner waiting to take you out. But you're not a run-of-the-mill videogame character. You're Karate Joe, and you're going to fight your way through 18 levels to free the city in this side-scrolling action-adventure.

game.path: ./Kaseki Sousei Reborn II - Monster Digger (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Kaseki Sousei Reborn II - Monster Digger
game.desc: An RPG in which players collect fossil fragments and reanimate various creatures; a friendship level setting that affects game development has been added, and monsters can be exchanged via communication cable.

game.path: ./Katou Hifumi Kudan - Shougi Kyoushitsu (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Katou Hifumi Kudan - Shougi Kyoushitsu
game.desc: There are as many as 173 tsume-shogi problems and a mode in which you can challenge problems created especially for this game by "Ippizo Kato" 9-dan, allowing you to learn Shogi in a realistic way.

game.path: ./Kawa no Nushi Tsuri 4 (Japan) (Rumble Version) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Legend of the River King 2
game.desc:
More fishing adventures on the Game Boy. This time, there are plenty more fish and other river creatures that you can catch and collect, including 60 types of fish, shellfish, plants and insects. Other animals living around the river can smell your catch and may attack you.
A new element in the game is the ability to trade your fish, etc. with other players. Link up with another friend to trade your catch, either in Legend of the River King 2 or another Natsume title, Harvest Moon.

game.name: Kawaii Pet Shop Monogatari
game.desc: An RPG in which you manage a pet store while raising animals, searching for medicinal herbs to cure grandma's illness, and fulfilling various requests to make the store prosper.

game.name: Kawaii Pet Shop Monogatari 2
game.desc: Manage your pet store by fulfilling customer requests to capture, raise, and rent pets. Using a communication cable, you can exchange pets and play against each other.

game.name: Keep the Balance
game.desc: Keep the balance! is a puzzle game, where you have to balance a big weighing scale. The longer it stays in balance the more point you gain. To do this, you have a catapult at your disposal, the objects you need to use to balance the scale are given to you by conveyor belt. One on the left and one on the right. But these objects differ in weight, so you must carefully choose the scales bucket you're going to put the objects in. To make things worse, all kinds of trouble appear on screen to make it just a little bit more challenging. Like crocodiles that eat object or jokers that throw around playing cards offsetting your carefully balance scale. The game stages 5 different game worlds each divided into 16 levels.

game.name: Keibajou E Ikou! Wide
game.desc: Software that allows you to make predictions on the leading horses by simply entering the odds of a single horse. The software analyzes races based on the past six years' results by course and odds information. The software also allows users to make subtle adjustments to the forecasting policy, such as "leave it to me," "make a solid decision," and "aim for a big hole.

game.name: Keitai Denjuu Telefang - Power Version
game.desc:
In 2020 AD, it became popular to go to the "Denjukai" using a mobile phone, make friends with "Denju", and have them give you a phone number.
The main character, Shigeki, lived a life unrelated to such an "electric beast boom", but decided to go to the electric beast world with the appearance of one electric beast. To make new friends in the electric beast world.
This game makes full use of futuristic mobile phone D shots in the electric beast world (the world of this game), win a telefang (battle) with electric beasts (monsters living in the electric beast world), and make friends with strong electric beasts. It's a new RPG that solves the mystery of the electric beast world while getting a phone number!!!
A "Telefang Power Antenna" is included in the package of only the "Telefang Power Antenna Bundled Version" for the first production!
If you attach it to the communication connector of the Game Boy and play the game, the antenna will shine when you make a call to your friend Denju or receive a call from Denju during the game!!!

game.name: Keitai Denjuu Telefang - Speed Version
game.desc:
In 2020 AD, it became popular to go to the "Denjukai" using a mobile phone, make friends with "Denju", and have them give you a phone number.
The main character, Shigeki, lived a life unrelated to such an "electric beast boom", but decided to go to the electric beast world with the appearance of one electric beast. To make new friends in the electric beast world.
This game makes full use of futuristic mobile phone D-shots in the electric beast world (the world of this game), win a telefang (battle) with electric beasts (monsters living in the electric beast world), and make friends with strong electric beasts. It's a new RPG that solves the mystery of the electric beast world while getting a phone number!!!
A "Telefang Power Antenna" is included in the package of only the "Telefang Power Antenna Bundled Version" for the first production!
If you attach it to the communication connector of the Game Boy and play the game, the antenna will shine when you make a call to your friend Denju or receive a call from Denju during the game!!!

game.name: Ken Griffey Jr.'s Slugfest
game.desc: Con el objetivo de lograr un mayor realismo, Slugfest elimina muchos elementos arcade del título original de Ken Griffey N64 y los reemplaza con más elementos de estilo de simulación. Por segunda vez, las nuevas incorporaciones incluyen alineaciones y estadísticas actualizadas del equipo, una nueva perspectiva detrás de la cámara del lanzador y un nuevo modo de creación de jugadores. También se incluye soporte completo para 4 jugadores en modo derby de jonrones y exhibición de 2 jugadores, mientras que el paquete de expansión permite resoluciones más altas para jugadores y estadios.

game.path: ./Kettou Transformers Beast Wars - Beast Senshi Saikyou Ketteisen (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Kettou Beast Wars - Beast Senshi Saikyou Ketteisen
game.desc:
Duel Fight Transformers Beast Wars: Beast Warriors' Strongest Decisive Battle is a fighting game for the Game Boy Color system.
It features combatants from Beast Wars, Beast Wars II and Beast Wars Neo.

game.name: Kidou Senkan Nadesico - Ruri Ruri Mahjong
game.desc: You can enjoy mahjong using characters from the anime of the same name. In the scenario mode, a mahjong match for the position of captain of the Nadesico unfolds. The way the game is played reflects the character's personality.

game.name: Kikansha Thomas - Sodor-tou No Nakama-tachi
game.desc: An adventure based on the popular TV show "Thomas the Tank Engine". Operate Thomas to connect the broken tracks. Four mini-games are also available.

game.path: ./Kindaichi Shounen no Jikenbo - 10 Nenme no Shoutaijou (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Kindaichi Shounen no Jikenbo - 10nenme no Shoutaij
game.desc: You become Kindaichi, a familiar character from the comics, and solve the murder case. The scenario and ending will change depending on the choices you make in your actions and conversations, and the questions you ask during the investigation.

game.path: ./Kinniku Banzuke GB - Chousensha wa Kimida! (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Kinniku Banzuke Gb - Chousensha Wa Kimida!
game.desc: The popular TV show "Muscle Watch" is now available as an action game. The game includes five popular events, including "Struck Out" and "Monster Box.

game.path: ./Kinniku Banzuke GB 2 - Mezase! Muscle Champion (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Kinniku Banzuke Gb2 - Mezase! Muscle Champion
game.desc: A total of six types of games can be played, including "Sanshoku Muscle," a competition from the TV program "Muscle Watch. The game can be played by pressing the buttons at the right time or by hitting them in rapid succession. Two players can also play against each other.

game.name: Kinniku Banzuke Gb3 - Shinseiki Survival Retsuden!
game.desc: Control Kane, the monkey, and other characters to compete in numerous competitions. New competitions such as Power Force and SASUKE 2000 have been added to this title. You can compete with your friends by using a communication cable.

game.name: Kirby : Tilt 'n' Tumble
game.desc:
King Dedede is at it again, this time taking all of the stars from the sky. Thankfully for Dreamland, Kirby has returned to stop the evil King once more. But this time, he will need your help more then ever before.
Kirby has been turned into a ball, and it is up to you to tilt and turn the game table so that Kirby can dodge enemies and get the the end goal. To do this, you must actually tilt the Game Boy Color/Advance console, thanks to the inbuilt motion sensor in the cartridge. Every move you make determines where the little pink ball goes.

game.name: Kirikou
game.desc: Join Kirikou in his amazing adventures! Help him uncover the dark secret of Karaba The Sorceress, and save his village...

game.name: Kisekae Series 2 - Oshare Nikki
game.desc: Spend a year before high school graduation doing club activities and dating. Working part-time will allow you to buy new clothes, cosmetics, and enjoy a variety of fashionable activities.

game.name: Kisekae Series 3 - Kisekae Hamster
game.desc: Collect hamster clothes and dress them up with hats, accessories, etc. You can also play board games based on the three years of student life, or tell your character's fortune.

game.name: Klax
game.desc: Un juego de acción y rompecabezas, el objetivo es atrapar las piezas de colores que caen y crear filas, columnas o diagonales de un solo color. Cada nivel requiere un patrón diferente, y las fichas caen más rápido, más a la vez, y en un número creciente de colores a medida que avanza el juego.

game.name: Klustar
game.desc: KLUSTAR takes TETRIS and twists it around. Rather than moving falling pieces, you must move and rotate a group of pieces that is stuck together. The goal is to get the moving pieces to stick together, forming a solid square of blocks. One that is done, the square disappears and the remaining pieces collapse inward, creating more room to maneuver. If you miss a piece, it will stick to the sides of the play area and cannot be removed. The game ends when the cluster of pieces becomes so big that it cannot fit into the screen. With 16 skill levels, the degree of challenge is always appropriate. If friends want to join the action, they can via a link cable. See how long you can last in KLUSTAR.

game.name: Knockout Kings
game.desc: Professional boxing comes to the Game Boy Color with KNOCKOUT KINGS. Choose from 38 professional boxers from all weight classes including Evander Holyfield, Ike Quartey, Lennox Lewis, Michael Moore, Shane Mosley, Oscar De La Hoya, "Sugar" Ray Leonard, and Muhammad Ali. For some quick action, choose any two boxers and enter an Arcade match. Arcade matches are less realistic and can result in quick knockouts. However, you can also choose to play in a simulation Exhibition match, where you must master ring strategies and wear down your opponent. If you are looking for a real challenge, create a boxer and fight through the ranks and become world champion. KNOCKOUT KINGS brings the subtlety of the sweet science to your handheld, without having pay outrageous pay-per-view prices.

game.path: ./Koenig der Loewen, Der - Simbas grosses Abenteuer (Germany).zip
game.name: Lion King : Simba's Mighty Adventure, The
game.desc: As the young lion prince Simba, you'll grow to discover what it means to be rightful ruler of the Pride Lands. But first you'll have to outrun a wildebeest stampede, escape a wildfire and more! There's never a dull moment when you're King of the Beasts!

game.path: ./Koguru Guruguru - Guruguru to Nakayoshi (Japan) (SGB Enhanced, GB Compatible) (NP).zip
game.name: Koguru Guruguru - Guruguru To Nakayoshi
game.desc: A game in which you teach words to a creature called "Guru" and make friends with it.

game.name: Konami GB Collection Vol.1
game.desc: 4 títulos de Konami en un carro: Gradius: un shooter de acción de desplazamiento lateral, donde el objetivo es esquivar el fuego enemigo y llegar al final de cada nivel para enfrentarse al personaje principal. Cada nivel también incluye potenciadores que flotan para que los recojas, lo que aumenta tu defensa o ataque. Castlevania Adventure: interpretas a Simon Belmont, que es el único capaz de enfrentarse al Conde Drácula. Debes viajar a través de su castillo, usando tu látigo para acabar con los enemigos, mientras que batir velas te dará potenciadores para aumentar el poder del látigo. Un juego de plataformas de desplazamiento lateral. Probotector: también conocido como Contra, eres un guerrero solitario encargado de la tarea de defender el planeta de los alienígenas invasores. Corre a través de cada nivel de desplazamiento lateral y usa todas las armas disponibles para derrotar al enemigo. Konami Racing: carreras de F-1 de arriba hacia abajo donde cuanto más alto termines en cada carrera, mejores serán los puntos al final para determinar el ganador general. Puedes competir solo en una carrera de prueba o practicar contra otros autos antes de enfrentarte al Circuito Mundial, que consta de múltiples carreras en diferentes pistas. Cada juego es totalmente compatible con Game Boy Color y Game Boy.

game.name: Konami GB Collection Vol.2
game.desc:
4 more classic Konami titles bundled on the one cart.
On this occasion, the games are Parodius (an R-type style shooter with plenty of humor and crazy characters); Block Game (much the same as Tetris, although here falling shapes must be shot at by your ship at the bottom of the screen, to form a type of square shape. By doing so, the blocks are removed from the screen); Track and Field (a collection of track and field events including the 100m sprint, hurdles, long jump, triple jump and more); and finally, Frogger, the classic top-down puzzle game where the aim is to move your little frog across the road and the pond, dodging cars and crocodiles along the way to the lilipad.
Again, all games can be played in color on the GBC, or in black and white on the original Game Boy console.

game.name: Konami GB Collection Vol.3
game.desc: 4 títulos de estilo arcade están empacados juntos en un carrito para GBC. Se incluyen: Pop'n Twinbee: un juego de disparos de arriba hacia abajo donde la pantalla se mueve de arriba hacia abajo, con enemigos por todas partes. Derriba nubes para recolectar potenciadores y esquiva a los coloridos personajes que intentan derribarte. Mystical Ninja: una versión actualizada de una antigua aventura de estilo RPG de Game Boy ve a Goemon para salvar a su amigo Ebisumaru. Viaja de pueblo en pueblo, lucha contra enemigos al estilo Zelda mientras resuelves acertijos y recolectas elementos para usar más adelante en la pista. Bikers: también conocido como Motocross Maniacs en los EE. UU., debes correr tu bicicleta a través de varias pistas desde un lado, acumulando impulsos de velocidad y saltando grandes brechas para llegar primero a la línea de meta. Guttang Gottung: un juego de rompecabezas único en el que debes intercambiar fichas para llevar tu tren a cada estación en el espacio de la cuadrícula. Cada mosaico tiene una sección de vía, que debe usarse para evitar que el tren se estrelle.

game.name: Konami GB Collection Vol.4
game.desc:
The fourth Konami classics compilation includes two sequels: Gradius II & Castlevania II, and two original titles: Antarctic Adventure & Yie Ar Kung Fu.
Gradius II: Return of the Hero continues the side-scrolling shoot 'em up adventure from the previous title (as seen in Konami GB Collection Vol. 1). 5 levels await, each with a collection of bad guys, end of level bosses, and collectable upgrades for power, speed, attack and defense. You can also practice the first four levels.
Castlevania II: Belmont's Revenge has you returning to battle Dracula, this time as Christopher Belmont. A total of four castles are waiting to be tackled head on in any order you choose. Once they are defeated (each on including an boss), you can then enter Dracula's castle to take on the big bad vamp himself. Your whip, holy water and the holy cross are the only things protecting you from the undead.
Antarctic Adventure is a 3rd person racing style game, where you must race your pengiun through the ice covered levels, past obstacles and other enemies to the end goal before the time runs out.
Yie Ar Kung Fu is a one-on-one fighting game, where each enemy you face increases in difficulty. Defeat the five opponents, and then get ready to fight them again at an even harder difficulty level. Throwing stars, climbing up walls and hand to hand combat all come into play.

game.name: Konami Winter Games
game.desc: MILLENNIUM WINTER SPORTS allows you to experience the thrill of victory and the agony of defeat in eight winter sports. Try to get through the course as fast a possible in the bobsled; out-skate your opponent to the finish line in speed skating; see who can jump the farthest in two separate ski-jumping events; see if you can pull off twists and flips while flying through the air in the aerials competition; strap on the skis and navigate the downhill course; or strap on a snowboard to navigate the giant slalom course. For the ultimate in snowboarding action, try to impress the judges with your performance on the halfpipe. Practice any of the events in the Challenge mode or try to become the best winter athlete in the world with the Championship mode. All of the action of winter sports can be yours with MILLENNIUM WINTER SPORTS.

game.name: Konchuu Fighters
game.desc: Raise the larvae to adulthood by feeding and training them. Once they reach adulthood, they are ready to fight enemies. When they use their skills in battle, their level increases and their power increases.

game.name: Konchuu Hakase 2
game.desc: An RPG in which users collect insects, train them, and complete their illustrated books. 250 kinds of insects appear in the game. Train the insects you catch and aim to win at the fair.

game.name: Konchuu Hakase 3
game.desc: Collect insects in the town to complete your illustrated book. In total, more than 250 kinds of insects appear in the book. Using a communication cable, you can exchange insects with your friends.

game.name: Kirby : Tilt 'n' Tumble
game.desc:
King Dedede is at it again, this time taking all of the stars from the sky. Thankfully for Dreamland, Kirby has returned to stop the evil King once more. But this time, he will need your help more then ever before.
Kirby has been turned into a ball, and it is up to you to tilt and turn the game table so that Kirby can dodge enemies and get the the end goal. To do this, you must actually tilt the Game Boy Color/Advance console, thanks to the inbuilt motion sensor in the cartridge. Every move you make determines where the little pink ball goes.

game.name: Koto Battle - Tengai No Morihito
game.desc: An RPG in which players create monsters and magic cards from "kotodama," words with power, and use them in battle.

game.name: Kou Dai Guai Shou - Dong Zuo Pian
Kou Dai Yao Guai - Bai Jin Ban
Koushien Pocket
game.desc: A sports game containing data on 4129 high school baseball schools. Win the preliminary rounds and aim to participate in the Koshien National High School Baseball Tournament. You can play against each other and exchange data of ball players with a communication cable.

game.name: The Land Before Time
game.desc:
Jump'n Run Game for the Game Boy Color featuring the Characters from the Universal Cartoon 'The Land before Time'. Different Characters such as Littlefoot, Cera etc. can be selected during play to reach additional levels.
25 Levels, 3 playable characters. The game consists of simple puzzles based on the character abilities and has a 'maple leaf' collection feature that helps track progress in the game, meaning that it will tell you how much maple leaves you collected out of a total. For extraordinary collection success it grants extra lives.

game.name: Cool Hand
game.desc: Las Vegas is the gambling capital of the world. Every game in the world has some kind of action in Sin City. Now you can travel to Vegas and try to win some virtual dollars in LAS VEGAS COOL HAND. Play three classic card games: Blackjack, Solitaire, and Cribbage. All of the games have four different variations to play. In Blackjack, the goal is to get as close to 21 as possible without going over, while also beating the dealer's hand. Solitaire has the player trying to place stacks of cards in order and removing the cards one by one. The goal in Cribbage is to be the first person to score 121 points. Take a trip to sin city and try to break the bank in LAS VEGAS COOL HAND.

game.name: Laura
game.desc: Laura discovers a diamond in her basement. After her grandfather tells her that diamonds will attract fairies when surrounded by the energy of good deeds, Laura travels throughout the city to find people in need of help. As with most large towns, there are plenty of people in need of assistance, and each of them sends Laura to complete a task. Fortunately, Laura is never in any real danger--if she makes a mistake, she can always repeat any mission. As another stroke of luck, the citizenry is always willing to help her. When she springs into action to help someone, Laura will enter one of 10 different mini-games that include platform jumping and jump rope. Get Laura to help the people in town, and try to call fairies with her diamond in PLAYMOBIL: Laura.

game.name: Le Mans 24 Hours
game.desc: Take a little trip around the world for grueling, 24-hour race action. Based on the annual racing series that takes place in the south of France, this version will lead you from Toronto to Detroit, to the peaks of Everest. Take your pick from 10 real racing vehicles, like the Nissan R390 and the BMW V12VMR. With more than 10 courses to race on, you'll certainly have your work cut out for you. Along the tour, you'll use oil slicks, engine upgrades, invincibility power-ups, and more to get an edge on the competition. The better you do, the more cars you'll be able to unlock, and thereby improving your chances of taking the cup. There are three different play modes: Le Mans pits you against tough competition in a real Le Mans circuit; Championship takes you through a full season; and Arcade allows you play a single race. The graphics are great, the gameplay is smooth, and there are more options than you could ever ask for. Buckle up and put the pedal to the metal!

game.path: ./Legend of the River King 2 (Europe) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Legend of the River King 2
game.desc:
More fishing adventures on the Game Boy. This time, there are plenty more fish and other river creatures that you can catch and collect, including 60 types of fish, shellfish, plants and insects. Other animals living around the river can smell your catch and may attack you.
A new element in the game is the ability to trade your fish, etc. with other players. Link up with another friend to trade your catch, either in Legend of the River King 2 or another Natsume title, Harvest Moon.

game.path: ./Legend of the River King GB (Europe) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Legend of the River King GB
game.desc: Your sister is ill and you must find the Guardian Fish to save her in LEGEND OF THE RIVER KING. Travel throughout the world and blaze trails to find the best fishing holes. Be careful though, because you might have to fight wild animals with your bare hands. You can catch fish with either bait or lures, each with relative strengths and weaknesses. After catching a small one, keep it stress-free in an aquarium and watch it grow. Hopefully, you will be able to find the Guardian Fish and save your sister in LEGEND OF THE RIVER KING.

game.path: ./Legend of the River King GBC (USA) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Legend of the River King GB
game.desc: Your sister is ill and you must find the Guardian Fish to save her in LEGEND OF THE RIVER KING. Travel throughout the world and blaze trails to find the best fishing holes. Be careful though, because you might have to fight wild animals with your bare hands. You can catch fish with either bait or lures, each with relative strengths and weaknesses. After catching a small one, keep it stress-free in an aquarium and watch it grow. Hopefully, you will be able to find the Guardian Fish and save your sister in LEGEND OF THE RIVER KING.

game.path: ./Legend of Zelda, The - Link's Awakening DX (USA, Europe) (Rev 1) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: The Legend of Zelda : Link's Awakening DX
game.desc: Tras salvar Hyrule, Link se va en busca de aventuras. Mientras viajaba a bordo de su barca le sorprende una gran tormenta. Cuando despierta se encuentra en la casa de Marin en la misteriosa isla de Koholin. Tras recuperar su escudo se dirigió a la playa donde fue encontrado en busca de su espada. Tras ello aparece un búho y le dice que para poder salir de la isla deberá de despertar al Pez Viento, para lo cual deberá de recuperar los instrumentos de las sirenas y usarlos frente al gran huevo que se encuentra en lo alto de una montaña. Mientras recorre la isla irá descubriendo los secretos de ésta. En esta edición se introdujeron nuevos elementos, como el álbum de fotos, las cuales podían ser imprimidas usando la Game Boy Printer, y una nueva mazmorra, a la cual solo se puede acceder en Game Boy Color.

game.path: ./Legend of Zelda, The - Oracle of Ages (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It).zip
game.name: The Legend of Zelda : Oracle of Ages
game.desc: The Legend of Zelda: Oracle of Ages ofrece la acción clásica de Zelda, más una abundante porción de novedades y puzles. Link debe viajar por un extenso mundo recogiendo pistas y objetos, explorando mazmorras llenas de feroces monstruos y enrevesados rompecabezas. Al comenzar su andadura, Link utiliza el poder de la Trifuerza para viajar a una nueva tierra conocida como Labrynna. Veran, Hechicera de las Sombras, planea modificar el pasado de Labrynna para así poder gobernar en el presente. Por medio de engaños y artimañas, Veran utiliza el poder de Nayru, Oráculo de los Tiempos, y viaja 400 años al pasado. El presente de Labrynna cambia drásticamente como fruto de las acciones de Veran. Antes de que la Hechicera de las Sombras pueda completar su maquiavélica misión, Link debe utilizar el Arpa de los Tiempos para viajar en el tiempo y recuperar las ocho Esencias.

game.path: ./Legend of Zelda, The - Oracle of Seasons (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It).zip
game.name: The Legend of Zelda : Oracle of Seasons
game.desc: The Legend of Zelda: Oracle of Seasons tiene lugar en la tierra de Holodrum. Después de transportarse mágicamente a este nuevo mundo, Link presencia cómo un general sediento de poder llamado Onox invoca una poderosa tormenta y secuestra al Oráculo de las Estaciones, una bella bailarina de nombre Din. Onox usa el poder de Din para sembrar el caos entre las fuerzas de la naturaleza, de modo que, una vez más, es el deber de Link restablecer la paz. The Legend of Zelda: Oracle of Seasons rebosa retos y aventuras clásicos de Zelda. Link tiene que viajar a través de un extenso mundo recogiendo pistas y objetos, y explorando misteriosas mazmorras repletas de monstruos feroces y enigmáticos puzles.

game.name: LEGO Alpha Team
game.desc: Usando tus habilidades para resolver acertijos, debes liderar el Equipo Alfa y evitar que el Sr. Ogel convierta el mundo en zombis. En lugar de controlar a los personajes en la pantalla, debes colocar bloques de lego, rampas, escaleras, pogo-pads y muchos otros elementos para ayudar al personaje a esquivar enemigos y trampas. Pero ten cuidado, siempre está en movimiento, por lo que debes ser rápido para colocar los elementos en el lugar correcto. Un movimiento en falso, y tienes que empezar todo de nuevo.

game.name: LEGO Island 2 : The Brickster's Revenge
game.desc: Lego Island 2: Brickster's Revenge es la secuela del exitoso juego de PC Lego Island. El juego comienza como un juego de rol en el que viajas por Lego Island, entregas pizzas y hablas con tus conciudadanos. Hasta que escuchas sobre la fuga de Brickster de la prisión y su intento de deconstruir todos los edificios en Lego Island. Juego variado, ya que LEGO Island 2 es en parte un juego de vuelo, en parte un juego de carreras, en parte un ejercicio de paracaidismo y en parte una misión de entrenamiento de astronautas. Interactuarás con alrededor de 50 o más personajes diferentes de Lego Island. En el camino, tendrás que volar biplanos, competir con autos LEGO, comandar transbordadores espaciales y andar en patineta a través de una gran cantidad de áreas basadas en la serie de temas de juego de LEGO, como LEGO Knight's Kingdom y LEGO Adventurers. También se incluyen 18 subjuegos, así como un parque de patinaje con temática de lego donde usted y Pepper pueden probar una tonelada de trucos de patineta en cualquier momento.

game.name: LEGO Racers
game.desc: Por primera vez, construye tus carritos Lego favoritos en tu PC utilizando todos los bloques disponibles en la vida real, gracias a los modos de creación detallados. Luego puedes competir con tu bestia contra otros personajes construidos con Lego en 12 pistas temáticas especiales, basadas en los kits temáticos de Lego (incluidos Piratas y Egipto y mucho más). Compite con tu amigo en el modo de pantalla dividida, o sigue recto por el último trofeo de carreras de Lego.

game.name: LEGO Stunt Rally
game.desc: Lego Stunt Rally es un juego de construcción y título de carreras de entretenimiento educativo basado en los populares bloques de construcción. El juego se juega desde una perspectiva aérea en la pista de carreras, que se representa en 3D en tiempo real. Usted controla la aceleración y el movimiento de lado a lado del automóvil, pero la computadora se encarga de maniobrar en las esquinas. El juego tiene modos para un solo jugador y multijugador. El modo para un jugador incluye un juego de campeonato en el que puedes ganar nuevos bloques de construcción para el modo de construcción. El juego multijugador permite que hasta 4 jugadores compitan en la misma computadora. El modo de construcción te permite construir tus propias pistas y es lo suficientemente potente como para crear una amplia variedad de carreras.

game.name: Lemmings & Oh no! More Lemmings
game.desc: Tu tarea consiste en rescatar a los Lemmings en 120 niveles de acertijos vertiginosos. Estas criaturas simplemente caminan a ciegas por el mundo con la esperanza de alcanzar la seguridad al final del nivel; desafortunadamente, estos niveles incluyen caídas pronunciadas, huecos en el suelo, barreras y ríos, entre otros peligros.

game.name: Lemmings & Oh no! More Lemmings
game.desc: Tu tarea consiste en rescatar a los Lemmings en 120 niveles de acertijos vertiginosos. Estas criaturas simplemente caminan a ciegas por el mundo con la esperanza de alcanzar la seguridad al final del nivel; desafortunadamente, estos niveles incluyen caídas pronunciadas, huecos en el suelo, barreras y ríos, entre otros peligros.

game.name: Lemmings & Oh no! More Lemmings
game.desc: Tu tarea consiste en rescatar a los Lemmings en 120 niveles de acertijos vertiginosos. Estas criaturas simplemente caminan a ciegas por el mundo con la esperanza de alcanzar la seguridad al final del nivel; desafortunadamente, estos niveles incluyen caídas pronunciadas, huecos en el suelo, barreras y ríos, entre otros peligros.

game.name: Lil' Monster
game.desc: The world is filled with energy crystals, which can be turned into monsters, using a special tin can. For centuries humans have trained the monsters to battle each other. However, a trainer named Cool Joe keeps breaking the rules of battle, and it's up to you to find out what he is up to. Collect crystals and turn them into monsters. Make your monster battle other monsters to gain experience and improve its abilities. You can also capture more crystals by winning battles. In addition to creating monsters, the crystals can be used by the monster to learn attacks and healing abilities. With over 60 monsters to collect, there is plenty to keep you busy. Try to find the truth regarding Cool Joe in LIL' MONSTER.

game.path: ./Lion King, The - Simba's Mighty Adventure (USA, Europe).zip
game.name: Lion King : Simba's Mighty Adventure, The
game.desc: As the young lion prince Simba, you'll grow to discover what it means to be rightful ruler of the Pride Lands. But first you'll have to outrun a wildebeest stampede, escape a wildfire and more! There's never a dull moment when you're King of the Beasts!

game.name: Little Magic
game.desc: Little Magic is a puzzle game, developed and published by Altron, which was released in Japan in 1999. Magic is all the rage these days. All the popular girls practice it, and young May doesn't want to be left out of the loop. Despite her best efforts, the only magic spell she seems able to manage is creating magic bubbles. Nevertheless, May is determined to graduate magic school even with her limited abilities. The trail before her seems impossible, but through sheer determination, nothing can stand in her way.

game.name: The Little Mermaid II : Pinball Frenzy
game.desc:
¡The Little Mermaid es una maravilla del pinball! En The Little Mermaid II: Pinball Frenzy de Disney, Ariel y Melody se unen para vivir una apasionante aventura de pinball submarina. ¡Elige la tabla de Ariel o Melody y prepárate para lanzarte a por los puntos submarinos!
¡Todos están aquí: Flounder, Ursula's Cave y Ariel's Grotto! Mantén los ojos abiertos para las apariciones especiales de Sebastian y Dash, la aventura del pinball nunca ha sido tan realista en Game Boy Color.
Puedes conseguir grandes logros con tiros de precisión e incluso golpear la tabla de tiros para ahorrarte un lanzamiento. Hazlo bien y descubrirás más tesoros: 16 minipartidas, que incluyen una nada despreciable partida de rana.
El juego permite la posibilidad de escoger entre dos velocidades para la bola - Turtle y Rabbit - y será un reto tanto para jugadores novatos como expertos. Además, The Little Mermaid 2: Pinball Frenzy de Disney admite hasta cuatro jugadores alternativamente.

game.name: Little Nicky
game.desc: Basado en la película homónima, asumes el papel de Nicky mientras viaja a través de 24 niveles, donde debe recolectar una cierta cantidad de elementos o destruir demonios. Sin embargo, la clave para superar todos los niveles es el poder de Nicky. Cuando Nicky se acerca al fuego, sus poderes aumentan. Correrá más rápido, saltará más alto y escupirá bolas de fuego. Si se calienta demasiado, Nicky no podrá controlar sus poderes hasta que se enfríe.

game.name: The F.A. Premier League Stars 2001
game.desc: La versión de Game Boy Color de Stars 2001 se basa muy libremente en el juego de PC/Playstation con el mismo nombre. Gran parte de lo que hizo que el especial original se haya ido. Por ejemplo, se eliminó todo el concepto de Star Points, que era una parte tan importante del juego de consola. Left es un juego de fútbol con un estilo bastante ordinario. Debido a la licencia de la Premier League, los veinte equipos son reales y tienen jugadores del mundo real (16 en cada equipo). El modo de juego se asemeja al estilo de muchos juegos clásicos del género y se ve desde una perspectiva de arriba hacia abajo. Los modos de juego disponibles son partido amistoso, temporada completa o una liga personalizada a elección de los jugadores.

game.path: ./Lode Runner - Domudomu Dan no Yabou (Japan) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Lode Runner - Domudomu Dan No Yabou
game.desc: The latest installment of the well-known action puzzler. In this title, there is a mode in which players advance through stages while rescuing captive animals. You can also raise the animals you rescue.

game.path: ./Lodoss-tou Senki - Eiyuu Kishiden GB (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Lodoss-tou Senki - Eiyuu Kishiden Gb
game.desc: A board game based on the second half of the popular "Battle of Lord's Island" series of novels. Players advance through the map by achieving predetermined goals within a limited number of turns.

game.name: Logical
game.desc: LOGICAL adds a distinctive puzzle game experience to the Game Boy Color. Each of the 99 levels starts with a unique arrangement of pipes and slotted gears. Balls of various colors roll through a pipe at the top of the screen, and they'll fall into the gear and pipe arrangement. The goal is to get balls of the same color to fill all of the slots of a gear. Once that happens, the balls disappear. But time is always a factor in doing this, so you've got to be efficient. As the game progresses, several complicating factors enter the mix: some pipes will only allow balls to travel one way, and other will only let balls of one color pass through. The biggest problem is that some levels require colors be removed in a particular order. Try to solve as many puzzles as you can with LOGICAL

game.name: Looney Tunes
game.desc: This side-scrolling game allows the player to control different Looney Tunes characters and their different abilities to advance through the levels, seven in all. The player can use Daffy Duck (throwing a frisbee to defeat enemies with Mario-style gameplay), Tweety Bird (elude Sylvester throughout the level), Porky Pig (control a bi-plane to shoot down enemies), Taz (really only a bonus game in which he has to collect as many steaks as possible in 60 seconds), Speedy Gonzalez (elude ghosts and ghouls in a haunted mansion), Roadrunner (of course running from his arch enemy, Wile E. Coyote) and finally Bugs Bunny (gameplay similar to Daffy).

game.name: Bugs Bunny & Lola Bunny : Operation Carrots
game.desc:
Looney Tunes: Carrot Crazy es un juego de plataformas de desplazamiento lateral con los famosos personajes de dibujos animados de Warner Bros. Bugs Bunny y Lola Bunny. Después de descubrir que todas las zanahorias han sido robadas de su jardín, como Bugs o Lola Bunny, el jugador tendrá que investigar. Los bichos tendrán que explorar el estudio Warner Bros. para averiguar quién robó las zanahorias.
Como muchos juegos de plataformas, caminas de izquierda a derecha a través de un nivel. Hay cinco mundos diferentes que representan el entorno de los personajes Yosemite Sam, Marvin the Martian, Daffy Duck, Elmer Fudd y el Demonio de Tasmania. Cada mundo está dividido en varios niveles. El objetivo de cada nivel es encontrar todas las tablillas de película presentes.

game.name: Sylvester and Tweety : Breakfast on the Run
game.desc:
In Looney Toons: Twouble! you play as the Warner Bros. character Sylvester the cat. It is your goal to capture Tweety Bird.
There are two distinct types of levels, which alternate each other. The first type features an isometric view of the world. Here the player has to navigate Sylvester around in the hope to find Tweety. To do this he'll have to solve various puzzles and avoid enemies like Hector and Granny. Puzzles involve collecting items, combining them and using them at the right spot in a room.
Once you found Tweety you will have to chase him in a 2D side-scrolling level. You have to avoid obstacles from tripping you in order to catch him. he subsequently escapes, Which advances you to the next level where you have to find Tweety again.

game.name: Looney Tunes Collector : Martian Alert!
game.desc: El fiel compañero de Marvin, el marciano, K-9, ha limpiado el platillo volante. Al hacerlo, ha tirado 10 piezas del teletransportador que se necesitan para ejecutar el plan de Marvin para destruir la Tierra. Bugs Bunny escucha el plan de Marvin, y ahora debe viajar por todo el mundo y reunir a los personajes de Looney Tunes. Si bien Bugs puede realizar tareas básicas, resolver todos los acertijos del juego y recolectar las piezas del teletransportador, necesita de las habilidades especiales de sus amigos. Por ejemplo, Elmer Gruñón puede destruir obstáculos con su arma, mientras que el Pato Lucas puede nadar y sumergirse en aguas profundas. Aprender cómo y cuándo usar a cada personaje es la clave del éxito.

game.name: Looney Tunes Collector : Martian Alert!
game.desc: El fiel compañero de Marvin, el marciano, K-9, ha limpiado el platillo volante. Al hacerlo, ha tirado 10 piezas del teletransportador que se necesitan para ejecutar el plan de Marvin para destruir la Tierra. Bugs Bunny escucha el plan de Marvin, y ahora debe viajar por todo el mundo y reunir a los personajes de Looney Tunes. Si bien Bugs puede realizar tareas básicas, resolver todos los acertijos del juego y recolectar las piezas del teletransportador, necesita de las habilidades especiales de sus amigos. Por ejemplo, Elmer Gruñón puede destruir obstáculos con su arma, mientras que el Pato Lucas puede nadar y sumergirse en aguas profundas. Aprender cómo y cuándo usar a cada personaje es la clave del éxito.

game.name: Looney Tunes Collector : Martian Alert!
game.desc: El fiel compañero de Marvin, el marciano, K-9, ha limpiado el platillo volante. Al hacerlo, ha tirado 10 piezas del teletransportador que se necesitan para ejecutar el plan de Marvin para destruir la Tierra. Bugs Bunny escucha el plan de Marvin, y ahora debe viajar por todo el mundo y reunir a los personajes de Looney Tunes. Si bien Bugs puede realizar tareas básicas, resolver todos los acertijos del juego y recolectar las piezas del teletransportador, necesita de las habilidades especiales de sus amigos. Por ejemplo, Elmer Gruñón puede destruir obstáculos con su arma, mientras que el Pato Lucas puede nadar y sumergirse en aguas profundas. Aprender cómo y cuándo usar a cada personaje es la clave del éxito.

game.name: Looney Tunes Collector : Martian Revenge!
game.desc:
Looney Tunes: Marvin Strikes Back! (Looney Tunes Collector: Martian Revenge in Europe) is a Looney Tunes game produced by Infogrames for the Game Boy Color in 2000. It is both a direct and spiritual sequel to Looney Tunes Collector: Alert!, as both share near-identical gameplay. Its name could be a reference to Star Wars Episode V: The Empire Strikes Back.
The game takes place after the events of Looney Tunes Collector: Alert!. Marvin the Martian sees a video of himself played by Porky Pig and Daffy Duck beating him in a humiliating way. Marvin is infuriated with this and together with his dog K-9 set off to get revenge on the Earth.

game.name: Looney Tunes Racing
game.desc: Acelere sus motores: ¡es hora de quemar algo de goma de Looney Tunes! ACME Corporation, el gigante corporativo detrás de productos tan exitosos como Acme Disintegrator Gun y Acme Portable Hole, está patrocinando una serie de concursos de carreras en todo el universo para que los personajes de Looney Tunes compitan por el título de campeón de carreras más loco.

game.path: ./Loppi Puzzle Magazine - Hirameku Puzzle Dai-2-gou (Japan) (Rev 1) (SGB Enhanced, GB Compatible) (NP).zip
game.name: Loppi Puzzle Magazine - Hirameku Puzzle Dai-2-gou
game.desc: Contains puzzles that require inspiration. This year's collection includes 16 Sudoku puzzles, 24 Crossword puzzles, and 24 Mistake Matching puzzles.

game.path: ./Loppi Puzzle Magazine - Hirameku Puzzle Dai-3-gou (Japan) (Rev 1) (SGB Enhanced, GB Compatible) (NP).zip
game.name: Loppi Puzzle Magazine - Hirameku Puzzle Dai-3-gou
game.desc: The collection contains 56 puzzles that require inspiration: 16 "Sudoku" puzzles in two sizes, 24 "Crossword" puzzles in three sizes, and 16 "Mistake Hunt" puzzles in two types.

game.path: ./Loppi Puzzle Magazine - Hirameku Puzzle Soukangou (Japan) (Rev 1) (SGB Enhanced, GB Compatible) (NP).zip
game.name: Loppi Puzzle Magazine - Hirameku Puzzle Soukangou
game.desc: The game includes three types of puzzles that require inspiration: Sudoku, Crossword, and Mistake Matching. There are also prizes to be won, including a Game Boy Advance.

game.path: ./Loppi Puzzle Magazine - Kangaeru Puzzle Dai-2-gou (Japan) (Rev 1) (SGB Enhanced, GB Compatible) (NP).zip
game.name: Loppi Puzzle Magazine - Kangaeru Puzzle Dai-2-gou
game.desc: Loppi Puzzle Magazine: Kangaeru Puzzle is a series of puzzle games released for Game Boy Color via the Nintendo Power service. It was released in 3 volumes, each featuring a collection of Sudoku, Slitherlink and Nonogram puzzles.

game.path: ./Loppi Puzzle Magazine - Kangaeru Puzzle Dai-3-gou (Japan) (Rev 1) (SGB Enhanced, GB Compatible) (NP).zip
game.name: Loppi Puzzle Magazine - Kangaeru Puzzle Dai-3-gou
game.desc: Loppi Puzzle Magazine: Kangaeru Puzzle is a series of puzzle games released for Game Boy Color via the Nintendo Power service. It was released in 3 volumes, each featuring a collection of Sudoku, Slitherlink and Nonogram puzzles.

game.path: ./Loppi Puzzle Magazine - Kangaeru Puzzle Soukangou (Japan) (Rev 1) (SGB Enhanced, GB Compatible) (NP).zip
game.name: Loppi Puzzle Magazine - Kangaeru Puzzle Soukangou
game.desc: Loppi Puzzle Magazine: Kangaeru Puzzle is a series of puzzle games released for Game Boy Color via the Nintendo Power service. It was released in 3 volumes, each featuring a collection of Sudoku, Slitherlink and Nonogram puzzles.

game.path: ./Lord of the Rings, The - The Fellowship of the Ring (Taiwan) (En) (Unl).zip
game.name: Lord of the Rings, The - The Fellowship of the Ring
Love Hina Party
game.desc: Love Hina Party puts you in shoes of Keitaro himself as he resumes his duties of a hotel manager. During adventure mode, you can check certain predefined locations and speak with characters you meet, sometimes selecting your answer during conversation. Sometimes during the story, the girls in Hinata apartments will ask you quiz questions about the Love Hina anime. The action mode in the game is done via four different mini-games which, unlike the adventure mode, use 3rd-person perspective.

game.name: Love Hina Pocket
game.desc:
You are Keitaro Urashima, who has 7 days to do various things in the game, and win the heart of the girl he wants to get. The first six days, Keitaro does various things, such as talk to the girl and say the right thing or do the right thing to make the girl happy. The player can choose any of the girls living at the Hinata-sou: Naru, Mutsumi, Shinobu, Kaolla, Motoko, Kitsune, Sarah, and even Haruka.
As the girls feelings increase toward Keitaro, they are likely to do nice things for him. But be careful because if you upset them, there will be hell to pay.

game.path: ./Luca no Puzzle de Daibouken! (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Luca No Puzzle De Daibouken!
game.desc: The game is a puzzle game in which the player must place numbers in vertical and horizontal rows and in color-coded areas without duplicating them, and a mini-game is available for every 20 puzzles completed.

game.name: Lucky Luke
game.desc:
You play as Lucky Luke, lonesome cowboy, who draws his gun faster than his shadow. In a received telegram you read that Jesse James, Billy the Kid, Pat Poker, and The Dalton Brothers have escaped from jail. You as a good cowboy and law keeper have to catch them and return them back, finishing 12 levels of the game.
Players guide Luke through levels by walking, jumping, climbing and ducking. There are also objects to collect such as dynamite (which can be used to reveal hidden paths), revolver barrels, sheriff stars and other useful items. You also have to use collected items to get past a certain obstacle, such as to show a red cloth to a bull, feed a dog with a bone, and so on. Luke can attack enemies by shooting in straight or diagonal directions. Shooting exhausts the six bullets in your gun's barrel. To kill the bandits, bad Indians, prisoners, you should shoot at them for a certain number of times.
Locations of the levels vary from towns, saloons, and jails, to the prairies, ranches, and Indian village in Cheyenne Mountains. At the end of most levels you have to challenge one of the bosses, and at the end of the final level you should challenge four Daltons one after another again.
Some levels are scrolling arcades such as stagecoach traveling, chasing a train, escaping the Tornado or Buffalo, or flowing in the rapids. Also the bonus level is present, where you should shoot all the bottles to get and extra life.

game.name: Lucky Luke : Desperado Train
game.desc: El juego está basado en la serie de cómics sobre el buen vaquero Lucky Luke. Durante el juego, debes disparar a los malos en tu camino, recolectando municiones, dinamitas, dinero y algunos artículos útiles. Durante 12 niveles tienes que perseguir el tren robado por forajidos. Lucky Luke tiene que atraparlos antes de que arrasen la tierra desde la costa del Atlántico hasta la del Pacífico. Algunos personajes del juego son amigables y pueden ayudarte.

game.name: Lufia : The Legend Returns
game.desc: Lufia: The Legend Returns es un juego de rol. Tienes que luchar contra las fuerzas del mal en una mazmorra de 200 pisos. Puedes luchar contra los monstruos en batallas por turnos y un equipo de nueve compañeros.

game.name: M&M's Minis Madness
game.desc: The Minis have escaped and are wreaking havoc on the M&M factory. It is up to four intrepid heroes Red, Green, Yellow, and Blue to capture the Minis and return the factory to normal. You must choose the appropriate character for each situation the heroes encounter, as they each have a special skill. Blue can swim, Green has a deadly kiss attack, Yellow can bounce high into the air, and Red can use a spin attack to destroy enemies. If you encounter an area the current character is not able to get past, you can switch to another characters with the select button. Learning how and when to use these abilities is key to conquering all 12 levels in the game. So play M&M MINI MADNESS and try to save the factory before the Minis destroy it.

game.name: Macross 7 - Ginga No Heart O Furuwasero!!
game.desc: A shooting game based on an anime. Manipulate your ship to clear numerous stages. In boss battles, you fight by launching special attacks in time with the rhythm of the song.

game.name: Madden NFL 2000
game.desc:
The first entry in the long-running Madden football series on the Game Boy Color is also the first entry in the series on a handheld in three years. The versions on consoles and computers having migrated to 3D graphics, the GBC edition uses traditional sprite-based 2D with a top-down view of the playing field.
Game modes include Exhibition matches, Sudden Death games (first team to score wins), Full Seasons and Playoffs. Progress can be saved through use of passwords. Game features include many known from other iterations of the series, such as player injuries and substitutions, audibles, detailed statistics, control of weather and game time, and more. The playbook not only includes a wide number of standard plays, but also a variety of trick plays like fake field goals and reverse plays.
Team and player names and statistics are from the 1999 NFL season.

game.name: Madden NFL 2001
game.desc: Madden NFL 2001, la primera entrada móvil de la serie publicada por Electronic Arts en lugar de THQ, es la segunda iteración de Game Boy Color, del nuevo desarrollador 3d6 Games. Los modos de juego son Exhibición, Temporada y Eliminatorias y, por primera vez, el juego también ofrece un modo de dos jugadores a través del cable de enlace. Los gráficos 2D de arriba hacia abajo se han mejorado en comparación con las versiones anteriores, y el juego ofrece el discurso del mariscal de campo por primera vez en una plataforma móvil. Las características del juego son las habituales: un gran libro de jugadas, audibles, lesiones y sustituciones de jugadores y estadísticas detalladas. El juego presenta las estadísticas de los jugadores y los nombres y logotipos de los equipos de la temporada 2000 de la NFL.

game.name: Madden NFL 2002
game.desc:
The last Madden game on the Game Boy Color is very similar to its immediate predecessor, offering most of the same features, the main difference being updated player stats for the 2001 NFL season.
Besides exhibition games, there are season and playoff modes with password support. The two-player mode via link cable also returns. The playbook of more than 80 offense and 60 defense plays is reused from the previous game, as are features like audibles and substitutions.

game.name: Magi Nation
game.desc: ¿Qué harías si te encontraras en una tierra extraña, cara a cara con una presencia misteriosa y obligado a aventurarte para salvar a toda una civilización? ¡Pues descúbrelo! Explora un mundo de color e imaginación que desafiará todas tus ideas de la realidad. Experimenta la emoción de batirte en duelo con un Shadow Magi, con todo en juego. Enfréntate cara a cara con el increíble Timber Hyren o el gigantesco Ormagon. Sé el salvador de toda una civilización.

game.path: ./Magical Chase GB - Minarai Mahoutsukai Kenja no Tani e (Japan).zip
game.name: Magical Chase GB - Minarai Mahoutsukai Kenja no Ta
game.desc:
Magical Chase is a port of the PC Engine original scrolling shooter video game developed by Quest, with downgraded audio-visuals to fit the GBC.
The protagonist Ripple is a young student of magic, an apprentice to a terrifying witch. Ripple has just broken a promise she made to the witch and took a peek inside a forbidden book, freeing six demons. Unless she can catch all six and get them back inside the book, the witch will turn Ripple into a frog. Ripple sets off on her quest with her two Elf-Star friends, known as "Star Maidens": Topsy and Turvy.

game.name: Magical Drop
game.desc: MAGICAL DROP has a character facing imminent doom as bubbles slowly make their way towards him from the top of the screen. To get rid of the bubbles, you can grab bubbles of one color from the pile and move them to another area. When three or more bubbles of the same color touch, they will explode and destroy all of the like-colored bubbles around them. When bubbles are destroyed, those remaining in the pile float up and cause more to bubbles to burst in a chain reaction. This is a rather simple premise, but it's not easy to master. While the single-player game is fun, use a link cable and share the fun with a friend. Try to clear as many bubbles as possible with MAGICAL DROP.

game.name: Magical Tetris Challenge
game.desc: Magical Tetris Challenge mezcla la conocida marca Tetris con los personajes y mundos de Disney. El Tetris original se ofrece a través del desafío de resistencia habitual o el nuevo modo historia, en el que eliges uno de los muchos personajes conocidos de Disney (Mickey, Minnie, Donald y Goofy) y te enfrentas a los malos en un juego de Tetris para salvar el dia. También se incluye un modo para 2 jugadores.

game.name: Mahjong Joou
game.desc: Four-player mahjong with female professional mahjong players. The game features modes such as "The Palace of the Queens," a winner-take-all game, "Free Game," in which you can play against your favorite opponent, and "JoOusama Quiz," in which you can challenge difficult questions designed by the professionals.

game.name: Mahjong Quest
game.desc: The game is a game in which the player controls a character to play mahjong and aims to be undefeated. If you beat your opponent in a game, you can take away special skills and lives that will give you an advantage in the game, which you can use from the next game.

game.path: ./Majokko Mari-chan no Kisekae Monogatari (Japan) (Rev 1) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Kisekae Monogatari
game.desc: Witch girl Mari-chan is an adventure to improve her sense of fashion. By working part-time and going out with her friends, she can collect all of the more than 190 outfits.

game.name: Marble Madness
game.desc: Una adaptación del juego de arcade. Marble Madness es un juego de laberinto abstracto para uno o dos jugadores. El objetivo es guiar una pequeña canica de vidrio sobre un laberinto tridimensional y llegar a la meta antes de que termine el cronómetro. Los segundos que quedan en el cronómetro cuando se cruza la línea de meta se transfieren al siguiente nivel. Además de tener que sortear la canica por traicioneras pasarelas y rampas, numerosos obstáculos y criaturas hostiles tratarán de frenar el avance de la canica o derribarla por el borde de una plataforma, perdiendo aún más preciosos segundos hasta que aparece una canica de reemplazo.

game.name: Marie No Atelier Gb
game.desc: The latest in the popular RPG series, in which users gather materials and mix them to create a variety of items. The objective is to train fairies to become full-fledged alchemists while completing requests.

game.name: Mario Golf
game.desc:
Mario Golf on Game Boy Color isn't a straight port of the N64 game - it's a totally different game in its own right. It is a combination of a golf game and an RPG. As in an RPG, you choose your character at the beginning, with various strengths and weaknesses, and throughout the course of the game, your character gains experience points through winning matches or playing mini-games. Experience points can be distributed to various skills, such as putting, which makes it easier for you to do well. There are quite a few skills, and no two characters you can create will play in exactly the same way.
Although the story mode is the main part of the game, there's quite a few other modes to keep you busy, like Tournament, Match Game, Stroke, Training, and the two-player mode via link cable. It comes with a dictionary of all the golf terms you'll need, and an extensive range of statistics on your player.

game.name: Mario Golf
game.desc:
Mario Golf on Game Boy Color isn't a straight port of the N64 game - it's a totally different game in its own right. It is a combination of a golf game and an RPG. As in an RPG, you choose your character at the beginning, with various strengths and weaknesses, and throughout the course of the game, your character gains experience points through winning matches or playing mini-games. Experience points can be distributed to various skills, such as putting, which makes it easier for you to do well. There are quite a few skills, and no two characters you can create will play in exactly the same way.
Although the story mode is the main part of the game, there's quite a few other modes to keep you busy, like Tournament, Match Game, Stroke, Training, and the two-player mode via link cable. It comes with a dictionary of all the golf terms you'll need, and an extensive range of statistics on your player.

game.name: Mario Tennis
game.desc: Mario Tennis para Game Boy Color es una experiencia muy diferente a su versión de N64. Además de la jugabilidad principal que se encuentra en la versión N64, la versión GBC presenta un mundo de estilo RPG que te permite ascender en las filas de la Royal Tennis Academy. El modo principal, Mario Tour, te hace comenzar como un novato con estadísticas bajas. Al completar programas de entrenamiento y derrotar a otros estudiantes, puedes ganar puntos de experiencia, lo que te permite mejorar tus estadísticas de tenis. Cuando no esté jugando al tenis, puede pasar tiempo explorando los terrenos de la Academia: hablando con otros estudiantes o simplemente disfrutando de las vistas y los sonidos.

game.name: Mario Tennis
game.desc: Mario Tennis para Game Boy Color es una experiencia muy diferente a su versión de N64. Además de la jugabilidad principal que se encuentra en la versión N64, la versión GBC presenta un mundo de estilo RPG que te permite ascender en las filas de la Royal Tennis Academy. El modo principal, Mario Tour, te hace comenzar como un novato con estadísticas bajas. Al completar programas de entrenamiento y derrotar a otros estudiantes, puedes ganar puntos de experiencia, lo que te permite mejorar tus estadísticas de tenis. Cuando no esté jugando al tenis, puede pasar tiempo explorando los terrenos de la Academia: hablando con otros estudiantes o simplemente disfrutando de las vistas y los sonidos.

game.name: Looney Tunes Collector : Martian Revenge!
game.desc:
Looney Tunes: Marvin Strikes Back! (Looney Tunes Collector: Martian Revenge in Europe) is a Looney Tunes game produced by Infogrames for the Game Boy Color in 2000. It is both a direct and spiritual sequel to Looney Tunes Collector: Alert!, as both share near-identical gameplay. Its name could be a reference to Star Wars Episode V: The Empire Strikes Back.
