In De Tijdtemmers, the famous Belgian comic book heroes Suske & Wiske (Bob & Bobette) are on a quest to find one of their best friends, Lambik, who has been kidnapped by Crimson, their arch enemy. They have to collect several parts of the Time Machine which teleports them to various worlds such as the Stone Age, ancient Egypt and the near future.
The stages in which you play consist of a combination of puzzle and arcade elements.
You can choose to play as either Suske or Wiske and each of them have their own characteristics.

game.name: Suzuki Alstare Extreme Racing
game.desc: Suzuki Alstare Exteme Racing is a motorcycle racing game with the Suzuki license. It has two playing modes: time trial (single races against four to seven AI racers) and the championship which are 16 successive races on the 16 courses. At first there are only two motorbikes available, but successes in time trial mode unlock better ones to use in the championship. Also restricted is the number of available time trial courses; the rest also has to be unlocked first. The player can perform a wheelie which causes a considerate, temporary acceleration.

game.name: Sweet Ange
game.desc: A board game about baking, featuring characters from "Angelique". Players combine cards to make sweets and try to win the contest.

game.name: Swing
game.desc: The object of the game is to score points by dropping balls onto sets of see-saws, in rows of three or more of the same colour. The twist, however, is that each ball has a different weight, determined by the number written on the front of it. The higher the number, the heavier the ball. This means that if a ball is placed onto one side of the see-saw which is heavier than the total value of the balls on the other side, the balance would be upset, sending the top ball flying across the playing field to land on another column. Cascade 'throws' can be achieved, and the game is over if a column reaches too tall. A variety of bonus balls, all with special uses, also feature.

game.name: SWIV
game.desc: Esta versión de SWIV es una adaptación de la versión para SNES (también conocida como Firepower 2000 en Norteamérica). Se trata de un shooter de desplazamiento vertical en el que el jugador puede elegir entre pilotar un helicóptero o conducir un Jeep de ataque. El helicóptero no está bloqueado por obstáculos, pero sólo puede disparar hacia delante. A diferencia de la versión SNES/Genesis, el Jeep y el helicóptero tienen las mismas características: misma velocidad, mismo blindaje, misma agilidad. Los niveles también están "inspirados" en la versión de 1992, pero modificados (menos largos, menos enemigos). También se ha eliminado el modo para 2 jugadores (uno controla el helicóptero y el otro el jeep).

game.path: ./Sylvanian Families - Otogi no Kuni no Pendant (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Sylvanian Families - Otogi No Kuni No Pendant
game.desc: An ivory rabbit girl is asked by friends in the village of Sylvania to help and play a game, and when the help is completed, "Yume" will be accumulated. Get "furniture, miscellaneous goods, home" at a certain "dream" point! The story changes depending on how the furniture is gathered. In the middle of helping, get flowers and "seed" of trees and grow them. There are many events and mini-games that take place in the village of Sylvania.

game.name: Sylvanian Families 2 - Irozuku Mori No Fantasy
game.desc: Embark on an adventure to restore the colors of fairyland. By restoring colors and helping others, you will be able to go to faraway places. Events also change with the seasons and time of day.

game.path: ./Sylvanian Families 3 - Hoshi Furu Yoru no Sunadokei (Japan).zip
game.name: Sylvanian Families 3 - Hoshi Furu Yoru no Sunadoke
game.desc: An adventure set in the world of the popular "Sylvanian Families" toys. The children must collect eight pieces of a dream to deliver a pendant dropped by a fairy to Fairyland.

game.path: ./Sylvanian Melodies - Mori no Nakama to Odori Masho! (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Sylvanian Melodies - Mori no Nakama to Odori Mashi
game.desc: Sylvanian Melodies is a rhythm-action game in the vein of Dance Dance Revolution, Elite Beat Agents, and Guitar Hero. The Fairies of the Misty Forest have accidentally sprinkled Sylvania with Cloud Seeds, and it's up to Willow Cottontail to gather them up and save the land from overcast skies.

game.path: ./Sylvester & Tweety - Breakfast on the Run (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Sylvester and Tweety : Breakfast on the Run
game.desc:
In Looney Toons: Twouble! you play as the Warner Bros. character Sylvester the cat. It is your goal to capture Tweety Bird.
There are two distinct types of levels, which alternate each other. The first type features an isometric view of the world. Here the player has to navigate Sylvester around in the hope to find Tweety. To do this he'll have to solve various puzzles and avoid enemies like Hector and Granny. Puzzles involve collecting items, combining them and using them at the right spot in a room.
Once you found Tweety you will have to chase him in a 2D side-scrolling level. You have to avoid obstacles from tripping you in order to catch him. he subsequently escapes, Which advances you to the next level where you have to find Tweety again.

game.name: Tabaluga
game.desc: Aventura tipo Zelda en la que el dragón Tabaluga sale a proteger su tierra natal, Groenlandia, del malvado muñeco de nieve Arktos. Título con licencia basado en el popular personaje de dibujos animados (y musical) alemán para niños Tabaluga.

game.name: Taikong Zhanshi DX3 - Zuizhong Huanxiang
game.desc: It's a (bad) title hack of a game originally known as "Final Fantaxy IX", a heavily FF9-based beat 'em up/RPG hybrid. The original version was released by "TD Software", but it seems to have been developed by the same team (possibly BBD) behind Sintax's early stuff. and much like their other early beat 'em ups, it's very well-made if a bit repetitive.

game.name: Taisen Tsume Shougi
game.desc: Tsume-shogi software for Nintendo-Power rewrite only. From 1-move tsume for beginners to 3-move, 5-move, 7-move, 9-move, 11-move, 13-move, 15-move, and difficult problems for advanced players are available. The software contains a total of 200 problems, and can be played in a leisurely manner for only 1,000 yen.

game.name: Classic Bubble Bobble
game.desc:
Blue Dino se ha puesto enfermo y ha enviado a Green Dino a por una cura. Esencialmente es un remake del clásico arcade, sin la posibilidad de 2 jugadores.
El objetivo del juego es utilizar las habilidades de burbujas de Dino para atrapar y hacer estallar a los malos mientras esqiuvas sus ataques para completar el nivel, recolectando elementos de bonificación en el camino. Hacer estallar a los enemigos los convierte en fruta que dan puntos de bonificación.

game.path: ./Taito Memorial - Chase H.Q. - Secret Police (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Chase H.Q. : Secret Police
game.desc:
Chase H.Q. - Secret Police, is slightly different than the other Chase H.Q. games. You receive a call from Dispatch, telling you to arrest suspects that have just committed a felony. There are ten stages in the game, and each one of them has you placing three agents throughout the city. Each one of these agents have their own specialties. Once you have placed the agents, you must guide one of them toward the suspect vehicle. If the vehicle goes outside the city, the game is over.
Once the two of you make contact, the battle begins where the object is to ram the suspect's vehicle until it is disabled. You can also shoot the vehicle to further damage it, and use up to three turbos to catch up with the vehicle if you happen to fall behind.

game.path: ./Tales of Phantasia - Narikiri Dungeon (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Tales Of Phantasia - Narikiri Dungeon
game.desc:
Tales of Phantasia: Narikiri Dungeon (ãƒ†ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚º ã‚ªãƒ– ãƒ•ã‚¡ãƒ³ã‚¿ã‚¸ã‚¢ ãªã‚Šãã‚Šãƒ€ãƒ³ã‚¸ãƒ§ãƒ³ Teiruzu Obu Fantajia Narikiri Danjon?) is a role-playing video game for the Game Boy Color released by Namco on November 10, 2000, selling 136,000 copies. Tales of Phantasia: Narikiri Dungeon's characteristic genre name is Dungeon RPG (ãƒ€ãƒ³ã‚¸ãƒ§ãƒ³RPG Danjon RPG?). It is the first sequel in the Tales series, which normally does not have connected storylines. The story begins 205 years after the beginning of Tales of Phantasia.
Due to the limits of the Game Boy, the game uses a battle system called Petit LMBS, a turn-based variation on the Linear Motion Battle System used by the rest of the series. As in normal LMBS, the player controls only one character and does so via button combinations instead of a dialogue choice, while party members are computer-controlled. A remake of the game was later released on PlayStation Portable called Tales of Phantasia: Narikiri Dungeon X.

game.path: ./Tanimura Hitoshi Ryuu Pachinko Kouryaku Daisakusen - Don Quijote ga Iku (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Tanimura Hitoshi Ryuu Pachinko Kouryaku Daisakusen
game.desc: Pachinko software supervised by Hitoshi Tanimura, a charismatic figure in the pachinko world famous for his occult theories. There are several modes, including "Challenge Hitoshi Tanimura," in which you can play pachinko against Hitoshi Tanimura, and "Practical Real-time Advice," in which you can listen to his advice by entering the current playing conditions at the hall.

game.name: Tarzan
game.desc: Overcome the jungle's most dangerous perils in this action-packed adventure. Based on the animated film, Tarzan allows you to relive Tarzan's journey through life from a headstrong youth to a courageous adult. Your innate jungle abilities will allow you to swing, climb, run, jump, and surf through 13 beautiful environments, while interacting with unique characters, riding elephants, and solving challenging puzzles. It's now up to you to master the moves of this unique jungle hero and save Tarzan's family from a ruthless hunter.

game.name: Taxi 2
game.desc: Taxi 2 is a driving game, based on Luc Besson's movie of the same name. It features two game modes, the "story mode" follows the scenes from the movie and allows you to select from five missions. When a mission is completed, you can save your progress, but also play it in the "arcade mode". In this mode, you will face the same competitor, Jean-Louis Schlesser ! The objective is no longer specific to each mission, but is to win the race, after several laps. In this mode, you will not have to care about the temperature gauge, since it is removed from arcade mode.

game.name: Taxi 3
game.desc: Taxi 3 is based on the movie with the same title written by Luc Besson, directed by Gerard Krawczyk. The player takes on the role of the main character of the movie: Daniel, a taxi driver who has an overpowered customized car. Gameplay is simple: in a pursuit view Daniel has a limited time to go to assigned checkpoints to get objects and clients, and go to another checkpoint to drop them... Daniel needs to stop at gas stations to refuel his tank, and can use nitro to get an acceleration bonus. Furthermore Daniel needs to avoid other vehicles in the traffic, such as motorbikes, cars and trucks.

game.name: Tech Deck Skateboarding
game.desc: El frenesí del diapasón se abre camino (de manera bastante apropiada) a los juegos portátiles. Presentando la línea de tablas de skate en miniatura de X Concepts, TECH DECK SKATEBOARDING te desafía a realizar los mismos trucos que los patinadores regulares hacen pero más pequeños. Juegas como el inimitable Thumb Guy, una mascota adorable que puede realizar los movimientos del diapasón con lo mejor de ellos. Con un juego y animaciones de estilo arcade, el juego te permite realizar grinds, ollies y flips con un estilo extremo. Todas las tablas con licencia de fabricantes reales están aquí, por lo que patinarás con estilo en tu tabla Tony Hawk. Tendrás acceso a un número limitado de tableros al principio del juego, pero a medida que avanzas más y más en el camino hacia la gloria, podrás desbloquear atuendos más receptivos y otras cosas ocultas. Con gráficos geniales, mazos reales y una jugabilidad totalmente original, ¡es patinaje extremo para fanáticos incondicionales!

game.name: Terrifying 911
game.desc: This is a decent port of Metal Slug 1 for the Neo Geo. A is used to jump and B is used to shoot. the graphics are also good even with the limitations of the Game Boy Color. The bosses are also present in this version, but are more easy. The order of mission 4 and 5 is inverted. When a level is beaten, an exchange between George W. Bush and Osama Bin Laden takes place. In the original release, the text is in English, but in Li Cheng's version, the text is in Chinese.

game.name: Test Drive 2001
game.desc:
This handheld Test Drive game lets you drive 13 licensed sports cars through 12 locations and 48 tracks. The action is viewed from an isometric perspective and some of the locations you'll drive through are Germany, Sydney and Washington. You start the game with a Lotus Elise, but as you gain more money you'll be able to buy other cars like Mustangs and Jaguars.
The game offers three modes. The first one, Single Race, involves beating the clock and other computer opponents on any of the tracks using any of the cars. In the tournament mode, you can earn extra money to buy new and better cars, or to upgrade your current car. You can also unlock additional tracks. In the Cop Chase mode, you take control of a police car and have to pursue the computer controlled racers. The game also have a two player mode allowing you to compete using the Link Cable.

game.name: Test Drive 6
game.desc: Test Drive 6 ofrece 11 circuitos que tienen lugar en todo el mundo. De París a Tahití pasando por Egipto, conduce todo lo que quieras con cuidado de evitar a los civiles y la policía en tu camino. Con el dinero recaudado durante las carreras, optimiza tu vehículo y compra otros más eficientes.

game.name: Test Drive Cycles
game.desc: If you want the thrill of riding at high speeds on two wheels on a tight track with deadly curves and bone-jarring jumps, look no further TEST DRIVE CYCLES has all of that and more! You've got an assortment of bikes from licensed manufacturers such as Harley Davidson, BMW, Moto Guzzi, and Bimota. Once you've selected your speed machine, head to the track in one of 12 different racing circuits. Each course is packed with twists, turns, and jumps that will test your skill and push you to the edge. Watch out for other racers and obstacles as you speed to the finish line, or you may end up wrecking your fancy ride. By winning races, you can upgrade your bike with various parts that will increase your speed and handling. If you're looking for multiplayer action, link up to race against another player in a Head-to-Head race to the finish. There is also the Cop Chase mode, where you must avoid being pulled over by the fuzz. TEST DRIVE CYCLES is compatible only with Game Boy Color systems.

game.name: Test Drive Le Mans
game.desc: Test Drive: Le Mans is a racing game for the Game Boy Color. The game features three racing modes: Arcade, Le Mans, and Championship. Le Mans allows you to race on the actual circuit, while Championship lets you race on 10 real tracks from all around the world. The arcade mode includes power-ups such as boosts, and oil slicks that bring your car to a slip. There are 10 different cars to race with such as the Nissan R390 and the BMW V12 VMR, with each their own handling and appearance.

game.name: 4x4 World Trophy
game.desc: Some cars should stay on the pavement, while others are designed to go where no other vehicle has gone before. Those are the vehicles included in TEST DRIVE OFF ROAD. You can choose from four different vehicles: a Hummer, Land Rover Defender 90, Jeep Wrangler and Chevrolet K-1500 Z71. In addition to the four starting vehicles six more become available with extended play and include a monster truck, dune buggy, stock car, hot rod, Mini Cooper, and an off-road beetle. When you are ready to race there is a Mixed League and Class League to choose from. Mixed League is open to any vehicle and Class League restricts the entries to vehicles of a particular type. While you are racing the 12 tracks offer three different surfaces including dirt, snow, and rocks. Try to master the elements and go where other cars can't with TEST DRIVE OFF ROAD.

game.name: Magical Tetris Challenge
game.desc: Magical Tetris Challenge mezcla la conocida marca Tetris con los personajes y mundos de Disney. El Tetris original se ofrece a través del desafío de resistencia habitual o el nuevo modo historia, en el que eliges uno de los muchos personajes conocidos de Disney (Mickey, Minnie, Donald y Goofy) y te enfrentas a los malos en un juego de Tetris para salvar el dia. También se incluye un modo para 2 jugadores.

game.name: Tetris DX
game.desc: Tetris DX requiere que coloques bloques de diferentes formas que caen desde la parte superior de la pantalla, a lo largo de la parte inferior de la pantalla para formar una línea que luego desaparece de la pantalla. Sin embargo, ten cuidado, si no puedes llenar los huecos y los bloques se llenan hasta la parte superior de la pantalla, el juego termina. Tetris DX presenta 4 modos de un jugador y modo de dos jugadores usando el cable link.

game.name: Top Gear Rally 2
game.desc:
Another round of Top Gear rally action on the GBC. On this occasion, depending on where you finish each race, you are awarded points. These points then go towards improving the stats of the rally car you are using (speed, braking, acceleration and top speed).
Championships are split into seasons, each harder then the last. You can opt to change the weather conditions (day, night, sunny, rain, snow) or practise on the track to get used to the corners and timing.
You can also play against a friend in two player mode.

game.name: Golden Goal
game.desc: Sumérgete en el increíble mundo del fútbol internacional mientras seleccionas tu brillante equipo y los llevas a nuevos desafíos a medida que te enfrentas a los mejores equipos del mundo, jugando los partidos que componen el torneo de la Copa del Mundo y venciéndolos a todos para convertirse en el mejor! En el brillante Golden Goal necesitarás dominar las artes de las gambetas, pasar y patear creativamente hacia la victoria mientras ganas el codiciado trofeo de la Copa Mundial.

game.name: Thunder Blast Man
game.desc: Thunder Blast Man (también conocido como Rocman X) es un juego sin licencia creado por Sachen, lanzado para Famicom y NES en algún momento de los años 90 y también algún tiempo después para Game Boy Color. Las versiones de NES y Game Boy Color en inglés se lanzaron como Thunder Blast Man, la versión china del juego GBC se lanzó como Rockman X Gold, y una de las etiquetas de las versiones de NES lo llama Thunder Blaster Man. La versión GBC tiene gráficos y niveles similares, pero tiene música completamente diferente. La mayoría de los gráficos están tomados de la versión de Famicom, incluidos algunos gráficos enemigos sin usar. Además, la jugabilidad se cambia a un juego de estilo Mega Man más tradicional y no hay tiendas ni armas adicionales en el juego. Existen dos versiones de este juego: una versión "Rocman X" con sprites de Mega Man ligeramente editados y una puntería ligeramente más baja, y la versión más conocida "Thunder Blast Man", con el protagonista del juego de NES. Esta versión comparte numerosas similitudes con los juegos de Makon Soft, particularmente con Rocman 8 y X4.

game.name: Thunderbirds
game.desc: Únete a la familia Tracy en los juegos de la vieja escuela en 7 minijuegos en todo el mundo. Un solo jugador y basado en la historia, ¿tienes lo que se necesita para frustrar al malvado Hood? Este juego permite a los jugadores controlar los vehículos Thunderbirds 1-4, The mole y FAB1 en una variedad de minijuegos. TB1, una nave de reconocimiento y combate, es un minijuego de desplazamiento lateral que implica bombardear y disparar a objetivos terrestres y aéreos mientras se buscan personas a las que rescatar y se recopila información sobre el área. TB2, la embarcación de rescate se controla desde una perspectiva de arriba hacia abajo e implica la resolución de acertijos y la exploración. TB3, el transbordador espacial, es un juego de disparos de la vieja escuela de desplazamiento vertical y de arriba hacia abajo y TB4, el submarino, es un juego de colección y combate que se juega desde una perspectiva lateral.

game.name: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 2000
game.desc:
This handheld version of Tiger Woods PGA Tour 2000 is the only game in the series to appear on the Game Boy Color. The game lets the player compete against six pros from the PGA Tour. There are four different modes of play: stroke, tournament, skins game and shoot out. Three courses exist: Summerlin, Sawgrass and Scottsdale. These are all official Tournament Players Club courses. Up to four players, either human or computer controlled, can play at any time.
When playing the player first get to see a top down view of the tee. He can here get information about wind and terrain and adjust his spin and cross hair. Once ready, the player has to use a power meter to take the shot. The player has to click it three times, first to start the backswing, then to end the backswing at the right strength and finally to strike the ball at the right time.

game.name: Tintin : Prisoners of the Sun
game.desc: A thousand curses ! A bizarre illness has stricken several explorers upon their return from Peru. Tintin is leading the investigation, when Professor Calculus mysteriously disappears... It's the beginning of a thrilling adventure that will lead Tintin to the deepest heart of the Andes Cordillera. Your adventures in the land of the Incas promise to be action-packed and will test your wits! Will you discover the secret of the Temple of the Sun?

game.name: Tintin in Tibet
game.desc: Las aventuras de Tintín cuenta la historia de un reportero que no teme el peligro. En este juego basado en el cómic, Tintín está de vacaciones en los Alpes franceses y descubre a través del periódico un accidente de avión en la región del Tíbet. Por la noche, el reportero sueña que su amigo Chang está en el avión y necesita su ayuda. Tras confirmar sus sospechas, el joven se dispone a rescatar a su amigo afrontando etapas progresivas con rompecabezas en el camino. Tendrá que escalar acantilados, paredes de roca, lagos peligrosos e incluso escalar un glaciar con su amigo el capitán Haddock en busca de Chang.

game.path: ./Tiny Toon Adventures - Buster Saves the Day (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It).zip
game.name: Tiny Toon Adventures : Buster Saves the Day
game.desc:
Basado en la caricatura de Tiny Toon Adventures, el jugador interpreta a Buster, que necesita sobrevivir a 11 niveles de plataforma de desplazamiento parcial, para liberar a sus amigos Babs, Pluck y Hampton de las garras de Montana Max.
Cada nivel está poblado por varios enemigos de un total de 23 tipos diferentes de enemigos. Pueden ser derrotados con diferentes tipos de balones que Buster tiene a su disposición (fútbol, fútbol y béisbol), que varían en su comportamiento. La pelota de béisbol viaja horizontalmente a baja velocidad y explota si golpea las paredes. Aturde a todos los enemigos cercanos a la explosión. Los balones de fútbol rebotan en el suelo y están sujetos por la gravedad, lo que significa que se caerán los bordes, etc. El balón de fútbol se desplaza muy rápido y rebota en diagonal de todo durante un período de tiempo determinado. El fútbol y el fútbol 'matan' con golpes directos.
El progreso se rastrea a través de una función de contraseña y la historia se cuenta a través de escenas de corte.

game.name: Tiny Toon Adventures : Dizzy's Candy Quest
game.desc:
This is a puzzle solving game in which the player (as Dizzy from the Tiny Toons Cartoon) has to collect and return different types of candy to a friendly robot that needs the candy to free himself from Montana Max.
The game is divided in 5 worlds (The Studios, Ice World, City, Gogo Dodo's world, Looniversity) with varying numbers of sublevels.
Getting to the candy is made complicated by conveyor belts, trap doors and fans as well as dissolving bridges etc. To add to the trouble, clones of popular Tiny Toon characters (Plucky Hamton, Furrball etc.) are programmed to attack the player.
Extras can be collected for extra energy, time etc. The game is presented from a top down perspective. Estimated playtime approx. 30 hours.

game.path: ./Titi - Le Tour du Monde en 80 Chats (France).zip
game.name: Tweety's High-Flying Adventure
game.desc: ¿Estás listo para eliminar algunos puttytats malos? Será mejor que estés listo para la acción si quieres sobrevivir al frenético caos de desplazamiento lateral de TWEETY'S HIGH-FLYING ADVENTURE para Game Boy Color. Juegas como el adorable Piolín en una aventura para salvar un orfanato en peligro de extinción. En una versión animada de ALREDEDOR DEL MUNDO EN 80 DÍAS, viajará a 10 lugares diferentes y recogerá huellas de 80 gatos repartidos por exóticas ciudades extranjeras. Necesitarás golpear a estos gatitos con armas y potenciadores como espátulas, pistolas de émbolo, manchas de aceite, cáscaras de plátano y más. Solo tenga cuidado de evitar masticar plantas, gusanos retorcidos, insectos, abejas y mariposas en el camino. Lola Bunny actualiza la acción con divertidos noticieros entre niveles mientras corres, saltas y vuelas hacia la victoria. Necesitará reflejos rápidos para romper botones y habilidades de salto de plataforma del más alto nivel para salvar a los niños en TWEETY'S HIGH-FLYING ADVENTURE.

game.name: Titus the Fox to Marrakech and Back
game.desc:
In the international edition of Lagaf: Les Aventures de Moktar - Vol 1: La Zoubida, you play Titus' fox mascot. His beloved Suzy has been kidnapped on the other side of the Sahara desert, and to get her back he has to advance through 15 levels (with codes for each one) comprising of nearly 1000 screens of platform gameplay, scrolling in 8 directions.
There are secret rooms to find, and bosses at the end of each level. The player can also interact with many parts of the background. Using available objects such as springs and crates correctly is often vital to progress. Alternate modes of transport such as Magic Carpets and Skateboards also make an appearance.

game.name: TNN Outdoors Fishing Champ
game.desc: Get out the rod and reel, because the challenge of fishing can now be put into the palm of your hand thanks to TNN OUTDOORS FISHING CHAMP. Play in the Free Fishing mode to get a feel for the game controls and learn how to reel-in the big one. When you want to test your mettle, try to become the undisputed fishing champion in the Tournament mode. You will have to travel to six different tournaments and catch a predetermined number of a specific kind of fish to stay alive in each. If your friends are fishing fanatics, you can challenge them and see who can catch the most fish in an hour. In all of the modes, there are over 30 different varieties of fish to catch including bluegill, catfish, walleye, rainbow trout, lake trout, and largemouth bass. Play TNN OUTDOORS FISHING CHAMP and have a fish tale to tell your friends.

game.name: TOCA Touring Car Championship
game.desc: Game Boy Color installment in Codemasters' TOCA racing franchise. Fight the pack to gain position without losing control of your car as you race on nine different original tracks of the British Touring Car Championships (TOCA). The developers worked hard to program real-world physics into the gameplay. Though running on the Game Boy Color hardware, the game manages to display up to eight cars simultaneously onscreen. Features include eight different game modes, such as single race, championship, time trial, and party play.

game.name: Toki Tori
game.desc:
Recién nacido de su caparazón, Toki Tori descubre que su familia ha sido secuestrada. Por suerte para él, incluso siendo tan pequeño, tiene muchas habilidades bajo la manga, por lo que se propone encontrar a su familia.
Un mezcla entre rompecabezas y acción, debes usar las habilidades disponibles para avanzar a través de 60 niveles, separados en 4 mundos de 15 niveles. Las habilidades incluyen construir escaleras para cruzar huecos que no puedes atravesar con tu salto, deformar a otras áreas del nivel o construir huecos para que los enemigos caigan.

game.path: ./Tokimeki Memorial Pocket - Culture Hen - Komorebi no Melody (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Tokimeki Memorial Pocket - Culture Hen - Komorebi
game.desc: The popular love simulation appears for the first time on the Game Boy. The only clubs that can be active are sports clubs. Using a communication cable, players can play against each other using the data after clearing the game.

game.path: ./Tokimeki Memorial Pocket - Sport Hen - Koutei no Photograph (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Tokimeki Memorial Pocket - Sport Hen - Koutei no P
game.desc: Ten characters appear here, including Kyoko Izumi, a newcomer. Incidentally, the types of clubs you can enter are different from those in the Culture section.

game.name: Tokoro-san No Setagaya C.c.
game.desc: A golf game in which characters drawn by George Tokoro play an active role. There are three modes in total, and in the stroke mode, hidden characters appear and you can take pictures with them.

game.name: Tom & Jerry
game.desc: The famous cat and mouse duo makes an appearance on the Game Boy Color in TOM AND JERRY. Take control of Jerry as he searches for his cousin Tuffie. To succeed, Jerry will have to explore 10 expansive levels filled with bottomless pits and spikes. In addition to these dangers, Jerry must keep an eye out for Tom who will eat him the first chance he gets. Luckily, Jerry can collect marbles that will slow Tom down and keep him away. In addition to the marbles, there are a large number of power-ups that will help Jerry while he searches including cheese, ice cream sodas, stars, clocks, and hearts. Will Jerry be able to find Tuffie? Can Tom capture the mouse and have him for lunch? Find out by playing TOM AND JERRY.

game.name: Tom and Jerry : Mousehunt
game.desc:
A chase game. Playing either Tom or Jerry, who have slightly different attributes (speed, power, size), the player has to fullfil a bunch of tasks centered around dozens of little nephew mice, invited by Jerry for his birthday and scared of into hiding by Tom. While Tom is looking to beef up his next meal, Jerry is trying to rescue his nephews. Depending on the level, the player has to collect a varying amount of mice during a varying timeframe. Various extras such as bombs, clubs, pans, cheese, a rubber duck and so on help with the task. The player has to run around an 8 way scrolling level and return the mice to his nest/hole (where they could still be bombed, counting for the opponent). Extras can be used to distract, punch, flatten or otherwise execute the opponent, essentially delaying him.
Progress is tracked via a password
The game also offers two mini games, 'Whack-a-cat' and a game resembling an old LCD game.

game.name: Tom and Jerry : Mousehunt
game.desc:
A chase game. Playing either Tom or Jerry, who have slightly different attributes (speed, power, size), the player has to fullfil a bunch of tasks centered around dozens of little nephew mice, invited by Jerry for his birthday and scared of into hiding by Tom. While Tom is looking to beef up his next meal, Jerry is trying to rescue his nephews. Depending on the level, the player has to collect a varying amount of mice during a varying timeframe. Various extras such as bombs, clubs, pans, cheese, a rubber duck and so on help with the task. The player has to run around an 8 way scrolling level and return the mice to his nest/hole (where they could still be bombed, counting for the opponent). Extras can be used to distract, punch, flatten or otherwise execute the opponent, essentially delaying him.
Progress is tracked via a password
The game also offers two mini games, 'Whack-a-cat' and a game resembling an old LCD game.

game.name: Tom and Jerry in Mouse Attacks!
game.desc: The most beloved cat and mouse team in cartoondom is together again in TOM AND JERRY IN MOUSE ATTACKS! for the Game Boy Color. Developer NewKidCo has gone all out to ensure this platform-jumping, pie-splattering, mini-game bursting title is fit for kids of all ages. In hectic, side-scrolling mayhem, you take control of everyone's favorite little brown mouse Jerry and work your way through five danger-filled levels in an attempt to free your kidnapped pals from the clutches of Tom. Collect as many golden items as you can as you open doors leading to a wide variety of challenging mini-games (eight to be exact). Complete slide-style puzzles, engage in a creamy pie-throwing contest (try to hit Tom in the face), and even water ski! You'll have to climb slippery poles, crash through obstacles, and make death-defying jumps in order to gather together your friends. Be careful to avoid jumping fish and creepy spiders if you want to succeed in the frantic, quick-reflex, button-pounding platform party of TOM AND JERRY IN MOUSE ATTACKS!

game.name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six
game.desc:
The Game Boy Color version of the original Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six game scales back the 3D visuals of the original game in favor of an almost top-down view, but builds on the same premise of the player controlling a member of the Rainbow counterterrorism unit, responsible for resolving hostage situations and neutralizing threats, in sixteen missions.
The limitations of the platform are not traded in for an arcade-like approach. Just like the major computer version it stresses careful planning and tactics. After a briefing that needs to be followed attentively, the player assumes the role of the commander and assembles a squad of eight operatives, each with different statistics and abilities, based on character traits such as aggression and self-control, physical elements such as stamina, and specific skills including stealth, firearms, electronics, demolitions and many other types of weapons. They can be divided into up to four independent teams. Next, the operatives are outfitted with a selection of six different rifles, six different handguns, 24 types of armor or camouflage and additional tools including heartbeat sensors and door charges. Default equipment is suggested right away, but that is not sufficient for later missions. In the planning mode, the last part of the pre-mission activities, the commander needs to set out waypoints on the map and determine the course of action.
The actual missions are shown in 2D where the different characters can sneak around, blow up doors, rescue hostages and engage the enemy, all requiring a tactical approach. The general plot points and mission objectives are true to the computer version.

game.name: Tomb Raider
game.desc:
En lo profundo de las selvas de Perú, escondida en un templo perdido se encuentra la "Piedra de la Pesadilla", un cristal antiguo y mágico. ¡En las manos equivocadas tiene el poder de destruir el mundo!.
Lara Croft debe encontrar el cristal antes que nadie, pero primero debe saltar, escalar, nadar y abrirse camino a través de templos, tumbas y salas de tesoros, enfrentándose a esqueletos, serpientes gigantes y espíritus malignos en su aventura más llena de acción hasta el momento.

game.path: ./Tomb Raider - Curse of the Sword (USA, Europe).zip
game.name: Tomb Raider : Curse of the Sword
game.desc: Mientras evita un robo en un museo, Lara es herida por una espada maldita. Sus peores temores comienzan a hacerse realidad, ya que un extraño culto está conspirando para robarle el alma. Ayuda a Lara Croft a salvarse mientras la controlas a través de aventuras de todo tipo en una mezcla de puzzles y acción. Recogerás llaves y artefactos a lo largo de la aventura, cada uno de los cuales te ayudará a desbloquear puertas y secretos. Adornado por una animación perfecta y una jugabilidad épica, Tomb Raider: Curse of the Sword continúa con la misma calidad que el resto de juegos de la saga Tomb Raider.

game.name: Tomb Raider : Curse of the Sword
game.desc: Mientras evita un robo en un museo, Lara es herida por una espada maldita. Sus peores temores comienzan a hacerse realidad, ya que un extraño culto está conspirando para robarle el alma. Ayuda a Lara Croft a salvarse mientras la controlas a través de aventuras de todo tipo en una mezcla de puzzles y acción. Recogerás llaves y artefactos a lo largo de la aventura, cada uno de los cuales te ayudará a desbloquear puertas y secretos. Adornado por una animación perfecta y una jugabilidad épica, Tomb Raider: Curse of the Sword continúa con la misma calidad que el resto de juegos de la saga Tomb Raider.

game.name: Tonic Trouble
game.desc:
Tonic Trouble for the Game Boy Color is a side-scrolling platform game featuring the alien janitor Ed as the protagonist, who spilled a toxic drink on Earth. This is causing all kinds of things to mutate, so agent XYZ is ordering Ed to go clean things up. Meanwhile badguy Grock is taking advantage of the Tonic.
While the story is the same as for the Windows and Nintendo 64 version, the gameplay and levels are quite different. The Game Boy Color version is completely in 2D and plays like a classic 2D platform game. Ed can walk and jump and has to avoid obstacles such as pits, falling platforms, poison spitting holes, and mutated enemies.

game.name: Tonka Construction Site
game.desc: DIG, SCOOP, HAUL with 7 different tough TONKA trucks to build roads, move boulders, construct buildings and more! Over 50 missions in 5 different parts of TONKA town mean hours of construction fun. Plus, earn rewards after each mission to upgrade your vehicles!

game.name: Tonka Raceway
game.desc: Tonka trucks come to the Game Boy Color for some racing in TONKA RACEWAY. You can choose from four different vehicles including a dump truck, 4X4, racecar, and bulldozer. After you have chosen the perfect vehicle, get on one of the three tracks: "Tropical Paradise," "Scorching Desert," or the "Winter Wonderland." Your biggest challenge will be to try and stay off of the walls and in the lead. Once you cross the finish line, you receive points that you can use to upgrade your vehicle in four different areas: tires, shocks, turbo, and engine. Thanks to the built-in rumble capabilities, you will feel every bump and jolt in the game. Try to become a driving champion with TONKA RACEWAY.

game.name: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater
game.desc:
Esta es la primera versión portátil del popular juego de skate de Tony Hawk. Se parece poco a la versión original de Playstation. En realidad, se compone de dos eventos diferentes, un half pipe y un modo carrera.
El modo Half Pipe se ve desde una perspectiva lateral, como en el clásico juego Skate or Die, donde realizas trucos para lograr la puntuación más alta posible. El modo carrera se ve desde una perspectiva desde arriba, donde el objetivo es realizar trucos y llegar a la meta en el menor tiempo posible.

game.name: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 2
game.desc:
The Game Boy Color version of Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 2 is based off the console game of the same name. Instead of exploring a 3D environment, however, players perform tricks in 2D side-scrolling levels.
Players can select their skater and board, each of which has their own unique stats, allowing you to choose the combination that's perfect for you. Each of the thirteen different characters even has their own signature tricks to perform.

game.name: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3
game.desc:
Tony Hawk returns with an all new line-up of skaters, an all new line-up of parks to crash through, and a whole new level of graphics.
The line-up of street and vert riders include Elissa Steamer, Jamie Thomas, Steve Caballero, Rune Glifberg, Geoff Rowley, Andrew Reynolds, Rodney Mullen, Eric Koston, Chad Muska, Bucky Lasek and Bam Margera from MTV's Jackass (and Tony Hawk, of course).
The create a skater mode returns, allowing for even further levels of options for your character, like adding glasses and tatoos to changing the colour of the knee and elbow pads or even the hair.
And the levels themselves that you must skate through are now more interactive, with cars and humans blocking paths and making noise as you race around to make as many points as possible. Use items around the streets or the park to jump from or over to increase your score, and pull of as many wild and wacky tricks as you can.

game.name: Toobin'
game.desc: Toobin' involves Biff and Jet racing their way down the rapids of a river, riding on tires. You rotate your tyre left or right, and drift as the current sends you, making sure to avoid the banks of the river, and the dividing lines in the middle. Hazards include crocodiles, stray logs and branches, and fishermen - you are armed with a limited supply of tin cans to take care of these. There are gates to slide through on the way down - these give you a points bonus. Each level has a strict time limit to adhere to, although there's a kickin' party at the end if you succeed.

game.name: Toonsylvania
game.desc: Toonsylvania es un juego de plataformas de desplazamiento lateral basado en la serie animada de televisión del mismo nombre. En el juego, el asistente del Dr. Vic Frankenstein, Igor, ha inventado algunas prendas útiles. Sin embargo, cuando intenta probarlo con Phil, las cosas salen mal y Phil explota. Ahora le toca a Igor limpiar las cosas antes de que regrese Frankenstein. Juegas como Igor y te abres camino a través de 5 mundos diferentes, para recolectar partes de Phil. Mientras tanto puedes coleccionar inventos que mejoran tu salud y habilidades combativas. Igor puede golpear a los enemigos y arrojarles calaveras desde la distancia. Hay tres niveles secretos en el juego, que requieren una clave UBI para desbloquearlos. Una de las claves está escondida en algún lugar del juego, otras se pueden obtener de otros títulos de Ubi Soft para Game Boy Color.

game.name: Tootuff
game.desc:
Unbelievable!.. Nadia's totally-mega photo is in a thousand pieces... The treasure hunt is on! Hurry to join Tootuff and his friends and find out just who is the King of the Playground!
- 21 over-the-top tests of skill: Death Target, The Labyrinth of Fear, Mash gets Smashed, Poo Wars... - 2 complementary game modes: "Mega Contest" or "Playground Express"? - Up to 4 players with a single Game Pak, without a Game Link cable! - A game chock-a-block with fun, and easy to play!
Your greatest-ever pranks... You'll do them with Tootuff!

game.name: Top Gear Rally
game.desc:
Rally race through the city streets, grasslands and sandy terrain against eight other racers (or a friend) to the finish line. The higher you rank at the end of each race, the more new tracks you open up (including tracks full of ice). Time trial mode also allows you to test the time on each track.
12 cars are available to drive, each with different handling and speed abilites and you can choose to race each car either with manual or automatic gearbox changes. The in-built rumble feature of the cart also vibrates to each crash and burn you make.

game.name: Top Gear Rally 2
game.desc:
Another round of Top Gear rally action on the GBC. On this occasion, depending on where you finish each race, you are awarded points. These points then go towards improving the stats of the rally car you are using (speed, braking, acceleration and top speed).
Championships are split into seasons, each harder then the last. You can opt to change the weather conditions (day, night, sunny, rain, snow) or practise on the track to get used to the corners and timing.
You can also play against a friend in two player mode.

game.name: Top Gear Rally
game.desc:
Rally race through the city streets, grasslands and sandy terrain against eight other racers (or a friend) to the finish line. The higher you rank at the end of each race, the more new tracks you open up (including tracks full of ice). Time trial mode also allows you to test the time on each track.
12 cars are available to drive, each with different handling and speed abilites and you can choose to race each car either with manual or automatic gearbox changes. The in-built rumble feature of the cart also vibrates to each crash and burn you make.

game.name: Top Gear Rally 2
game.desc:
Another round of Top Gear rally action on the GBC. On this occasion, depending on where you finish each race, you are awarded points. These points then go towards improving the stats of the rally car you are using (speed, braking, acceleration and top speed).
Championships are split into seasons, each harder then the last. You can opt to change the weather conditions (day, night, sunny, rain, snow) or practise on the track to get used to the corners and timing.
You can also play against a friend in two player mode.

game.name: Top Gun : Fire Storm
game.desc:
Top Gun: Firestorm takes the player to the skies again in twelve missions where numerous aerial and ground based enemies need to be fought to arhieve victory.
The story is very loosely based on the movie of the same name. The player guides the well known pilot Maverick through a series of realistic training missions to receive graduation from the Top Gun school. The story is advanced in several stills throughout the game.
The player will fly a F-14 Tomcat on an isometric map. He has to complete several objectives in each mission. To achieve those he has four different weapons at his disposal (machine gun, bombs, rockets and missiles). The gameplay is somewhat similar to the Strike series.

game.name: Totsugeki! Papparatai
game.desc: Popular manga "Assault! Pappara-tai" is now available as a collection of mini-games. Clear the shooting games with rich variations to advance the storyline.

game.name: Tottoko Hamutarou - Tomodachi Daisakusen Dechu
game.desc: Become friends with Hamtaro, a well-known comic book character. Enter your friend's data and the game will tell your fortune based on it. You can also exchange friends' data via infrared communication.

game.name: Hamtaro : Ham-Hams Unite!
game.desc:
It's Hamtaro time! Boss has a big secret in store for the Ham-Hams, but he's gotta find them first! The guy's got too much on his hands already, so he sends the loveable Carrot-headed Hamtaro out on the search for the Ham-Hams. The thing is... Hamtaro's gotta learn some hip Ham-chat if he wants everyone to listen to him. So as he ventures on in the game, he becomes the street-wise hipster, learning Ham-chat and getting into tons of adventures... and trouble!
Make friends for life! Go out and have an adventure! Remember... get everyone back to the clubhouse to see what Boss's big secret is...
This game is based on the anime Tottoko Hamtaro, created by Ritsuko Kawai.

game.name: Towers : Lord Baniff's Deceit
game.desc: En su camino para ayudar en la batalla contra Sargón, una tripulación de aventureros, cada uno hábil a su manera, se encuentra con una tormenta que abre un agujero en su barco. Al llegar a salvo a Lamini, o Tierra de las Torres, la gente amable de la tierra ayuda a reparar el barco dañado. Mientras los miembros de la tripulación buscan trabajo, se encuentran con el alcalde de la ciudad que necesita mensajeros. Les dice a los aventureros que no se ha sabido nada de Lord Baniff en semanas, y que necesita que lo busquen en su Torre y traigan noticias de su condición. Al entrar por la puerta de entrada a la Torre, la entrada se derrumba detrás de ellos y deben encontrar la salida. El modo de juego es similar a otros juegos de D&D en tiempo real en primera persona como la serie Eye of the Beholder, aunque no tan complejo. Hay cuatro personajes en el juego y eliges uno para controlar. Los encantamientos de hechizos se aprenden de los pergaminos y se lanzan combinando las sílabas correctas. Hay 15 niveles para explorar y toneladas de monstruos y elementos para encontrar. Puedes jugar el juego en modo cooperativo con otro jugador usando un cable de enlace.

game.name: Towers II : Plight of the Stargazer
game.desc: Become one of four different characters as you are immersed within the strange happenings in the mystical land of Lamini. You must uncover the secrets as you explore Daggan's tower. Many before you have tried, but none have returned. First person perspective, full screen smooth scrolling, talk to others, refer to maps, collect 100's of items, encounter 100's of creatures, experience challenges in combat and spell casting. Hours and hours of entertainment with appropriate save features.

game.name: Toy Story 2
game.desc: As space hero Buzz Lightyear, you've got your hands full. Your best buddy, Woody, has been kidnapped by a greedy toy collector and it's going to be an all-out race against time to save him.

game.name: Toy Story Racer
game.desc: El juego está basado en el universo de Toy Story, el jugador tiene que recolectar 200 soldados a lo largo del juego ganándolos en diferentes carreras. Ocho de los doce personajes pueden desbloquearse al obtener el número requerido de soldados. Los personajes básicos son: Woody, Buzz, la pastorcilla y RC.

game.path: ./Trade & Battle Card Hero (Japan) (Rev 1) (3DS Virtual Console) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible).zip
game.name: Trade & Battle Card Hero
game.desc: A card game in which players collect a total of 114 types of cards, create decks, and fight. You can win by using various types of monster cards to reduce the opponent master's strength to zero.

game.name: Trick Boarder
game.desc: Trick Star es un juego de carreras futurista en el que los corredores montan elegantes bicicletas de una rueda. Los jugadores corren a lo largo de la pista, con el objetivo de no solo llegar primero, sino también realizar acrobacias para impresionar a las multitudes. Las acrobacias no se pueden realizar hasta que se alcance una cierta velocidad y se realizan manteniendo L o R. En el modo Liga, los jugadores deben completar tres pistas, además de sumar suficientes puntos para calificar para el modo Desafío. Una vez que el jugador tiene suficientes puntos, puede ingresar al modo Desafío, donde se les pide que realicen un conjunto particular de acrobacias entre los marcadores. Cuando tienen éxito, son recompensados ​​con acrobacias adicionales y progresan al siguiente conjunto de pistas. Trick Star también incluye un jugador a la vez multijugador, para hasta cuatro jugadores. Los jugadores pueden competir en Contrarreloj , Acrobacias , Salto largo y Desafíos. Después de que cada jugador haya tenido una oportunidad, se muestran los resultados.

game.name: Trick Boarder
game.desc: Trick Star es un juego de carreras futurista en el que los corredores montan elegantes bicicletas de una rueda. Los jugadores corren a lo largo de la pista, con el objetivo de no solo llegar primero, sino también realizar acrobacias para impresionar a las multitudes. Las acrobacias no se pueden realizar hasta que se alcance una cierta velocidad y se realizan manteniendo L o R. En el modo Liga, los jugadores deben completar tres pistas, además de sumar suficientes puntos para calificar para el modo Desafío. Una vez que el jugador tiene suficientes puntos, puede ingresar al modo Desafío, donde se les pide que realicen un conjunto particular de acrobacias entre los marcadores. Cuando tienen éxito, son recompensados ​​con acrobacias adicionales y progresan al siguiente conjunto de pistas. Trick Star también incluye un jugador a la vez multijugador, para hasta cuatro jugadores. Los jugadores pueden competir en Contrarreloj , Acrobacias , Salto largo y Desafíos. Después de que cada jugador haya tenido una oportunidad, se muestran los resultados.

game.name: Triple Play 2001
game.desc: The highly popular baseball series TRIPLE PLAY makes its appearance on the Game Boy Color with TRIPLE PLAY 2001. You can play with or against any of the 30 Major League teams with complete rosters based on the 1999 season. You can also play in all of the Major League ballparks. Once you have chosen your team, try to hit as many homers as possible in the Home Run Derby. When you are ready for real competition, play a game against any opponent. While pitching, you can throw curves, fastballs, and change-ups. And when you're at the plate, you decide when to swing for the fences and when to hit for average. Get all of the baseball action you can handle with TRIPLE PLAY 2001.

game.name: Trouballs
game.desc: Si estás listo para un caos de acción de rompecabezas explosivo y alucinante, hazte con una copia de TROUBALLS de Capcom. En este juego tremendamente adictivo desarrollado exclusivamente para Game Boy Color, depende de ti ganar tantos puntos como puedas mientras el reloj avanza. Así es como funciona: se unen bolas de diferentes colores a los engranajes en movimiento; giras los engranajes en un intento de alinear cuatro bolas del mismo color (en una cuadrícula cuadrada de 2x2 en la parte inferior de la pantalla), lo que las hace añicos. Esto despeja el escenario y te hace avanzar al siguiente nivel. Sin embargo, no hay tiempo para descansar, ya que cada ronda sucesiva de diversión de explosión de esferas es más difícil que la anterior. Escucharás cinco canciones originales en el desafiante juego pop-and-bop que te enfrenta en más de 100 niveles de movimiento rápido. Si no te cansas de TETRIS o BUST-A-MOVE, entonces te encantará TROUBALLS.

game.name: Tsuri Sensei 2
game.desc: An RPG in which players explore an island while gathering information in order to catch a mysterious fish. The fish you catch are recorded in a picture book.

game.name: Tsuriiko!!
game.desc: The fish are attracted and fished by aligning the cursor with the target point, throwing the lure into the water, and then hitting it repeatedly. This software pursues the enjoyment of fishing with simple operations.

game.name: Turok : Rage Wars
game.desc: Turok: Rage Wars is an action game, in which the main character Turok has to travel through four worlds while fighting enemies with multiple weapons. Each world is made of various levels, some of which have persistent scrolling. Weapons can be upgraded or combined to achieve various effects. The scenario is about Turok trying to prevent dinosaurs and bionosaurs to reach Earth through dimensional portals.

game.name: Turok 2 : Seeds of Evil
game.desc: Turok 2: Seeds Of Evil es un juego de disparos en primera persona. Debes acabar con tus enemigos los dinosaurios, y salvar a los niños secuestrados por estos monstruos. A medida que avanzas por los niveles, debes recolectar nuevas armas, obtener bonificaciones y encontrar llaves.

game.name: Turok 3 : Shadow of Oblivion
game.desc:
In Turok 2 when Primagen's Lightship was destroyed, the explosion created a shockwave through out the universe. This effect nearly ends the life of Oblivion, a 'thing' the drifts through space, consuming anything that ends up in its way. Also during this explosion, a new world was created. In this world lies the Turok family tree, and Oblivion knows that the only way the pain the lies within can be stopped, is to destroy the Turok line.
The third title in the Turok series adds two characters to play instead of one, new weapons (as well as some old favourites) and a highly detailed soundtracks with cut-scenes detailing the storyline as you go along.

game.name: Tweenies : Doodles' Bones
game.desc:
Doodles has lost his bones! Max has made a map showing where all Doodles' bones are buried but the map has been torn up and all the pieces lost!
Complete exciting games and puzzles with the Tweenies to find the missing pieces of treasure map. Once you have all the pieces, help Doodles use the map to locate his buried bones in the garden and celebrate his success along with the Tweenies.
- Four fantasy world platform game levels - Five puzzle levels - All games and puzzles have Easy, Medium and Hard levels

game.path: ./Tweety Sekaiisshuu - 80 Hiki no Neko o Sagase! (Japan).zip
game.name: Tweety's High-Flying Adventure
game.desc: ¿Estás listo para eliminar algunos puttytats malos? Será mejor que estés listo para la acción si quieres sobrevivir al frenético caos de desplazamiento lateral de TWEETY'S HIGH-FLYING ADVENTURE para Game Boy Color. Juegas como el adorable Piolín en una aventura para salvar un orfanato en peligro de extinción. En una versión animada de ALREDEDOR DEL MUNDO EN 80 DÍAS, viajará a 10 lugares diferentes y recogerá huellas de 80 gatos repartidos por exóticas ciudades extranjeras. Necesitarás golpear a estos gatitos con armas y potenciadores como espátulas, pistolas de émbolo, manchas de aceite, cáscaras de plátano y más. Solo tenga cuidado de evitar masticar plantas, gusanos retorcidos, insectos, abejas y mariposas en el camino. Lola Bunny actualiza la acción con divertidos noticieros entre niveles mientras corres, saltas y vuelas hacia la victoria. Necesitará reflejos rápidos para romper botones y habilidades de salto de plataforma del más alto nivel para salvar a los niños en TWEETY'S HIGH-FLYING ADVENTURE.

game.name: Tweety's High-Flying Adventure
game.desc: ¿Estás listo para eliminar algunos puttytats malos? Será mejor que estés listo para la acción si quieres sobrevivir al frenético caos de desplazamiento lateral de TWEETY'S HIGH-FLYING ADVENTURE para Game Boy Color. Juegas como el adorable Piolín en una aventura para salvar un orfanato en peligro de extinción. En una versión animada de ALREDEDOR DEL MUNDO EN 80 DÍAS, viajará a 10 lugares diferentes y recogerá huellas de 80 gatos repartidos por exóticas ciudades extranjeras. Necesitarás golpear a estos gatitos con armas y potenciadores como espátulas, pistolas de émbolo, manchas de aceite, cáscaras de plátano y más. Solo tenga cuidado de evitar masticar plantas, gusanos retorcidos, insectos, abejas y mariposas en el camino. Lola Bunny actualiza la acción con divertidos noticieros entre niveles mientras corres, saltas y vuelas hacia la victoria. Necesitará reflejos rápidos para romper botones y habilidades de salto de plataforma del más alto nivel para salvar a los niños en TWEETY'S HIGH-FLYING ADVENTURE.

game.name: Tyrannosaurus Tex
game.desc: La historia del juego comienza cuando hace unos 2000 años, una nave espacial de robots alienígenas se estrelló en medio del desierto de Texas. Los robots alienígenas que tratan de encontrar material para reparar su nave espacial tropiezan con fósiles de dinosaurios dentro de una cueva. Con sus avances tecnológicos y piezas de desecho de su nave espacial estrellada, los robots alienígenas son capaces de revivir los fósiles de dinosaurios. Viven en armonía durante años dentro de una sociedad subterránea, hasta que algunos vaqueros cazadores de diamantes de la ciudad de East Wood llegan para interrumpir su hábitat pacífico.

game.name: Tyrian 2000
game.desc:
Set in a faraway star sector, Tyrian is a fairly generic sci-fi-themed shooter on the surface. You'll pilot your ship through a wide variety of vertically-scrolling, parallax-rendered environments.
The Game Boy Color version of Tyrian 2000 would have been the first time Tyrian ventured off of home PCs. However, it ultimately was cancelled in favor of the Game Boy Advance version... which met the same fate later on.

game.path: ./Uchuujin Tanaka Tarou de - RPG Tsukuru GB 2 (Japan).zip
game.name: Uchuu Nin Tanaka Tarou De Rpg Tsukuru Gb2
game.desc: Software que permite crear fácilmente juegos de rol utilizando materiales y elementos ya preparados. Como muestra, se incluye un juego en el que aparece el personaje de comics "Taro Tanaka".

game.name: UEFA 2000
game.desc: UEFA 2000 es un juego de fútbol con licencia oficial para Game Boy Color. En el juego puedes jugar con muchas selecciones nacionales. Sin embargo, sólo la selección inglesa tiene nombres de jugadores reales. Puedes jugar el juego en modo práctica, amistoso, copa y liga. Los ajustes incluyen una opción para elegir entre prórroga o gol de oro (el primero en marcar gana). Como en cualquier juego de fútbol, puedes disparar, pasar, entrar, regatear y rematar de cabeza. El juego viene con tres ajustes de dificultad.

game.name: Ultimate Fighting Championship
game.desc: En Ultimate Fighting Championship vale todo. Desde técnicas disciplinadas de artes marciales hasta lucha libre, todas las formas de lucha están representadas. Puedes elegir entre ocho luchadores diferentes, cada uno con diferentes estilos y habilidades de lucha. Una vez en el ring, tienes control total sobre el movimiento de tu luchador. Puedes evitar los ataques de tus rivales pulsando arriba o abajo, lo que le da al juego una sensación pseudo-3D. Toma el control y aprende a utilizar las fortalezas y debilidades de un luchador en el modo Entrenamiento. Cuando estés listo para el desafío, empieza una partida simple en el modo Versus, conviértete en campeón mundial en el modo Torneo o intenta vencer a tantos luchadores como puedas antes de ser eliminado en el modo Supervivencia.

game.name: Ultimate Paint Ball
game.desc: Juego de paintball para Game Boy Color. Es un juego de captura de la bandera que contiene varios niveles. Recorres el mapa desde una vista cenital y, cuando te encuentras en un territorio peligroso, el juego cambia a un entorno de desplazamiento lateral en primera persona en el que tus pies están fijos en un punto central. Aquí lucharás contra tus oponentes utilizando tu pistola de bolas y granadas de pintura. A medida que juegas los niveles se vuelven más difíciles y en los mapas posteriores hay más de una bandera. También puedes comprar más armas.

game.name: Ultimate Surfing
game.desc: Hang 10 with one the coolest games ever to fit in the palm of your hand. Start out in Free mode, which allows you to surf in any of six different locales around the world: Travel from Australia to sunny California, through Japan, into Hawaii, Brazil, and ultimately the South Pole. Grand Prix mode sends you to the same glorious locales, but challenges you to surf in a circuit that houses the toughest competition in the world. Choose one of six awesome characters to take through to the game's conclusion, and enjoy creative side games like Frisbee Toss and Capture the Flag. The top-notch graphics and gameplay of ULTIMATE SURFING will have you feeling the ocean's breeze splashing across your face, and the controls are simple to learn but sophisticated enough to appeal to the most discerning handheld gamers. As if all of this weren't a sweet enough deal, you can link up with another player and surf against one another. Now, that's one gnarly game, dude.

game.name: Uno
game.desc: UNO, el clásico juego de cartas en el que saltas turnos, robas dos y cambias de sentido el juego, llega a Game Boy Color. Hay dos modos de juego: estándar y Desafío. Estándar hace que los jugadores jueguen hasta que alcancen un número específico de puntos, generalmente 1000. Sin embargo, un jugador solo gana puntos cuando se deshace de todas las cartas en su mano. Los puntos son el valor total de las cartas que quedan en manos del oponente. En Desafío, cada jugador tiene una cantidad determinada de puntos, y es eliminado cuando alcanza el total de puntos. El juego continúa hasta que sólo queda un jugador. En ambos modos, puedes jugar contra hasta tres oponentes controlados por computadora. También puedes jugar con un oponente humano a través de un cable Link. Como extra, hay tres cartas nuevas que no forman parte del juego original.

game.name: V-Rally : Championship Edition
game.desc: Elige entre cuatro coches de rally del mundo real: Peugeot 306 Maxi, Mitsubishi Lancer WRC, V-Rally Ford Escort WRC y Subaru Impreza WRC. y compite en 40 pistas de lugares exóticos como Indonesia, Córcega, Nueva Zelanda, los Alpes, Reino Unido, Grecia, Argentina, Italia y Suecia. El terreno de cada pista afecta a la tracción del vehículo y debes tener cuidado porque la nieve, la tierra y el asfalto hacen que tengas que pilotar en cada una de las superficies de forma diferente. Además del terreno, estate atento a obstáculos como rocas, mareas negras, barrancos y saltos.

game.name: Vegas Games
game.desc: Trate de hacer saltar la banca y convertirte en millonario. Puedes jugar 20 juegos de casino diferentes, tanto de cartas como de máquinas. Los juegos de cartas incluyen Blackjack y Baccarat. Apuesta a los dados en Craps, o al resultado en Money Wheel o Roulette. Si los juegos de lotería son más tu estilo, intenta ganar a lo grande en Keno y Video Keno. Hay cinco versiones diferentes de Video Poker para probar, incluyendo Deuces Wild, Tens or Better, Jokers Wild Double Down, Jacks or Better High Roller y Jacks or Better Double Down. Ningún casino está completo sin máquinas tragaperras, y éste juego no es una excepción. Tiene ocho máquinas diferentes para probar: Ancient Treasures, Love 2 Win, Go Fish, Easy Money, Dynamite Dollars, Buffet, Buck Teeth y Beyond the Stars. Si te encanta apostar, disfrutarás con este juego.

game.name: Vigilante 8
game.desc: Este juego nos sitúa en el oeste de los EE.UU. durante una época de escasez mundial de petróleo en 1976. OMAR (Oil Monopoly Alliance Regime) está haciendo dinero de la escasez de combustible, excepto en los EE.UU, que no dan su brazo a torcer. Para ello, OMAR contrata al mejor terrorista que $ 100 millones podrían comprar: Sid Burn. Su trabajo, ayudado por 5 coyotes contratados, es destruir todas las refinerías de gas en el suroeste de los EE.UU. para que OMAR pueda poner a Estados Unidos de rodillas. Más tarde, cuando los precios del gas se volvieron salvajes, 6 civiles con el nombre de Vigilantes liderados por el chofer de camiones Convoy, luchan contra los Coyotes en diferentes áreas para evitar que OMAR triunfe.

game.name: VIP
game.desc: Únete a la ferviente y sexy Vallery Irons (Pamela Anderson) y al resto del equipo VIP mientras te embarcas en misiones criminales para proteger a un famoso cirujano plástico del gángster más famoso de Los Ángeles. Controla a las sexys heroínas VIP: Vallery Irons, Tasha Dexter y Nikki Franco, junto con los hombres VIP: Quick Williams y Johnny Loh.

game.name: Visiteurs, Les
game.desc: Les Visiteurs is based off the infamous French comedy of the early 90s. In this platformer for the Game Boy Color, play as Godefroy de Montmirail and Jacquouille La Fripouille in various levels such as a forest or a castle. Use knives or your swashbuckling skills to defeat your enemies, and return to your era.

game.name: Wacky Races
game.desc: For those who can remember the cartoon series, this will be a blast from the past. Choose from all your favourite characters including Peter Perfect, Penelope Pitstop and, of course, Dick Dastardly and Muttley, and wind your way through cartoon like environments in the familiar vehicles of each character. Simply get to the end of the race first to open up new tracks, and use weapons to pick off the rest of the cast, and aid your progress.

game.path: ./Walt Disney World Quest - Magical Racing Tour (USA, Europe).zip
game.name: Walt Disney World Quest : Magical Racing Tour
game.desc: A cart racing game featuring Disney Characters Starring Jiminy Cricket, Chip, and Dale, and a few characters created specifically for the game. The catch is that all of the tracks are actually based on rides at all of the four Walt Disney World Parks (Haunted Mansion, Splash Mountain, Space Mountain, Rock'n'Rollercoaster, Typhoon Lagoon, etc...).

game.path: ./Warau Inu no Bouken - Silly Go Lucky! (Japan).zip
game.name: Warau Inu No Bouken - Silly Go Lucky!
game.desc: The objective is to become a new director and aim for high ratings, and to advance the program to a golden slot. There are 20 different types of comedy to be broadcast. All of them are made into mini-games.

game.name: Wario Land II
game.desc:
Buscando venganza sobre Wario después de robar su tesoro en "Wario Land: Super Mario Land 3", agentes especiales de la banda "Black Sugar Gang of Kitchen Island" se meten a hurtadillas en el recién construido castillo de Wario, se roban el tesoro y dejan el castillo y la zona circundante como un desastre. Como Wario, debes limpiar el lugar y recuperar lo que ahora llamas tuyo.
Comparando con el original "Wario Land", Wario es ahora inmortal, hasta cierto punto. En lugar de morir cuando un enemigo lo golpea, Wario pierde las monedas que recogió a lo largo de sus viajes en cada nivel. Y también puede convertirse en otros Warios. Por ejemplo, si una abeja lo golpea, Wario se infla en una bola de aire gigante y flota hasta la cima del nivel. Sólo cuando lo golpea un objeto puntiagudo volverá a la normalidad. Hay otros tipos, como "Fire Wario" y "Zombie Wario", y cada uno puede tener sus ventajas, como llegar a otras áreas que de otro modo serían inalcanzables, o pueden detener tu progreso.

game.name: Wario Land 3
game.desc: Durante un paseo en su biplano, el motor explota y Wario se estrella contra el bosque. Es aquí donde encuentra una cueva escondida con una caja de música mágica. Antes de que pueda decir "Odio a Mario", la caja lo absorbe y lo lleva dentro de una habitación con una figura oscura, quien hace un trato con él. Debe encontrar todas las cajas de música que faltan y podrá irse. Y cualquier tesoro que encuentre se lo puede quedar. Al igual que Wario Land 2, Wario no puede morir por ningún ataque del enemigo. Sin embargo, puede cambiar de forma después de ciertos ataques, lo que puede ayudar y detener su progreso en cada nivel. Las nuevas formas de Wario incluyen Invisible Wario y Ball of Yarn Wario (una bola de hilo incontrolable, con Wario dentro). Además, ciertas habilidades no están disponibles para Wario hasta después de completar una cierta cantidad de niveles, lo que significa que debes volver a los niveles completados para acceder a otras áreas llenas de botín.

game.name: Wario Land II
game.desc:
Buscando venganza sobre Wario después de robar su tesoro en "Wario Land: Super Mario Land 3", agentes especiales de la banda "Black Sugar Gang of Kitchen Island" se meten a hurtadillas en el recién construido castillo de Wario, se roban el tesoro y dejan el castillo y la zona circundante como un desastre. Como Wario, debes limpiar el lugar y recuperar lo que ahora llamas tuyo.
Comparando con el original "Wario Land", Wario es ahora inmortal, hasta cierto punto. En lugar de morir cuando un enemigo lo golpea, Wario pierde las monedas que recogió a lo largo de sus viajes en cada nivel. Y también puede convertirse en otros Warios. Por ejemplo, si una abeja lo golpea, Wario se infla en una bola de aire gigante y flota hasta la cima del nivel. Sólo cuando lo golpea un objeto puntiagudo volverá a la normalidad. Hay otros tipos, como "Fire Wario" y "Zombie Wario", y cada uno puede tener sus ventajas, como llegar a otras áreas que de otro modo serían inalcanzables, o pueden detener tu progreso.

game.name: Warlocked
game.desc:
En el peligroso mundo de Warlocked, se libra una feroz guerra entre las fuerzas humanas de la reina Azarel y la horda de bestias del jefe Zog. Los jugadores pueden controlar cualquiera de los dos bandos, y cada uno de ellos ofrece 30 misiones.
Warlocked es un juego de estrategia en tiempo real ambientado en un escenario de guerra de fantasía. La clave de la victoria es una combinación equilibrada de recolección de recursos, construcción, exploración y combate. Añadiendo un toque mágico a la acción está la presencia de magos, cada uno de los cuales tiene un hechizo. Mientras que algunos magos pueden convertir tropas enemigas a tu bando, otros pueden convertirlas en gallinas o esqueletos. Más de 20 tipos de magos se esconden a lo largo de todo el juego.

game.name: Warriors of Might and Magic
game.desc: Step into the shoes of a warrior by the name of Alleron. Framed for a crime in which he did not commit he is branded with a painful mask and banished into the depths of the dungeon. Here he must fight his way out and discover the truth behind this crime. Will he save the world from destruction or will he fall at the feet of his nemesis.

game.name: Watashi No Kitchen
game.desc: A game that allows you to experience cooking based on more than 10 recipes. The player goes shopping, selects the ingredients, and then follows the messages in the kitchen to cook the food. The finished dish will be eaten by your father or mother. If you make a delicious dish, you will be praised.

game.name: Watashi No Restaurant
game.desc: Become Yumemi and cook a variety of dishes. Buy ingredients at the supermarket according to the recipe and follow the instructions given by your cooking teacher.

game.name: WCW Mayhem
game.desc: Do you think you can take the WCW championship? Now you can try in WCW MAYHEM. There are 12 WCW superstars you can compete with or against including Sting, Goldberg, Hollywood Hogan, Kevin "Big Sexy" Nash, Randy "Macho Man" Savage, Diamond Dallas Page, Bret Hart, Bam Bam Bigelow, Ric Flair, Buff Bagwell, Booker T., and Lex Luger. All of the wrestlers have special characteristics and unique finishing moves. Take on any of the wrestlers in the Player vs. Computer mode, or you can try to win the championship in the Quest for the Best mode. You can also challenge your friends to a match in the Player vs. Player mode. In all of the modes, you can take the action outside of the ring, giving you the full WCW treatment. Are you tough enough to stay alive and win the WCW championship with WCW MAYHEM?

game.name: World Destruction League : Thunder Tanks
game.desc: In the future the world is a very bleak place, where the major form of entertainment is the World Destruction League. The League travels throughout the world hosting competitions, in which the contestants try to blow each other to little bits while riding in tanks. You are one of the contestants, and can play as any of 12 competitors with unique tanks and weapons. Compete in 35 competitions in seven different arenas, each arena filled with buildings and other obstacles. However, you can create "short cuts" by blasting the obstacles out of the way. Throughout the game, you can use over 20 different weapons and four power-ups to destroy the competition. Will you be able to survive the competition of WORLD DESTRUCTION LEAGUE: Thunder Tanks?

game.name: Wendy: Der Traum von Arizona
game.desc:
"Wendy: Der Traum von Arizona" is an action adventure for children of any age.
You play the party of Wendy, a German children's cartoon star. She and her friend Bianca are dreaming of going on a riding holiday in Arizona. To get the money required for it, they have to win horse tournaments.
There are seven levels. They are divided into two types: There are action-adventure levels where you have to accomplish different tasks -- like helping your parents or shoeing your horse. To do this, you have to speak to different people, find and use items at the right location and succeed in some mini-games, all the while keeping a safe distance from evil animals (like sheep...) which hurt you when touched.
Between these action-adventure levels, there are the tournament levels in which you perform in several different riding disciplines, often with some qualification stage before.
At the end of the game, there is another arcade sequence in which you have to drive the taxi to the airport. If you have done this, you can enjoy the ending.
After finishing the game, you can switch to a "tournament mode" where you can replay each tournament to get as much points as you can.

game.name: Wendy : Every Witch Way
game.desc:
Wendy: Every Witch Way es un juego de plataformas y rompecabezas en el que juegas como la brujita vestida de rojo. El equilibrio del mundo está en peligro por tu culpa y ahora debes hacer todo lo posible para restaurar el orden en este mundo donde la gravedad ya no existe.
El juego es una combinación de un juego de plataformas de desplazamiento lateral y un juego de rompecabezas. Como Wendy, los jugadores exploran el castillo en busca de las piedras que han alterado la gravedad. Wendy tiene la capacidad de controlar la gravedad por sí misma: presionando hacia arriba o hacia abajo en el panel de control mientras salta, Wendy hará que la gravedad se invierta en esa dirección. La mayoría de los enemigos y obstáculos en el mundo del juego también se ven afectados por el cambio de gravedad: tendrás que manipular la gravedad con frecuencia para avanzar en los diferentes acertijos del juego.

game.name: Wetrix GB
game.desc: The deeper you go, the greater the pressure becomes. Welcome to the world of Wetrix, the spectacular cellular water puzzle that keeps you immersed for hours at a time

game.path: ./Who Wants to Be a Millionaire - 2nd Edition (USA).zip
game.name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire : 2nd Edition
game.desc:
Can you keep your cool in the Hot Seat?
Now you can take all of the excitement of the top-rated TV game show, WHO WANTS TO BE A MILLIONAIRE with you anywhere. All you have to do is answer 15 questions to win $1,000,000 (a virtual million, that is). So it's your turn to get into the Hot Seat for the life-changing question "...is that your FINAL answer?"
So let's play WHO WANTS TO BE A MILLIONAIRE: 2nd Edition!
- 600 challenging questions - Use all 3 lifelines - Ask the Audience, Phone a Friend, or 50/50 - Play against your friends in a "Fastest Finger Round" - Become a virtual millionaire

game.name: The Wild Thornberrys : Rambler
game.desc: The Wild Thornberrys are trying to win the Golden Schweitzer, an award given for the best nature documentary in the world. You take control of Nigel, Marianne, Eliza, Darwin, Debbie, and Donnie as they travel through six wacky levels of action. Along the way, they will have to travel to exotic locations like the Galapagos Islands, Amazon Rain Forest, Savannah Desert, African Congo, Himalayan Mountains, and Australian Outback. Each area has unique mini-games that can be set to three different difficulty levels. The games include sneaking up on animals and videotaping them, driving the Thornberry bus through the jungle, and helping Nigel collect items as he rappels down the side of a cliff. When you complete a game, the difficulty level determines what ending you see. Help the crew win the big award in THE WILD THRONBERRYS: Rambler.

game.name: WingWarriors
game.desc: It's a classic shooting game with some bullet-hell reminiscences. 6 stages with 3 bosses, 3 different players to choose from, and a lot of bullets to avoid.

game.name: Wings of Fury
game.desc:
Wings of Fury es un juego de acción en el que asumes el papel de un piloto de combate estadounidense estacionado en un portaaviones aliado en el medio del Pacífico. A los mandos de tu F6F Hellcat, se te encomiendan una serie de misiones destinadas a destruir objetivos enemigos (aviones, Jeeps, búnkeres, barcos ...).
Comienzas cada misión despegando de un portaaviones, que tendrás que proteger de los ataques de los torpederos japoneses. Siempre que te quedes sin combustible, bombas, cohetes o munición de tu ametralladora, puedes reponerlos regresando a tu portaaviones, que también puedes usar para reparar los daños de tu avión.

game.path: ./Winnie the Pooh - Adventures in the 100 Acre Wood (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl,Da).zip
game.name: Winnie the Pooh : Adventures in the 100 Acre Wood
game.desc: Join Winnie the Pooh and his friends as they come to the Game Boy Color in WINNIE THE POOH: Adventures in the 100 Acre Wood. You must help Pooh get to a certain place on the game board within a specified number of dice rolls. Along the way, he will encounter his friends Tigger, Piglet, Rabbit, and Eeyore, who will play along with Pooh and open mini-games for the loveable bear to store in his cupboard.
